src_text: dit was dus gepas dat ek hierdie platform kon gebruik om die presidensiële intervensie vir jeugindiensneming te loods, wat 'n strategiese nasionale visie en plan is waarin prioriteitsoptredes uiteengesit word om jeugwerkloosheid die hoof te bied.
tgt_text: it was therefore fitting that i could use this platform to launch the presidential youth employment intervention, which is a strategic national vision and plan which sets out priority actions to address youth unemployment.

src_text: dit sluit 'n nasionale loopbaannetwerk in wat kandidate met werksgeleenthede verbind wat by hulle vermoëns pas.
tgt_text: this includes a national pathway management network that matches candidates with work opportunities.

src_text: dit stel jongmense in staat om toegang tot geleenthede te kry, aangesien sommige van hulle nie toegang tot netwerke het wat geleenthede vir hulle ontsluit nie.
tgt_text: this will enable young people to have access to opportunities as some of them do not have the networks that make easy access to opportunities possible.

src_text: gespesialiseerde kort gefokusde kursusse in vaardighede waaraan werkgewers tans ’n behoefte het, word gereël.
tgt_text: specialised short focused courses in skills that employers need now will be organ ised.

src_text: dit is daarop gerig om aandag te gee aan die probleem van 'n wanverhouding tussen die bestaande opvoedkundige, opleidingsen ontwikkelingsprogramme en die vereistes van die ekonomie.
tgt_text: this aims to address the problem of a mismatch between the existing educational, training and develop ment programmes and the requirements of the economy.

src_text: ons verwelkom die werk wat reeds op hierdie gebied gedoen word, soos die program wat tans deur die departemente van landbou, grondhervorming en landelike ontwik keling asook samewerkende regering en tradisionele sake onderneem word om 1 000 jong studente in die vrystaat op te lei in landbouen ander vaardighede.
tgt_text: we welcome the work already being done in this area, such as the programme currently underway through the departments of agriculture, land reform and rural development and cooperative governance and traditional affairs to train 1,000 young students in the free state in agricultural and other skills.

src_text: talle jongmense wil hul eie ondernemings begin.
tgt_text: many young people want to start their own businesses.

src_text: hulle het egter nie die tegniese vaardighede wat hulle kan help om dit te doen nie.
tgt_text: they lack the technical skills that can help them start their own businesses.

src_text: hierdie ingryping sal die groei van jong entrepreneurs ondersteun.
tgt_text: the intervention will support the growth of youth entrepreneurs.

src_text: entrepreneurskap is beslis nie 'n wondermiddel nie, maar ek is oortuig daarvan dat dit een doeltreffende en bewese manier is om identiteit en doel, 'n gevoel dat hulle êrens behoort en hoop vir die toekoms aan die jeug te verleen.
tgt_text: entrepreneurship is certainly not a panacea, but i am convinced that it is one effective and proven way to confer identity and purpose, a sense of belonging, and hope for the future for the youth.

src_text: die presidensiële jeugdiensprogram bied aan jongmense geleenthede om iets terug te gee aan hul gemeenskappe.
tgt_text: the presidential youth service programme provides opportunities for young people to give back to their communities.

src_text: hierdie inisiatief is daarop gerig om veranderinge te bewerkstellig en ’n grootskaalse uitwerking te hê, in teenstelling met gefragmenteerde programme wat ’n beperkte uitwerking het.
tgt_text: this initiative is designed to effect change and make an impact at scale, as opposed to fragmented programmes that have had limited impact.

src_text: ek het ook in die staatsrede aangekondig dat ons 1% van die nasionale begroting opsy sal sit vir 'n jeugindiensnemings inisiatief.

src_text: 'n aantal programme en projekte word ontwerp om hierdie nasionale uitdaging aan te pak.

tgt_text: the youth of our country clearly see this as a land of opportunity and promise, despite the obstacles they encounter.

tgt_text: it is these young people who are the real jewels of our country’s future and who remind us that our freedom was won through the sacrifices of the young men and women who were determined that not only they, but those who came after, should live in the light of freedom.

tgt_text: we must continue to work together as government, business, labour and civil society to ensure that the burden of unemployment does not continue to weigh down our young people, crush their spirits and cause them to become despondent.

tgt_text: let us work together to fix our finances vukuzenzele unnamed the budget presented by finance minister tito mboweni presents a sobering assessment of the state of our economy.

src_text: dit is duidelik uit die syfers dat, tensy ons nou optree om dinge om te keer, daar nog moeiliker tye voorlê.
tgt_text: the figures make it plain that unless we act now to turn things around, there will be even more difficult times ahead.

src_text: eenvoudig gestel, ons bestee baie meer as wat ons verdien.
tgt_text: put simply, we are spending far more than we are earning.

src_text: as gevolg hiervan, leen ons al hoe meer terwyl die koste om skuld te betaal styg.
tgt_text: as a result, we are borrowing more and more, and the cost of servicing that debt is rising.

src_text: trouens, skuldkoste is nou die vinnigste groeiende vlak van besteding.
tgt_text: in fact, debt service costs are now the fastestgrowing area of expenditure.

src_text: ons bestee meer aan skuldte rugbetalings as aan gesondheid; slegs onderwys en maatskapli ke ontwikkeling kry meer.
tgt_text: we spend more on debt repayments than we do on health; only education and social development get more.

src_text: hierdie posisie is onseker en onvolhoubaar.
tgt_text: this position is precarious and unsustainable.

src_text: ons moet aansienlike veran deringe aanbring en dit moet nou aangebring word.
tgt_text: we need to make significant changes and we need to make them now.

src_text: daar is verskeie redes vir die posisie waarin ons tans is.
tgt_text: there are several reasons for the position we’re now in.

src_text: ons ekonomie het die afgelope de kade nie veel gegroei nie, veral weens die wêreldwye finansiële krisis in 2008 en 'n afname in die vraag na die minerale wat ons uitvoer.
tgt_text: our economy has not grown much over the last decade, mainly due to the 2008 global financial crisis and a decline in demand for the minerals that we export.

src_text: as gevolg hiervan was die invordering van inkomste swak en moes ons meer leen om besteding aan ontwikke ling, infrastruktuur en lone te kon volhou.
tgt_text: as a result, revenue collection has been weak and we have had to borrow more to sustain spending on development, infrastructure and wages.

src_text: terselfdertyd het staatskaping en korrupsie 'n invloed gehad op bestuur, bedryfsdoeltreffendheid en finansiële volhoubaarheid by verskeie openbare instellings, insluitend ondernemings in staatsbesit (soe's).
tgt_text: at the same time, state capture and corruption has affected governance, operational effectiveness and financial sustainability at several public institutions, including stateowned enterprises (soes).

src_text: pogings wat die afgelope twee jaar aangewend is om die ekonomie te laat herleef en instellings te herbou, word nou ondermyn deur die elek trisiteitskrisis, wat groei verder beperk en 'n bykomende las op openbare finansies plaas.
tgt_text: efforts over the last two years to revive the economy and rebuild institutions have now been undermined by the electricity crisis, further constraining growth and placing an additional burden on public finances.

src_text: ons prioriteite in hierdie be groting is dus om die ekonomie weer op 'n groeipad te plaas, openbare besteding te beperk en ons skuld te stabiliseer.
tgt_text: our priorities in this budget therefore are to put the economy back on a path of growth, constrain public spending and stabilise our debt.

src_text: die begroting is 'n integrale deel van ons strewe na inklu siewe groei, werkskepping, belegging en 'n bekwame staat.
tgt_text: the budget is an integral part of our drive for inclusive growth, job creation, investment and a capable state.

src_text: ons het 'n doelbewuste besluit geneem om nie die pad van besnoeiingsmaatreëls te volg nie.
tgt_text: we have made a deliberate decision not to pursue a path of austerity.

src_text: op so 'n roete sou die uitga wes aan maatskaplike dienste waarop arm mense staatmaak, heelwat besnoei moes word.
tgt_text: such a route would have seen deep cuts in spending on the social services that poor people rely on.

src_text: dit kon daartoe gelei het dat staatsamptenare se salarisse dramaties sou verminder; die omvang van die staatsdiens, bo nusse en pensioene gekortwiek word; belasting verhoog word en die belangrikste staatsbates verkoop moes word.
tgt_text: it could have involved dramatically reducing the salaries of civil servants, the size of the public service, cutting bonuses and pensions, raising taxes and selling off key state assets.

src_text: 'n besnoeiingsbegroting sou ons groeivooruitsigte verder benadeel het en die staat se ver moë om ekonomiese aktiwiteite te stimuleer en in die behoeftes van mense te voorsien, verswak het.
tgt_text: an austerity budget would have damaged our growth prospects further and weakened the ability of the state to stimulate economic activity and meet people’s needs.

src_text: ons het in plaas daarvan 'n begroting voorgelê wat verskeie gebalanseerde en weldeurdagte maatreëls bevat om besteding in toom te hou, omset te verhoog en groei aan te moedig.
tgt_text: we have instead presented a budget that contains a range of balanced and wellconsidered measures to contain spending, increase revenue and encourage growth.

src_text: oor die volgende drie jaar ver wag ons om ongeveer r261 mil jard te bespaar deur verskillen de departemente se begrotings te besnoei en die koers waarteen die staatsdiens se loonrekening verhoog, te verlaag.
tgt_text: over the next three years, we expect to achieve savings of around r261 billion by cutting the budgets of several departments and reducing the rate at which the public service wage bill increases.

src_text: terself dertyd sal ons egter meer moet bestee om die herstruk turering van soe's soos eskom en die sal te ondersteun.
tgt_text: at the same time, however, we will need to spend more to support the restructuring of soes like eskom and saa.

src_text: as gevolg hiervan, verwag ons 'n netto vermindering van r156 miljard in nierenteuitgawes oor die mediumtermyn.
tgt_text: as a result, we expect a net reduction of r156 billion in noninterest spending over the medium term.

src_text: dit sal help om die tekort te verklein en ons leningsbehoef tes te verminder.
tgt_text: this will help to narrow the deficit and reduce our borrowing needs.

src_text: 'n groot deel van die bespa ring sal uit die vermindering van die koers waarteen ons loonrekening groei, spruit.
tgt_text: a large part of the savings will come from reducing the rate at which our wage bill grows.

src_text: dit sal verg dat gefokusde bespre kings tussen alle maatskaplike vennote, maar veral met vak bonde in die openbare sektor, gehou moet word.
tgt_text: this will require focused discussions among all social partners, but particularly with public sector unions.

src_text: hierdie be sprekings moet plaasvind met die wil om oplossings te vind.
tgt_text: these engagements need to be conducted in a spirit of seeking solutions.

src_text: ek is bemoedig deur die bereid willigheid van alle partye om oplossings deur daadwerklike onderhandelinge te vind.
tgt_text: i am heartened by the willingness of all parties to engage in serious negotiations aimed at finding a solution.

src_text: ons benadering is nie om die grootte van die staatsdiens dramaties te verminder nie, maar om te kyk na die tempo waarteen lone groei.
tgt_text: our approach is not to dramatically cut the size of the public service, but to examine the rate at which wages grow.

src_text: staats dienslone het oor baie jare ge middeld teen 'n baie hoër koers gestyg as inflasie, en ons moet dit regstel om die openbare finansies onder beheer te kry.
tgt_text: public service wages have on average increased at a much higher rate than inflation over many years, and we need to fix this if we are to get public finances under control.

src_text: dit geld ook vir die bestuur van mense se persoonlike finansies, waar enige uitgawes wat meer as inflasie styg of dit nou elektrisiteitstariewe, mobiele tariewe of kos is die begroting en finansies van elke individu altyd onder druk sal plaas.
tgt_text: this also applies to the management of people’s personal finances, where if any expenditure item that rises at a rate more than inflation – be it electricity tariffs, mobile tariffs or food – will always put any individual person’s budget and finances under strain and out of kilter.

src_text: die loonrekening is volgens ekonomiese klassifikasie die grootste bestedingskom ponent.
tgt_text: the wage bill remains the largest component of spending by economic classification.

src_text: die toename in die loonrekening het begin om die besteding aan kapitaalprojekte vir toekomstige groei en items wat van kritieke belang is vir dienslewering, te verdring.
tgt_text: growth in the wage bill has begun crowding out spending on capital projects for future growth and items that are critical for service delivery.

src_text: die staatsdiens se loonreke ning is geensins die enigste gebied waar ons koste besnoei nie.
tgt_text: the public service wage bill is by no means the only area where we are cutting costs.

src_text: ek het besluit dat die sala risse van senior openbare amps draers nie vanjaar verhoog sal word nie.
tgt_text: i have decided that there will be no increase in the salaries of senior public office bearers this year.

src_text: dit volg op 'n vermin dering in voordele wat spruit uit wysigings aan die ministe riële handboek.
tgt_text: this follows a reduction in benefits stemming from changes to the ministerial handbook.

src_text: ons sal vanjaar 'n nuwe wet publiseer waarin 'n vergoedingsraamwerk vir openbare entiteite en onder nemings in staatsbesit bekend gemaak sal word om buitenspo rige betaling aan raadslede en bestuurders te voorkom.
tgt_text: we will publish a new law this year introducing a remuneration framework for public entities and state owned companies to prevent excessive pay for board members and executives.

src_text: ons vakbondgenote is reg wanneer hulle sê dat ons op 'n bewysbare manier lekkasies van openbare fondse moet voorkom deur korrupsie uit te roei, en onreëlmatige, nuttelose en verkwistende uitgawes te beëindig.
tgt_text: our trade union compatriots are right in saying that we should in a demonstrable way prevent leakages of public funds by addressing corruption, ending irregular, fruitless and wasteful expenditure.

src_text: ons sal dit, en nog baie meer doen.
tgt_text: we will do this and much more.

src_text: net so belangrik as wat dit is om die openbare loonrekening in toom te hou om openbare finansies te stabiliseer, is dit noodsaaklik om die prestasie van die openbare sektor te verbeter om 'n meer bekwame, doeltreffende staat te bou.
tgt_text: as much as containing the public wage bill is critical to stabilising public finances, improving public sector performance is imperative if we want to build a more capable, efficient state.

src_text: ons het meer van die regte mense in die regte posisies nodig.
tgt_text: we need more of the right people in the right positions.

src_text: deur openbare besteding in toom te hou, streef ons daarna om groei te verbeter.
tgt_text: as we contain public spending, we are pursuing growth.

src_text: dit is om hierdie rede dat daar geen groot belastingverhogings is nie, ondanks die fiskale tekort.
tgt_text: it is for this reason that, despite the fiscal gap, there are no major tax increases.

src_text: in plaas daarvan is daar 'n mate van verligting vir individuele belastingbetalers en verskeie maatreëls om die korporatiewe belastingbasis te verbreed.
tgt_text: instead, there is some relief for individual tax payers and several measures to broaden the corporate tax base.

src_text: ons gaan ook voort met verreiken de hervormings in gebiede soos elektrisiteitsvoorsiening, hawens en spooren telekom munikasie om die koste van saketransaksies te verlaag.
tgt_text: we are also pushing ahead with farreaching reforms in areas like electricity provision, ports and rail and telecommunications to reduce the cost of doing business.

src_text: deur die infrastruktuurfonds wil ons finansiering vanuit 'n verskei denheid bronne mobiliseer om in 'n massiewe bouprogram te belê.
tgt_text: through the infrastructure fund we aim to mobilise financing from a range of sources to invest in a massive build programme.

src_text: deur ons industriële stra tegie en beleggingsaansporing, ontsluit ons belangrike groei gebiede.
tgt_text: through our industrial strategy and investment drive we are unlocking vital areas of growth.

src_text: dit verg same werking, nie konflik nie.

tgt_text: patient support crucial for fighting tb dale hes the usaid tuberculosis south africa project is proving to be a perfect example of how government, communities and ngos can partner together to combat tuberculosis (tb) by providing proper support to patients.

src_text: suidafrika het n leierskap sposisie in die globale stryd teen tb ingeneem en die ver enigde state se agentskap vir internasionale ontwikkeling (usaid) het ingetree om hulp aan te bied.
tgt_text: south africa has taken a position of leadership in the global fight against tb, and the united states agency for international development (usaid) has stepped in to provide assistance.

src_text: die projek wat oor vyf jaar strek en in 2016 begin het, word saam met die nasionale depar tement van gesondheid in agt van suidafrika se provinsies uitgevoer.
tgt_text: the fiveyear project, which started in 2016, is being carried out in partnership with the national department of health in eight of south africa’s provinces.

src_text: een van die belangrikste dele van die projek is om gemeenskapsgebaseerde nro's te on dersteun.
tgt_text: one of the most important parts of the project is to support communitybased ngos.

src_text: die projek voorsien befondsing aan 21 nro's, wat meer as 3 500 pasiënte, meest al vanuit landelike gebiede, ondersteun.
tgt_text: the project provides funding to 21 ngos who have supported more than 3 500 patients, the majority based in rural areas.

src_text: mosamaria in die vrystaatmosamaria in mangaung, is een van die nro's wat fondse van die projek ontvang het.
tgt_text: free state progressbased in mangaung, mosamoria is one of the ngos which has received funding from the project.

src_text: die organisasie het n span gemeenskapsgesondheidswer kers, n projekbestuurder en n datavaslegger wat saamwerk om te verseker dat pasiënte op behandeling bly sodat hulle oor n tydperk van ses maande genees kan word.
tgt_text: the organisation has a team of community health workers, a project manager and a data capturer who all work towards ensuring that patients stay on treatment so that they can be cured in a six month period.

src_text: "ons het 74 versorgers in diens vir dié projek.
tgt_text: "we employ 74 care givers for this project.

src_text: ons het aanvanklik met 200 pasiënte gewerk, toe 400 pasiënte en in ons huidige kontrak het ons 500 pasiënte waarmee ons op n daaglikse basis werk.
tgt_text: initially we worked with 200 patients, then 400 patients, and in our current contract we have 500 patients who we work with on a daily basis.

src_text: die pasiënte word vanaf nege kli nieke in die mangaung metro na ons verwys wanneer hulle met tb gediagnoseer word," sê mosamariakoördineerder, trudie harrison.
tgt_text: the patients are referred to us when they have been diagnosed as having tb from nine different clinics in the mangaung metro," says mosamaria coordinator trudie harrison.

src_text: mosamaria onderneem maan delikse deurtotdeur siftings veldtogte om nuwe tbpasiënte op te spoor en hulle dadelik te begin behandel.
tgt_text: mosamaria conducts monthly doortodoor screening campaigns to find new tb patients and get them on treatment immediately.

src_text: harrison sê dat mosamaria se werk die stigma van tb vermin der het en hegte verhoudings met die gemeenskap gesmee het.
tgt_text: harrison says that mosamoria’s work has reduced the stigma around tb, built close relationships with the community and also led to much better rates of successful treatment.

src_text: dit het ook baie meer suk sesvolle behandelingskoerse tot gevolg gehad.
tgt_text: "for example, in 2018, 514 of our patients were cured," harrison says.

src_text: "514 van ons pasiënte is by voorbeeld in 2018 genees," sê harrison.
tgt_text: harrison shares the story of one of mosamaria’s patients.

src_text: harrison deel die storie van een van mosamaria se pasiënte.
tgt_text: he was given daily support by a mosamaria caregiver, who ensured that he swallowed his tablets every day and also assisted with maize meal and new clothes.

src_text: hy is daagliks deur n mosama riaversorger ondersteun, wat seker gemaak het dat hy elke dag sy medikasie neem en hom ook van mieliemeel en nuwe klere voosien het.
tgt_text: "he completed the treatment and was cured.

src_text: "hy het die behandeling voltooi en is genees en hy kon teruggaan werk toe, aangesien sy werkgewer sy werk vir hom gehou het," sê harrison.
tgt_text: he went back to work as his employer had kept his job for him," says harrison.

tgt_text: know the symptoms of tb if you have some of the following symptoms, then you should visit your nearest clinic or hospital to be tested for tb: coughing that lasts three or more weeks; coughing up blood; chest pain, or pain when breathing or coughing; unintentional weight loss; fatigue; fever.

src_text: saam kan ons die impak van covid19 beveg vukuzenzele unnamed die wêreld is in die wurggreep van 'n noodsituasie vir openbare gesondheid op 'n skaal wat meer as 'n eeu laas beleef is.
tgt_text: together we can fight the impact of covid 19 vukuzenzele unnamed the world is in the throes of a public health emergency on a scale not witnessed in over a century.

src_text: die verspreiding van die koronavirus, wat die siekte bekend as covid19 veroorsaak, is skrikwekkend vinnig en wyd, en word nou as 'n wêreldwye pandemie gedefinieer.
tgt_text: the spread of the coronavirus, which causes the disease known as covid19, has been alarmingly swift and widescale, and is now defined as a global pandemic.

src_text: dit het geen geografiese of territoriale grense nie, het sowel jonk as oud besmet en is aan die toeneem in sowel ontwikkelde as ontwikkelende lande.
tgt_text: it knows no geographical or territorial boundaries, has infected both young and old, and is on the rise in developed and developing countries alike.

src_text: namate die sifting en toetsing verskerp word, sal die aantal infeksies in suidafrika na verwagting toeneem.
tgt_text: as screening and testing is scaled up, the number of infections in south africa is expected to rise.

src_text: ek het onlangs 'n nasionale ramptoestand verklaar, 'n maatstaf wat ooreenstem met die erns van die bedreiging vir ons mense, ons samelewing en ons ekonomie.
tgt_text: i recently declared a national state of disaster, a measure proportionate to the severity of the threat to our people, to our society and to our economy.

src_text: dit sal ons in staat stel om 'n geïntegreerde en gekoördineerde rampbestuursprogram te bedryf en om vinnige en doeltreffende noodreaksiestelsels in plek te stel.
tgt_text: this will enable us to have an integrated and coordinated disaster management mechanism and to set up emergency, rapid and effective response systems.

src_text: hierdie virus sal uiters ontwrigtend wees, en ons priori teit is om die gesondheid en welstand van alle suidafrikaners te beskerm.
tgt_text: this virus will be extremely disruptive, and our priority is to safeguard the health and wellbeing of all south africans.

src_text: ons moet ook die onvermydelike ekonomiese nadraai aanpak.
tgt_text: we also have to address the inevitable economic fallout.

src_text: ons moet 'n afname in uitvoere verwag, 'n daling in toeristeaankomste en 'n ernstige impak op produksie en sakelewensvatbaarheid, sowel as werkskepping en die behoud van werk.
tgt_text: we must expect a decline in exports, a drop in tourist arrivals and a severe impact on production, business viability and job creation and retention.

src_text: die kabinet finaliseer tans 'n omvattende pakket van ingrypings om die verwagte impak van covid19 op ons ekonomie te verminder.
tgt_text: cabinet is in the process of finalising a comprehensive package of interventions to mitigate the expected impact of covid19 on our economy.

src_text: dit word in oorleg met sake, arbeidsen ander relevante instellings gedoen.
tgt_text: this is being done in consultation with business, labour and other relevant institutions.

src_text: dit was louis pasteur wat gesê het dat rykdom die voorbereide gees bevoordeel.
tgt_text: it was louis pasteur who said that fortune favours the prepared mind.

src_text: suidafrika is voorbereid, en is reeds 'n geruime tyd voorbereid.
tgt_text: south africa is prepared, and has been so for some time.

src_text: sedert die uitbreek van die virus aangemeld is, het ons opgetree om maatreëls vir sifting en inperking in plek te stel.
tgt_text: since the outbreak was first reported we have acted to put screening and containment measures in place.

src_text: ons nasionale reaksie is gedryf deur 'n interministeriële komitee (imk) onder die voorsitterskap en bekwame leiding van die minister van gesondheid, dr zweli mkhize.
tgt_text: our national response has been driven by an interministerial committee (imc) chaired and ably led by the minister of health, dr zweli mkhize.

src_text: die manier waarop die imk en die ondersteuningspanne op hierdie noodtoestand gereageer het, is doeltreffend en gerusstellend, veral omdat dit help om die openbare paniek te onderdruk.
tgt_text: the manner in which the imc and the support teams have responded to this emergency has been both exemplary and reassuring, particularly in helping to quell public panic.

src_text: ek sal voorsitter wees van 'n nasionale opdragraad om alle aspekte van ons nasionale reaksie te koördineer.
tgt_text: i will be chairing a national command council to coordinate all aspects of our national response.

src_text: suidafrika het 'n positiewe prestasierekord in die bestuur van noodgevalle.
tgt_text: south africa has a positive track record in managing public health emergencies.

src_text: ons het die kennis, die middele en die kundigheid.
tgt_text: we have the knowledge, the means and the expertise.

src_text: ons wetenskaplikes en epidemioloë is wêreldklas.
tgt_text: our scientists and epidemiologists are worldclass.

src_text: ons het 'n reeks noodmaatreëls ingestel en sal finansie ring beskikbaar stel om die implementering daarvan te ondersteun.
tgt_text: we have put a raft of emergency measures in place, and will make funding available to support their implementation.

src_text: dit sluit ’n reisverbod op besoekers uit lande met 'n hoë risiko in, sowel as verpligte toetsing, selfisolasie of kwarantyn vir suidafrikaanse burgers wat uit hierdie lande terugkeer; asook die versterking van waarneming, sifting en toetsing by die hawens van toetrede tot die republiek.
tgt_text: they include travel bans on visitors from highrisk countries; mandatory testing, selfisolation or quarantine for south african nationals returning from these countries; and strengthening surveillance, screening and testing at ports of entry into the republic.

src_text: sosiale distansiëring is van kritieke belang om die verspreiding van covid19 te stuit.
tgt_text: social distancing is critical if we are to contain the spread of covid19.

src_text: byeenkomste van meer as 100 mense is verbode en die massaviering van nasionale dae word gekanselleer.
tgt_text: gatherings of more than 100 people are prohibited and mass celebrations of national days are cancelled.

src_text: besoeke aan alle korrektiewe sentrums word onmiddellik vir 30 dae opgeskort.
tgt_text: visits to all correctional centres are being suspended for 30 days with immediate effect.

src_text: nienoodsaaklike internasionale reis vir regeringsamptenare is verbied en nienoodsaaklike reis binne die land word ontmoedig.
tgt_text: nonessential international travel for government officials has been proscribed and nonessential domestic travel discouraged.

src_text: altesaam 35 binnelandse plekke van toetrede in die land en twee hawens sal gesluit wees.
tgt_text: a total of 35 land ports and two sea ports will be closed, as will schools from the 18th of march until after the easter weekend.

src_text: skole sal ook vanaf 18 maart tot na die paasnaweek gesluit wees.
tgt_text: we will soon be announcing measures with regards to universities and colleges.

src_text: ons sal binnekort maatreëls rakende universiteite en kolleges aankondig.
tgt_text: next month will be easter, a sacred period for a number of faiths and a time in which mass services and gatherings will take place.

src_text: volgende maand is paasfees, 'n heilige tyd vir verskeie gelowe en 'n tyd waarin massadienste en byeenkomste gewoonlik plaasvind.
tgt_text: the faith community should take decisions in this regard in the best interests of the health of their congregants and the country as a whole.

src_text: die geloofsgemeenskap moet besluite neem in dié verband in die belang van hul gemeentes se gesondheid en dié van die land as ’n geheel.
tgt_text: hygiene control should be intensified in all sectors.

src_text: die beheer van higiëne moet in alle sektore versterk word.
tgt_text: every citizen should take charge of their own safety by observing measures such as frequent handwashing with soap or handsanitizers and covering their nose or mouth with a tissue or flexed elbow when coughing or sneezing.

src_text: elkeen van ons moet beheer neem oor ons eie veiligheid deur maatreëls soos om gereeld jou hande met seep te was of handontsmetmiddels te gebruik en jou neus en mond met 'n snesie of elmboog te bedek wanneer jy hoes of nies.
tgt_text: as part of our national effort the department of health will continue with an intensive and ongoing campaign to raise awareness about prevention, transmission and infection symptoms.

src_text: as deel van ons nasionale poging sal die departement van gesondheid voortgaan met 'n intensiewe en deurlopende veldtog om bewustheid oor simptome, voorkoming, oordrag en infeksie te verhoog.
tgt_text: i encourage all south africans to acquaint themselves with the relevant preventative material.

src_text: ek moedig alle suidafrikaners aan om hulle te vergewis van die toepaslike voorkomende maatreëls.
tgt_text: these measures are similar to those in other countries, and it is important we all understand that they are not punitive but a matter of public safety.

src_text: hierdie maatreëls is soortgelyk aan dié in ander lande, en dit is belangrik dat ons almal verstaan dat dit nie ’n straf is nie, maar 'n kwessie van openbare veiligheid.
tgt_text: one of the greatest dangers at this time is ignorance and misinformation.

src_text: een van die grootste gevare op die oomblik is onkunde en verkeerde inligting.
tgt_text: we should stop spreading fake and unverified news, especially on social media.

src_text: ons moet ophou om vals en ongeverifieerde nuus te versprei, veral op sosiale media.
tgt_text: this can exacerbate an already tense national mood and damage the national effort.

src_text: dit kan 'n reeds gespanne nasionale stemming vererger en die nasionale poging skade berokken.
tgt_text: we must also not give in to the expressions of bigotry that we have seen in other countries directed at nationals of countries from where the outbreak began or the current epicenter in europe.

src_text: ons moet ook nie toegee aan die uitdrukking van vooroordeel wat ons gesien het in ander lande wat gerig is op burgers van lande waar die uitbreek begin het of die huidige episentrum in europa nie.
tgt_text: this is clearly a virus that affects people of all nationalities.

src_text: dit is duidelik dat die virus mense van alle nasionaliteite aantas.
tgt_text: let us lower the wing of compassion to those who are infected, and to those who have returned home from highrisk countries.

src_text: laat ons diegene wat besmet is, sowel as dié wat uit hoërisikolande teruggekeer het, met deernis behandel.
tgt_text: let us assist those in need and those more vulnerable, instead of shunning them.

src_text: laat ons hulp verleen aan mense in nood en dié wat meer kwesbaar is, in plaas daarvan om hulle te vermy.
tgt_text: we will remain faithful to the values of tolerance and respect that define us as a people.

src_text: ons sal getrou bly aan die waardes van verdraagsaamheid en respek wat ons as 'n volk definieer.
tgt_text: on behalf of all the people of south africa i thank the team who repatriated our compatriots from wuhan, china, as well as the leadership and people of limpopo who are assisting with the quarantine process.

src_text: namens al die inwoners van suidafrika bedank ek die span wat ons landgenote uit wuhan, china, gerepatrieer het, asook die leierskap en mense van limpopo wat help met die kwarantynproses.
tgt_text: this is a difficult time.

src_text: dit is 'n moeilike tyd.
tgt_text: and yet it is in times of adversity that our strength is revealed.

src_text: en tog is dit in tye van teëspoed dat ons krag open baar word.
tgt_text: we will act decisively, with determination and with purpose.

src_text: ons sal beslissend optree, met vasberadenheid en doelgerigtheid.
tgt_text: we will act as a collective, for it is upon the actions of every south african that the success of our efforts depend.

src_text: ons sal gesamentlik optree, want dit is die optrede van elke suidafrikaner wat die sukses van ons pogings bepaal.
tgt_text: the thuma mina moment is upon us, perhaps as never before.

src_text: die thuma minaoomblik is op ons, miskien soos nog nooit tevore nie.
tgt_text: this too shall pass.

src_text: dit sal ook verbygaan.
tgt_text: we shall overcome.

src_text: ons sal oorwin.
tgt_text: together we can fight the impact of covid 19 vukuzenzele unnamed the world is in the throes of a public health emergency on a scale not witnessed in over a century.

src_text: hulp aan ons kwesbare burgers vukuzenzele unnamed baie lande regoor die wêreld het koronavirusinperkings ingestel om die lewens van hulle burgers te red.
tgt_text: help for our vulnerable citizens vukuzenzele unnamed many countries around the world have imposed coronavirus lockdowns with a view to saving the lives of their citizens.

src_text: ons het dieselfde hier gedoen, maar ons inperking het 'n baie betreurenswaardige foutlyn in ons samelewing onthul, wat aandui hoe uiterste armoede, ongelykheid en werkloosheid die struktuur van ons gemeenskappe uitmekaar skeur.
tgt_text: we have done the same in our country, but our lockdown has revealed a very sad fault line in our society that reveals how grinding poverty, inequality and unemployment is tearing the fabric of our communities apart.

src_text: daar kan geen groter foltering wees as dié van ouers wie se kinders by hulle huil omdat hulle nie kos het nie, maar hulle het niks om te gee nie.
tgt_text: there can be no greater anguish than that of a parent whose children cry out to them for food, but they have none to give.

src_text: daar kan geen groter onreg bestaan as 'n samelewing waar sommiges in gemak en oorvloed leef, terwyl ander sukkel om met min of niks te oorleef nie.
tgt_text: there can be no greater injustice than a society where some live in comfort and plenty, while others struggle at the margins to survive with little or nothing at all.

src_text: ja, dit is die hartseer nagevolge van 'n gebroke en ongelyke verlede.
tgt_text: yes, these are the residual effects of a fractured and unequal past.

src_text: maar dit is ook 'n simptoom van 'n fundamentele mislukking in ons samelewing ná apartheid.
tgt_text: but they are also a symp tom of a fundamental failing in our postapartheid society.

src_text: die landwye inperking in reaksie op die koronavirus het 'n jarelange probleem aansienlik vererger.
tgt_text: the nationwide lockdown in response to the coronavirus has gravely exarcerbated a longstanding problem.

src_text: die afgelope paar weke is ons gekonfronteer met ontstellende beelde van desperate mense wat mekaar vir kospakkies by verspreidingsentrums vertrap en gemeenskappe wat protesoptogte hou teen voedseltekorte.
tgt_text: over the past few weeks, we have been confronted with distressing images of desperate people clamouring for food parcels at distribution centres and of community protests against food shortages.

src_text: ons het ook bewerings gehoor wat ontstellend en walglik is.
tgt_text: we have also had to contend with allegations both disturbing and disgusting.

src_text: verskeie provinsies het berigte ontvang van gewetenlose individue, sommige van hulle na bewering regeringsamptenare, wat kospakkies wat vir die behoeftiges en kwesbares bestem is opgaar of verkoop, of vir hul vriende en familie gee.
tgt_text: a number of provinces have received reports that callous individuals, some of them allegedly government officials, are hoarding or selling food parcels earmarked for the needy and destitute, or diverting them to their friends and families.

src_text: as daar bevind word dat daar enige waarheid in hierdie bewerings steek, sal ons baie streng teen die betrokke individue optree.
tgt_text: if there is found to be substance to these allegations we will deal with the individuals concerned harshly.

src_text: met die verklaring van 'n nasionale ramptoestand en die instelling van 'n landwye inperkingstoestand het ons ’n onbekende terrein betree.
tgt_text: with the declaration of a national state of disaster and the imposition of a nationwide lockdown we entered uncharted waters.

src_text: dit was nog nooit voorheen vir suidafrika nodig om 'n openbare gesondheidsnoodsituasie van hierdie omvang te hanteer nie.
tgt_text: south africa has never had to deal with a public health emergency of this magnitude.

src_text: ons moes vinnig optree om lewens te red.
tgt_text: we had to act quickly to save lives.

src_text: en ons moet erken dat die voorsiening van ondersteuning aan die land se kwesbaarste burgers in die dae en weke wat hierop gevolg het, stadiger was as wat dit moes wees, en dat sekere probleme oor die hoof gesien is.
tgt_text: and we must acknowledge that in the days and weeks that have followed, the provision of support to our country’s most vulnerable citizens has been slower than required, and that lapses have occurred.

src_text: die uitbetaling van maatskaplike toelaes het egter betreklik glad verloop, en ná 'n aantal tegniese uitdagings word die voedselverspreidingstelsel nou gestroomlyn.
tgt_text: however, the payment of social grants has proceeded relatively smoothly, and after a number of technical challenges, the food distribution system is being streamlined.

src_text: die instelling van 'n landwye inperkingstoestand op baie kort kennisgewing het tot verskeie uitdagings gelei.
tgt_text: imposing a nationwide lockdown at very short notice presented several challenges.

src_text: ons moes die relatiewe uitwerking van die nasionale reaksie opweeg teenoor die omvang van die beperkings wat ons sou moes instel.
tgt_text: we have had to weigh up the proportionality of the national response and the extent of restrictions we would need to impose.

src_text: ons het oplaas die roete van omsigtigheid gekies.
tgt_text: we ultimately chose to err on the side of caution.

src_text: en soos die ministerie van gesondheid se voorlegging onlangs aangedui het, het die inperking wat ons die afgelope tyd afgedwing het die infeksiekoers vertraag en, selfs belangriker, vir ons tyd gekoop om voor te berei op 'n moontlike toename in infeksies in die komende weke en maande.
tgt_text: and as the presentation by the ministry of health indicated recently, enforcing a lockdown at the time we did has slowed down the rate of infection and, more importantly, bought us time to prepare for a probable surge in infections in the coming weeks and months.

src_text: ons moes die impak op 'n reeds sukkelende ekonomie op die lang en kort termyn oorweeg, en ons moes die uitwerking van hierdie wesenlike ontwrigting op die lewensbestaan van miljoene mense in oënskou neem.
tgt_text: we had to consider the impact on an already floundering economy in both the long and short term, and the impact of this substantial disruption on the livelihoods of millions of people.

src_text: ons moes nadink oor wat weke se inperking by die huis sou beteken vir werkers wat nie gereelde salarisse kry nie, vir werkloses en mense wat werk soek, vir mense wat informele of seisoenale werk doen, vir diegene in die informele sektor, vir die behoeftiges en vir die kwesbares.
tgt_text: we had to consider what weeks of confinement to the home would mean for the employed not paid regular salaries, for the unemployed and those seeking work, for those in casual or seasonal employment, for those in the informal sector, for the indigent and for the vulnerable.

src_text: die kabinet gaan 'n stel maatreëls ﬁ naliseer om te reageer op die uitwerking van die inperking op die lewensbestaan van ons mense.
tgt_text: cabinet will finalise a set of measures to respond to the impact of the lockdown on the livelihoods of our people.

src_text: dit is voorafgegaan deur 'n reeks samesprekings met verskeie belanghebbendes, waaronder die sakesektor, georganiseerde arbeid, godsdienstige organisasies, die burgerlike samelewing en die presidensiële ekonomiese adviesraad.
tgt_text: this has been preceded by a range of engagements with a number of stakeholders including business, labour, religious organisations, civil society and the presidential economic advisory council.

src_text: die maatskaplike vennote het verskeie voorstelle ingedien oor ingrypings wat die onmiddellike kwesbaarheid van die armstes van die armes, waarvan die meeste staatmaak op maatskaplike hulp om te oorleef, kan verlig.

src_text: jong mense was nog altyd regdeur die geskiedenis n dryfkrag vir verandering.

tgt_text: in just the last few decades, young people have waged numerous struggles against injustice, from the 1968 student uprising in paris, to the antiwar movement in the united states in the 1960s, to the anticolonial struggle in many african and asian countries, to the fight against apartheid, to the arab spring.

src_text: daar sal mettertyd gesê word dat dié jaar, 2020, die begin van n nuwe epog in menslike geskiedenis was.

tgt_text: young people are telling us that the essential values of integrity, compassion and solidarity must be the hallmarks of the new society that will emerge, and that they are determined to be the champions of this new, better world.

src_text: dit is skokkende, onmenslike dade wat nie in ons samelewing tuishoort nie.

tgt_text: the western cape department of health says that keeping hydrated and monitoring your blood glucose, blood pressure and temperature are key to managing covid19, especially for patients with comorbidities.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka (27) ontwikkel haar gesin se nalatenskap en welvaart deur in landbou te belê.
tgt_text: the o wner of 4 u and 4 me primary cooperative in mooiplaas village received support from the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development’s coronavirus (covid19) relief fund for her egg, livestock and vegetable farm.

src_text: die eienaar van 4 u and 4 me primêre koöperasie in die mooiplaasgemeenskap, het ondersteuning van die departement van landbou, grondhervorming en landelike ontwikkeling se koronavirus(covid19) verligtingsfonds vir haar eier, veeen groenteplaas, ontvang.
tgt_text: the department has awarded r1.2 billion worth of vouchers to farmers in need.

src_text: die departement het r1.2 miljard se ontvangsbewyse aan behoeftige boere toegeken.
tgt_text: suduka says her vouchers will help her grow the egg producing side of her business.

src_text: suduka sê dat haar ont vangsbewyse haar sal help om haar onderneming se eierproduksie te verbeter.
tgt_text: "i received three vouchers totalling r19 000. a voucher for r12 000 to buy layer egg chickens, a voucher for r6 500 to buy feed and a r500 voucher to buy medicines.

src_text: "ek het drie ontvangsbewyse van altesaam r19 000 ontvang.
tgt_text: "she started her egg production farm by feeding her family’s traditional chickens with layer grower feed, which enables them to produce eggs without mating.

src_text: dit sluit in n ontvangsbewys van r12 000 om hoenders wat eiers lê, aan te koop, n ontvangsbewys van r6 500 om voer te koop en n r500ontvangsbewys om medisyne te koop.
tgt_text: her chickens now produce 50 eggs a day, which she sells weekly.

src_text: "sy het haar eierboerdery begin deur haar gesin se tradisionele hoenders lêmeel te voer, wat hulle in staat stel om eiers te lê sonder om te paar.
tgt_text: suduka, who also farms with 73 goats, 25 sheep and 25 cows, started farming in 2015 after obtaining a public management n6 certificate from ikhala training and vocational education and training college.

src_text: haar 50 hoenders produseer nou 50 eiers per dag, wat sy weekliks verkoop.
tgt_text: after realising that there were not a lot of job opportunities out there, she decided to take over the family’s then subsistence farm and turn it into a profitable business.

src_text: suduka, wat ook met 73 bok ke, 25 skape en 25 koeie boer, het in 2015 begin boer nadat sy haar n6sertifikaat vir openbare bestuur by ikhala oplei dingsen beroepsonderwys en opleidingskollege, verwerf het.
tgt_text: suduka says: "we grew up practising farming, so after graduating i decided to farm rather than look for a job."

src_text: toe sy besef het dat daar nie baie werksgeleenthede is nie, het sy besluit om haar gesin se destydse bestaansboerdery oor te neem en dit in n winsgewende onderneming te verander.
tgt_text: this proved to be an inspired decision, as she has grown the number of goats and cows.

src_text: suduka sê: "ons het met boerdery grootgeword; ek het dus nadat ek gegradueer het, besluit om te boer, eerder as om werk te soek."
tgt_text: suduka’s sixhectare vegetable farm produces maize, potatoes, peas and beans.

src_text: dit was n geïnspireerde be sluit, aangesien sy die aantal bokke en koeie vermeerder het.
tgt_text: the maize is planted on four hectares, the potatoes on one hectare and the peas and beans share the last hectare.

src_text: suduka se groenteplaas van ses hektaar, lewer mielies, aartappels, ertjies en boontjies.
tgt_text: suduka has learnt a lot from covid19, especially that her best assets are her hands and hard work.

src_text: die mielies word op vier hektaar geplant, die aartappels op een hektaar en die ertjies en boontjies deel die laaste hektaar.
tgt_text: tips on how to start a garden: make sure you know which plants your soil will support.

src_text: suduka het baie van covid19 geleer, veral dat haar beste bates haar hande en harde werk is.
tgt_text: ready your garden by first ploughing the land more than once without planting.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka het haar gesin se bestaansboer dery in 'n klein besigheid omskep.
tgt_text: young farmer receives covid19 support vukuzenzele unnamed nomagcinandile suduka (27) is growing her family’s legacy and wealth by investing in agriculture.

src_text: suidafrika gee tekort aan ventilators ’n hupstoot silusapho nyanda die stryd teen koronavirussiekte (covid19) in suidafrika het ’n hupstoot gekry met die eerste ventilator wat in die land gemaak is.
tgt_text: south africa acts to address ventilator shortage silusapho nyanda a locally developed ventilator will help patients with mild covid19 symptoms to breathe easier.

src_text: die cpapventilator (continuous positive airway pressure) help pasiënte met ligte simptome van covid19 om 'n plaaslik ontwikkelde ventilator help pasiënte met ligte covid19 simptome om makliker asem te haal.
tgt_text: the fight against the coronavirus disease (covid19) in south africa has been boosted with the production of the first ventilator made in the country.

src_text: makliker asem te haal deur 'n beperkte hoeveelheid suurstofhoudende lugdruk te voorsien wat hul lugweë oop hou.
tgt_text: the continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) ventilator helps patients with mild symptoms of covid19 to breathe easier by providing a mild level of oxygenated air pressure to keep their airways open.

src_text: die ventilator is deur die wetenskaplike nywerheidsnavorsingsraad (wnnr) in samewerking met 'n aantal plaaslike vennote ontwerp, en sal landwyd versprei word vir die behandeling van pasiënte met respiratoriese nood in die vroeë fase van die covid19infeksie.
tgt_text: the ventilator was designed by the council for scientific and industrial research (csir) in collaboration with a number of local partners and will be rolled out nationwide to patients showing respiratory distress in the early phase of covid19 infection.

src_text: "die lug wat ’n persoon normaalweg inasem, het 'n suurstofkonsentrasie van 23 persent.
tgt_text: "the air a person normally breaths has a 23 percent concentration of oxygen.

src_text: die cpapventilator kan meer suurstof pomp en sodoende 'n pasiënt help om asem te haal.
tgt_text: the cpap ventilator can pump a higher amount of oxygen, helping a person breathe.

src_text: die cpap kan deurlopend gekonsentreerde suurstof pomp.
tgt_text: the cpap pumps continuous concentrated oxygen.

src_text: ’n mens kan die hoeveelheid suurstof wat ’n pasiënt inasem, verhoog of verlaag," sê die uitvoerende bestuurder van die wnnr se future production manufacturing, martin sanne.
tgt_text: you can increase or decrease the amount of oxygen one is breathing in," says executive manager of csir future production: manufacturing martin sanne.

src_text: pasiënte wat met die ventilator behandel word, word deur 'n gesigmasker aan die ventilator gekoppel.
tgt_text: patients using the ventilator are connected via a face mask.

src_text: suurstof word uit 'n suurstoftenk gepomp en met natuurlike lug in die ventilator gemeng, waarvandaan dit na die masker oorgedra word en deur die pasiënt ingeasem word.
tgt_text: oxygen is drawn from an oxygen gas tank and is mixed with natural air in the ventilator, from where it is transmitted to the mask and breathed in by the patient.

src_text: sanne sê benewens die inpomp van suurstofhoudende lug, help die cpap pasiënte ook om uit te asem.
tgt_text: sanne says that in addition to pumping oxygenated air, the cpap also helps patients exhale.

src_text: die cpapventilator kan in hoëtegnologie kliniese omgewings, sowel as tydelike instellings soos veldhospitale en kwarantyngeriewe gebruik word.
tgt_text: the cpap device can be used in both hightech clinical environments and temporary settings, such as field hospitals and quarantine facilities.

src_text: sanne sê die wnnr sal teen einde augustus 10 000 ventilators kan vervaardig.
tgt_text: sanne says the csir will have produced 10 000 ventilators by the end of august.

src_text: in samewerking met siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya en die universiteit van kaapstad, het die wnnr die cpap volgens die standaarde van die wêreldgesondheidsorganisasie vervaardig.
tgt_text: working with siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya and the university of cape town, the csir produced the cpap according to world health organisation standards.

src_text: die eerste stel ventilators sal aan staatshospitale voorsien word wat onder druk is weens die tekort aan toerusting om covid19 te hanteer.
tgt_text: the first batch of ventilators will be given to state hospitals experiencing pressure due to the unavailability of equipment to deal with covid19.

src_text: die wnnr het aan die cpap begin werk nadat daar wêreldwyd 'n ernstige tekort aan ventilators ontstaan het.
tgt_text: the csir started working on the cpap after the world began experiencing an extreme shortage in ventilators.

src_text: "teen ongeveer maart en april was daar skielik ’n tekort aan ventilators van ons internasionale verskaffers.
tgt_text: "around march and april, there suddenly became a short supply of ventilators from our international suppliers.

src_text: as ’n mens dit in die hande kon kry, was dit baie duur; die regering het daarom ’n tender vir die vervaardiging van ventilators uitgereik," sê sanne.
tgt_text: where you could get them, they were very expensive so government issued a tender for the production of ventilators," says sanne.

src_text: die tender was deel van die regering se nasionale ventilatorprojek in die departement van handel, nywerheid en mededinging.
tgt_text: the tender was part of the government’s national ventilator project within the department of trade, industry and competition.

src_text: die wnnr werk ook aan 'n tweevlakpositiewe lugwegdrukventilator wat daarop gerig is om pasiënte met meer ernstige covid19simptome te behandel.
tgt_text: the csir is also working on a bilevel positive airway pressure ventilator aimed at helping patients with more severe symptoms of covid19.

src_text: die ventilator sal met inaseming sowel as uitaseming help, hetsy in vaste drukmodusse of deur die suurstoftoevoer wat deur die pasiënt benodig word, te bepaal en die druk dienooreenkomstig aan te pas.
tgt_text: south africa acts to address ventilator shortage silusapho nyanda a locally developed ventilator will help patients with mild covid19 symptoms to breathe easier.

src_text: help om die verspreiding van covid19 te stuit vukuzenzele unnamed ons nasie staar die ernstigste krisis in die geskiedenis van die land se demokrasie in die gesig.
tgt_text: help stop the spread of covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed our nation is con fronted by the gravest crisis in the history of our democracy.

src_text: ons het meer as 120 dae lank daarin geslaag om die verspreiding van 'n virus wat verwoesting oor die hele wêreld saai, te verlangsaam.
tgt_text: for more than 120 days, we have succeeded in delaying the spread of a virus that is causing devastation across the globe.

src_text: maar die styging in infeksies wat deur ons mediese spesialiste voorspel is, het nou begin.
tgt_text: but now, the surge in infections that we had been advised by our medical experts would come, has arrived.

src_text: meer as 'n kwartmiljoen suidafrikaners het die koronavirus opgedoen, en ons weet dat baie meer infeksies nie aangemeld word nie.
tgt_text: more than a quarter of a million south africans have been infected with coronavirus, and we know that many more infections have gone undetected.

src_text: meer as 12 000 nuwe gevalle word nou daagliks aangeteken.
tgt_text: we are now recording over 12,000 new cases every day.

src_text: sedert die begin van die uitbreking in maart, het minstens 4 079 mense weens covid19 gesterf.
tgt_text: since the start of the outbreak in march, at least 4,079 people have died from covid19.

src_text: soos die massiewe koue fronte wat hierdie tyd van die jaar ons land vanuit die suidatlantiese oseaan binnestroom, is daar min dele van die land wat nie deur die koronavirus geraak word nie.
tgt_text: like the massive cold fronts that sweep into our country from the south atlantic at this time of year, there are few parts of the country that will remain untouched by the coronavirus.

src_text: die koronavirusstorm is baie feller en meer vernietigend as enigiets wat ons voorheen beleef het.
tgt_text: the coronavirus storm is far fiercer and more destructive than any we have known before.

src_text: dit plaas ongekende druk op ons hulpbronne en ons vasberadenheid.
tgt_text: it is stretching our resources and our resolve to their limits.

src_text: die styging van infeksies wat ons deskundiges en wetenskaplikes meer as drie maande gelede voorspel het, is nou met ons.
tgt_text: the surge of infections that our experts and scientists predicted over 3 months ago has now arrived.

src_text: dit het in die weskaap begin en na die ooskaap en gauteng uitgebrei.
tgt_text: it started in the western cape and is now underway in the eastern cape and gauteng.

src_text: hoewel infeksies eksponensieel styg, is dit belangrik om daarop te let dat ons sterftesyfer van 1,5 persent onder die laagste ter wêreld is.
tgt_text: yet, while infections rise exponentially, it is important to note that our case fatality rate of 1.5 percent is among the lowest in the world.

src_text: dit word vergelyk met 'n wêreldwye gemiddelde sterftesyfer van 4,4 persent.
tgt_text: this is compared to a global average case fatality rate of 4.4 percent.

src_text: ons kan die betreklik lae aantal sterftes in ons land toeskryf aan die ervaring en toewyding van ons gesondheidswerkers en die dringende maatreëls wat ons getref het om die kapasiteit van ons gesondheidstelsel op te bou.
tgt_text: we owe the relatively low number of deaths in our country to the experience and dedication of our health professionals and the urgent measures we have taken to build the capacity of our health system.

src_text: hoewel die meeste van ons mense voorkomingsmaatreëls om die verspreiding van die virus te beperk, nakom, is daar ander wat dit nie doen nie.
tgt_text: even as most of our people have taken action to prevent the spread of the virus, there are others who have not.

src_text: daar is mense in ons geledere wat die regulasies wat ingestel is om die siekte te bestry, ignoreer.
tgt_text: there are some among us who ignore the regulations that have been passed to combat the disease.

src_text: te midde van so 'n pandemie, kan mense se optrede soos om in 'n taxi te klim sonder 'n gesigmasker; saam met vriende te kuier; partytjies by te woon of selfs familie te besoek, die virus maklik laat versprei en lewens in gevaar stel.
tgt_text: in the midst of such a pandemic, getting into a taxi without a face mask, gathering to meet friends, attending parties or even visiting family, can too easily spread the virus and cost lives.

src_text: hoewel dit 'n siekte is wat deur 'n virus veroorsaak word, word dit deur menslike optrede en gedrag versprei.
tgt_text: this may be a disease that is caused by a virus, but it is spread by human conduct and behaviour.

src_text: deur ons eie optrede – as individue, as gesinne, as gemeenskappe – kan en moet ons die verloop van hierdie pandemie in ons land verander.
tgt_text: through our own actions – as individuals, as families, as communities – we can and we must change the course of this pandemic in our country.

src_text: elke keer as ons uit ons huise gaan, moet ons 'n materiaalmasker dra wat ons neus en mond bedek.
tgt_text: we need to wear a cloth mask that covers our nose and mouth whenever we leave home.

src_text: ons moet steeds gereeld ons hande met seep en water of ontsmetmiddel was.
tgt_text: we must continue to regularly wash our hands with soap and water or sanitiser.

src_text: ons moet aanhou om alle oppervlakke in alle openbare ruimtes te reinig en te ontsmet.
tgt_text: we must continue to clean and sanitise all surfaces in all public spaces.

src_text: die belangrikste is dat ons 'n veilige afstand – minstens 2 meter – van ander mense af moet hou.
tgt_text: most importantly, we must keep a safe distance – of at least 2 metres – from other people.

src_text: daar kom tans bewyse aan die lig dat die virus ook in klein deeltjies deur die lug oorgedra kan word in plekke wat oorvol of toe is, of waar die lugsirkulasie swak is.
tgt_text: there is now emerging evidence that the virus may also be carried in tiny particles in the air in places that are crowded, closed or have poor air circulation.

src_text: om dié rede moet ons die binnenshuise omgewing onmiddellik verbeter op openbare plekke waar die risiko vir besmetting die grootste is.
tgt_text: for this reason we must immediately improve the indoor environment of public places where the risk of infection is greatest.

src_text: ons besluit om 'n landwye inperking te verklaar toe ons gesondheidsdienste nog nie voldoende voorberei was nie, het ’n massiewe aanvanklike styging in infeksies sowel as meer lewensverliese voorkom.
tgt_text: our decision to declare a nationwide lockdown prevented a massive early surge of infections when our health services were less prepared, which would have resulted in a far greater loss of lives.

src_text: ons het in die tyd wat ons tot ons beskikking gehad het, belangrike maatreëls getref om ons gesondheidsrespons te versterk.
tgt_text: in the time that we had, we have taken important measures to strengthen our health response.

src_text: ons het meer as twee miljoen koronavirustoetse gedoen en gemeenskapsgesondheidswerkers het meer as 20 miljoen siftings voltooi.
tgt_text: we have conducted more than two million coronavirus tests and community health workers have done more than 20 million screenings.

src_text: ons het bykans 28 000 hospitaalbeddens beskikbaar gestel vir covid19 pasiënte en het funksionele veldhospitale regoor die land opgerig.
tgt_text: we have made available almost 28,000 hospital beds for covid19 patients and have constructed functional field hospitals across the country.

src_text: ons het nou meer as 37 000 kwarantynbeddens in private en openbare fasiliteite regdeur die land, wat gereed is om mense te isoleer wat dit nie tuis kan doen nie.
tgt_text: we now have over 37,000 quarantine beds in private and public facilities across the country, ready to isolate those who cannot do so at home.

src_text: om ons frontliniewerkers te beskerm, het ons miljoene artikels persoonlike beskermende toerusting by hospitale, klinieke en skole regdeur die land aangekoop en afgelewer.
tgt_text: we have procured and delivered millions of items of personal protective equipment to hospitals, clinics and schools across the country to protect our frontline workers.

src_text: ons het ook bykomende verpleegkundiges, dokters en noodgesondheidspersoneel gewerf en werf steeds meer.
tgt_text: we have recruited and continue to recruit additional nurses, doctors and emergency health personnel.

src_text: ons maak vordering met ons pogings om covid19 te hanteer, maar ons grootste uitdaging lê nog voor.
tgt_text: we continue to make progress in our efforts to deal with covid 19, but our greatest challenge still lies ahead.

src_text: ons werk in al die provinsies daaraan om meer beddens in die algemene sale, sowel as vir kritieke covid19pasiënte beskikbaar te stel.
tgt_text: across all provinces, we are working to further increase the number of general ward and critical beds available for covid19 patients.

src_text: kapasiteit in algemene sale word in verskeie hospitale geskep deur gevalle wat minder dringend is tot later uit te stel, sommige hospitaalruimtes in bykomende sale te omskep en veldhospitale op te rig of uit te brei.
tgt_text: ward capacity is being freed up in a number of hospitals by delaying nonurgent care, the conversion of some areas of hospitals into additional ward space and the erection or expansion of field hospitals.

src_text: ons werk daaraan om groter hoeveelhede suurstof, ventilators en ander toerusting vir diegene wat kritieke sorg verg beskikbaar te stel, deur onder meer die toevoer van suurstof vanaf ander bronne te herlei.
tgt_text: we are working to increase supplies of oxygen, ventilators and other equipment for those who will need critical care, including by diverting the supply of oxygen from other purposes.

src_text: ons gebruik digitale tegnologieë om die identifisering, opsporing en isolasie van kontakte uit te brei en om ondersteuning te bied aan diegene wat positief toets.
tgt_text: we are deploying digital technologies to strengthen the identification, tracing and isolation of contacts, and to provide support to those who test positive.

src_text: namate ons die hoogtepunt van infeksies nader, moet ons meer voorsorg tref en bestaande maatreëls verskerp om die oordragtempo te vertraag.
tgt_text: as we now approach the peak of infections, we need to take extra precautions and tighten existing measures to slow down the rate of transmission.

src_text: die regulasies oor die dra van maskers word verskerp.
tgt_text: regulations on the wearing of masks will be strengthened.

src_text: werkgewers, winkeleienaars en bestuurders, openbare vervoeroperateurs en bestuurders, sowel as eienaars van enige ander openbare gebou is nou wetlik verplig om te sorg dat elkeen wat hul perseel of voertuig betree, 'n masker moet dra.
tgt_text: employers, shop owners and managers, public transport operators, and managers and owners of any other public building are now legally obliged to ensure that anyone entering their premises or vehicle must be wearing a mask.

src_text: taxi’s wat plaaslike reise onderneem, sal nou toegelaat word om hul kapasiteit tot 100 persent te verhoog, terwyl langafstandtaxi's nie toegelaat sal word om 70 persent besetting te oorskry nie, op voorwaarde dat nuwe protokolle vir risikovermindering wat met maskers, ontsmetting van voertuie en oop vensters verband hou, gevolg word.
tgt_text: taxis undertaking local trips will now be permitted to increase their capacity to 100 percent, while long distance taxis will not be allowed to exceed 70 percent occupancy, on condition that new risk mitigation protocols related to masks, vehicle sanitising and open windows are followed.

src_text: duidelike bewyse het nou aan die lig gekom dat die hervatting van alkoholverkope daartoe gelei het dat hospitale, insluitend traumaen intensiewesorgeenhede, onder aansienlike druk geplaas is weens motorongelukke, geweld en ander alkoholverwante trauma.
tgt_text: there is now clear evidence that the resumption of alcohol sales has resulted in substantial pressure being put on hospitals, including trauma and icu units, due to motor vehicle accidents, violence and related trauma.

src_text: ons het derhalwe besluit om die verbod op die verkoop en verspreiding van alkohol weer in te stel om die druk op hospitaalkapasiteit te verlig.
tgt_text: we have therefore decided that in order to conserve hospital capacity, the sale, dispensing and distribution of alcohol will be suspended with immediate effect.

src_text: as 'n bykomende maatreël om die druk op hospitale te verminder, sal 'n aandklokreël tussen 21:00 en 04:00 van krag wees.
tgt_text: as an additional measure to reduce the pressure on hospitals, a curfew will be put in place between the hours of 9pm and 4am.

src_text: ons is ten volle bewus daarvan dat die instelling van hierdie maatreëls onwelkome beperkings op mense se alledaagse lewens plaas.
tgt_text: we are taking these measures fully aware that they impose unwelcome restrictions on people’s lives.

src_text: dit is egter noodsaaklik om ons deur die hoogtepunt van die siekte te dra.
tgt_text: they are, however, necessary to see us through the peak of the disease.

src_text: daar is geen manier hoe ons die aanslag van die koronavirus kan vryspring nie.
tgt_text: there is no way that we can avoid the coronavirus storm.

src_text: maar ons kan die skade wat dit in ons lewens kan aanrig, beperk.
tgt_text: but we can limit the damage that it can cause to our lives.

src_text: ons het as 'n nasie saamgestaan om mekaar te ondersteun, om troos te bied aan siekes en om aanvaarding vir dié wat nog die virus het, te bevorder.
tgt_text: as a nation we have come together to support each other, to provide comfort to those who are ill and to promote acceptance of people living with the virus.

src_text: nou, meer as ooit tevore, is ons verantwoordelik vir die lewens van diegene rondom ons.
tgt_text: now, more than ever, we are responsible for the lives of those around us.

src_text: ons sal hierdie storm oorleef.
tgt_text: we will weather this storm.

src_text: ons sal toesien dat ons land weer gesond en voorspoedig word.
tgt_text: we will restore our country to health and to prosperity.

src_text: ons sal oorwin.
tgt_text: help stop the spread of covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed our nation is con fronted by the gravest crisis in the history of our democracy.

src_text: vereer vroue deurvereer vroue deurekonomiese insluitingekonomiese insluiting vukuzenzele unnamed suidafrika vier in augustus vrouemaand.
tgt_text: celebrating women through economic inclusion vukuzenzele unnamed in august south africa celebrates women’s month.

src_text: dié geleentheid is die herdenking van die dag in 1956 toe 20 000 vroue na die uniegebou opgemars het — n see van vroue van alle rasse, wat verskillende tale gepraat het en uit verskillende oorde gekom het.
tgt_text: this occasion marks the anniversary of the day in 1956 when 20,000 women marched to the union buildings – a great sea of womankind speaking many languages, from different places and of all races.

src_text: hulle was verenig in hulle aandrang op die einde van die aaklige paswette en vir hulle reg om in vryheid te lewe.
tgt_text: they were united in their demand for an end to the dreaded pass laws and for their right to live in freedom.

src_text: die huidige status en posisie van vroue in suidafrika is heeltemal anders as wat ons ma's en ouma's in 1956 in die gesig moes staar.
tgt_text: the status and position of women in south africa today is vastly different to that faced by our mothers and grandmothers in 1956. we have come a long way in realising a south africa that is nonracial, nonsexist, democratic, prosperous and free.

src_text: ons het ver gekom om n suidafrika te verwesenlik wat nierassig, nieseksisties, demokraties, vooruitstrewend en vry is.
tgt_text: there has been real progress in improving the lives of south african women in the economy, in the political sphere and in public life.

src_text: daadwerklike vordering is gemaak om suidafrikaanse vroue se lewens ekonomies, politieties en in die openbare lewe te verbeter.
tgt_text: at the same time, we know there is so much further we still have to go.

src_text: maar ons is bewus daarvan dat daar nog heelwat vordering gemaak moet word.
tgt_text: women still face discrimination, harassment and violence, and bear the greatest brunt of poverty.

src_text: vroue staar steeds diskriminasie, teistering en geweld in die gesig en dra die grootste las van armoede.
tgt_text: if we are to truly realise the promise of our constitution we have to tackle the economic and financial exclusion that makes women more vulnerable to abuse and violence.

src_text: as ons die belofte wat in ons grondwet vervat is wil verwesenlik, moet ons die ekonomiese en finansiële uitsluiting wat vroue meer kwesbaar vir mishandeling en geweld maak, die hoof bied.
tgt_text: we have joined a groundbreaking campaign that links us to global efforts to achieve gender equality by 2030. generation equality is an ambitious and transformative agenda to end discrimination and violence against women and for their equal participation in political, social and economic life.

src_text: ons het by ’n baanbrekerveldtog aangesluit wat ons met globale pogings om teen 2030 geslagsgelykheid te bereik, verbind.
tgt_text: as part of this campaign, we have joined two ‘action coalitions’, one for economic justice and rights and another against genderbased violence.

tgt_text: both of these themes are critical to our own national agenda.

src_text: albei is kernbelangrik vir ons eie nasionale agenda.

tgt_text: as we prepare for the reconstruction of our economy in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic, we have said that we cannot simply return to where we were before the outbreak of the virus.

tgt_text: we must build a fundamentally different economy which, among other things, substantially improves the material position of women.

tgt_text: this means that our investment in infrastructure must support not only the development of local industry, but also womenowned businesses.

tgt_text: it is up to transport operators, university administrators, school governing bodies and religious organisations to create conditions for women and girls to travel, study and worship in safety.

tgt_text: we must forge ahead with our efforts to eradicate chauvinism, sexism and patriarchy.

src_text: vroue moet ook teen teistering en diskriminasie in die werkplek beskerm word.
tgt_text: it is these attitudes that enable the oppression of women.

tgt_text: it is up to us – both men and women – to affirm that a woman’s value, position and opinions are no less than that of a man.
