tgt_text: it is a means by which democracy is secured and upheld.

src_text: ons media het tydens dié pandemie nie net sy tradisio nele waghondrol vervul nie, maar ook sy burgerlike plig nagekom deur die nasionale poging om die koronavirus in toom te hou, te ondersteun.
tgt_text: during this pandemic, our media has played not just its traditional watchdog role, but exercised its civic duty in supporting the national effort to contain the coronavirus.

src_text: gegewe die belangrikheid van die media vir ons demo krasie se gesondheid, is dit n ernstige bron van kommer dat, soos alle ander sektore van die ekonomie, die ko ronavirus ook ’n negatiewe uitwerking op ons media huise gehad het.
tgt_text: given the importance of the media to the health of our democracy, it is a great concern that like all other sectors of the economy, the coronavirus crisis has hit our media houses hard.

src_text: sommige publikasies het aan die begin van die inperking soveel as 60 persent van hul inkomste verloor.
tgt_text: some publications lost as much as 60 percent of their income in the early days of the lockdown.

src_text: verskeie maatskap pye moes salarisse besnoei, en personeel of werksure verminder.
tgt_text: a number of companies have had to implement salary cuts, reduce staff numbers or reduce hours worked.

src_text: ongelukkig is sommige publikasies waar onder van suidafrika se mees gevestigde en bekende tydskriftitels, genoodsaak om toe te maak.
tgt_text: regrettably, some publications have even been forced to close, among them some of south africa’s most established and wellknown magazine titles.

src_text: die werksverliese as gevolg van die inperking het n kri sis vir mediamaatskappye wat reeds uitdagings soos die verlies aan advertensieinkomste, dalende sirkulasie en markaandeel wat deur vars nuus op mobiele toestelle en ander tegnologieë vervang is, vererger.
tgt_text: the job losses that have resulted from the lockdowns have exacerbated a crisis for media companies already facing challenges like loss of advertising revenues, falling circulation and market share being taken by mobilefirst news and other technologies.

src_text: sulke finansiële hindernisse word algemeen, van aanlynpublikasies en tra disionele breëbladkoerante, tot die openbare uitsaaier, in die gesig gestaar.
tgt_text: these financial difficulties are being faced across the board, from online titles to traditional broadsheets to the public broadcaster.

src_text: dit was een van die sleu telkwessies wat tydens my vergadering met die suidafrikaanse nasionale redakteursforum geopper is.
tgt_text: this was one of the issues that was raised sharply during my engagement with the south african national editors’ forum recently.

src_text: in plaas daarvan dat hul le hul lot betreur, werk die mediabedryf egter hard om besigheidsmodelle te verfyn, om innovering aan te dryf en soveel personeel as moontlik te behou.
tgt_text: instead of lamenting their fate, however, the media industry is working hard to refine business models, to drive innovation and to retain staff as much as possible.

src_text: die media is terselfdertyd n unieke entiteit in enige same lewing omdat sy praktisyns n rol vervul wat noodsaaklik vir ons demokratiese orde is.
tgt_text: at the same time, the media is a unique entity in any society because its practitioners fulfil a role that is so essential to our democratic order.

src_text: hulle werk om die publiek in te lig en die mag in toom te hou.
tgt_text: they work to keep the public informed and to keep power in check.

src_text: ons het meer joernaliste nodig, nie minder nie.
tgt_text: we need more journalists, not less.

src_text: dit is waarom die verlies aan selfs n enkele joernalis nie net n verlies vir die bedryf is nie, maar ook vir die land.
tgt_text: that is why the loss of even a single journalist is not just a loss to the industry but to the country.

src_text: ons het ons mediaveterane nodig omdat hulle wye erva ring en institusionele geheue, sowel as kritiese verslag gewing en ingeligte analise kan bied.
tgt_text: we need our media veterans, who bring with them vast experience and institutional memory, and are able to offer critical reportage and informed analysis.

src_text: ons het terself dertyd meer jong joernaliste in die beroep nodig wat tegnologieslim is, op hoogte is van nuwe tendense rakende storievertelling en in voeling is met n jeugdige bevolking se belange.
tgt_text: at the same time we need more young journalists in the profession who are techsavvy, abreast with new trends in storytelling and in touch with the concerns of a youthful population.

src_text: ons, as n samelewing, is ons volle ondersteuning aan die media verskuldig.
tgt_text: as a society we owe the media our full support.

src_text: ons kan almal ons deel doen om dié bedryf wat n krisis ervaar, te ondersteun, hetsy deur te kies om vir inhoud te betaal, skare befondsde joernalisme te ondersteun, ons sauklisen siefooie te betaal of eenvou dig n koerant te koop.
tgt_text: whether it is electing to pay for content, supporting crowdfunded journalism, paying our sabc license fees or simply buying a newspaper, we can all play our part to support this industry in crisis.

src_text: as die regering, sal ons ondanks die somber ekonomiese klimaat, steeds adverteringbesteding aan publikasies en uitsaaiers, veral gemeenskapsmedia, uitbrei.
tgt_text: as government, despite the gloomy economic climate we will continue to extend advertising spend to publications and broadcasters, especially community media.

src_text: die privaatsektor moet ook steeds die bedryf ondersteun deur advertensies en deur saam met mediahuise te werk rakende die produksie van innoverende inhoud, in ooreenstemming met globale mediatendense.
tgt_text: the private sector must also continue to support the industry through advertising and working with media houses in the production of innovative content in line with global media trends.

src_text: plaaslike filantropiese en skenkersorga nisasies behoort ook betrokke te raak en openbare belange joernalismeondernemings te ondersteun, soos wat die geval in baie demokrasieë is.
tgt_text: local philanthropic and donor organisations should also come on board and support public interest journalism ventures, as is the case in many democracies.

src_text: die verspreiding van vals nuus tydens die pandemie, hoofsaaklik op sosiale me diaplatforms, het bygedra tot die noodsaaklikheid vir meer nuus wat akkuraat, regverdig en onpartydig is.
tgt_text: the proliferation of fake news during the pandemic, primarily on social media platforms, has added to the urgency for more news that is accurate, fair and impartial.

src_text: ons mense het in dié tyd staatgemaak op ons gevestigde mediahuise vir inligting, wat weereens hul noodsaaklike rol as steun pilare vir ons demokrasie beklemtoon.
tgt_text: during this time our people have relied on our established media houses for information, once again underscoring their importance as pillars of our democracy.

src_text: namate ons die groot taak aanpak om ons ekonomie in die nadraai van die pandemie te herbou, sal die mediabedryf ons ondersteuning meer as ooit tevore nodig hê.
tgt_text: as we begin the great task of rebuilding our economy in the aftermath of the pandemic, the media industry will need our support more than ever.

src_text: die vrye pers is al beskryf as 'die waaksame beskermer van elke reg wat vrye mans en vroue op prys stel.'
tgt_text: the free press was once described as ‘the unsleeping guardian of every other right that free men and women prize’.

src_text: terwyl ons hulde bring aan die vrye en diverse media se rol in hierdie pandemie, moet ons doen wat ons kan om te verse ker dat hulle in ons land kan oorleef en floreer.

tgt_text: transforming the agricultural sector vukuzenzele unnamed recently, the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development (dalrrd) announced that members of the public will be able to apply to lease 700 000 hectares of underutilised or vacant state land in seven of the provinces.

src_text: landbougrond is die hoof steun van ons natuurlike hulpbronbasis.
tgt_text: agricultural land is the mainstay of our natural resource base.

src_text: die beskikbaarheid en volhoubare gebruik van landbougrond waarop gewasse aangeplant kan word en vir veeteelt is van kardinale belang vir ons oorlewing.
tgt_text: the availability and sustainable use of farmland to grow crops and for animal husbandry is key to our very survival.

src_text: suidafrika het wyd uitgestrekte grondoppervlakke wat geskik is vir landbouproduksie, met net 37,9% van ons totale landoppervlakte wat tans vir kommersiële landbou gebruik word.
tgt_text: south africa has vast tracts of land suitable for agricultural production, with 37,9% of our total land area currently being used for commercial agriculture.

src_text: ons bewerkbare grond word, soos in baie ander lande, bedreig deur grondverswakking, waterskaarste en stedelike indringing.
tgt_text: like many other countries, our arable land is under threat from land degradation, water scarcity and urban encroachment.

src_text: ons verloor ook puik landbou grond deur veranderings in grondgebruik.
tgt_text: we are also losing prime agricultural land through landuse changes.

src_text: gegewe ons geskiedenis, is die verbreding van toegang tot landbougrond vir kommersiële produksie en bestaansboerdery, n nasionale prioriteit.
tgt_text: given our history, broadening access to agricultural land for commercial production and subsistence farming is a national priority.

src_text: hoewel die grondhervormingsproses na 1994 daartoe gelei het dat meer grond aan swart suidafrikaners teruggegee en herstel is, leef die skadelike uitwerking van die wet op naturelle grond van 1913 steeds voort in patrone van landbougrondeienaarskap.
tgt_text: although the post1994 land reform process has resulted in more land being restored and restituted to black south africans, the pernicious effects of the 1913 natives land act continue to be in patterns of farmland ownership.

src_text: die wet het baie verder gestrek as die onteiening van miljoene mense se voorvadersgrond.
tgt_text: the act went far beyond dispossessing millions of people of their ancestral land.

src_text: die uitwerking van ons verlede duur steeds voort deur grondeienaarskap wat steeds meestal in besit van die minderheid is, en landbou primêre produksie en waardekettings wat hoofsaaklik deur wit kommersiële boere besit word.
tgt_text: with land ownership still concentrated in the hands of the few, and agriculture primary production and value chains mainly owned by white commercial farmers, the effects of our past remain with us today.

src_text: die voortgesette monopolisasie van n belangrike produksiemetode soos grondverwerking, is nie net n hindernis tot die bevordering van n meer gelykmakende samelewing nie; dit is ook n resep vir maatskaplike onrus.
tgt_text: the continued monopolization of a key means of production like land is not just an obstacle to advancing a more egalitarian society; it is also a recipe for social unrest.

src_text: die hunkering na grond om te bewerk neem toe, veral onder arm landelike mense.
tgt_text: the hunger for land to farm is growing, especially amongst the rural poor.

src_text: en die tempo van grondhervorming in dié spesifieke sektor is, om verskeie redes, stadig en onbevredigend.
tgt_text: and for a number of reasons, the pace of land reform in this particular sector has been slow and unsatisfactory.

src_text: transformerende patrone van landbougrondeienaar skap is noodsaaklik om nie net die geskiedkundige ongeregtighede van die verlede die hoof te bied nie, maar ook om ons nasie se voedselsekerheid, te beveilig.
tgt_text: transforming patterns of agricultural land ownership is vital not just to address the historical injustices of the past, but to safeguard our nation’s food security.

src_text: volgens die 2019 verslag van die presidensiële raadgewende paneel oor grondhervor ming en landbou, "het 41% van mense in ons landelike gebiede en 59,4% in stedelike gebiede in ons land ernstige onvoldoende toegang tot voedsel, hoewel ons voedsel uitvoer".
tgt_text: as noted in the 2019 report of the presidential advisory panel on land reform and agriculture, "whilst we export food, back home 41% of people in rural areas and 59,4% in urban areas have severely inadequate access to food."

src_text: landbouhervorming was sedert demokrasie n prioriteit van opeenvolgende regerings.
tgt_text: agrarian reform has been a priority of successive administrations since democracy.

src_text: tussen 1994 en maart 2018, het die staat deur die grondhervormingsprogram 8,4 mil joen hektaar grond aan voor heen benadeelde individue gelewer.
tgt_text: between 1994 and march 2018 the state has delivered 8,4 million hectares of land to previously disadvantaged individuals under the land reform programme.

src_text: vordering beloop egter minder as 10% van alle kommersiële landbougrond.
tgt_text: but this progress amounts to less than 10% of all commercial farmland.

src_text: in my staatsrede vroeër vanjaar, het ek my daartoe verbind om landbougrond wat deur die staat besit word binnekort vir boerdery beskikbaar te stel.
tgt_text: in my state of the nation address earlier this year i committed that stateowned agricultural land would soon be released for farming.

src_text: dit is n belangrike mylpaal in die landbouhervormingsproses en gee uitvoering aan die vryheidsmanifes se belofte dat die grond onder diegene wat dit bewerk, verdeel sal word.
tgt_text: this is a major milestone in the agrarian reform process, and gives effect to the promise of the freedom charter that the land shall be shared among those who work it.

src_text: ons herverspreidingsvisie poog om die regte balans tussen maatskaplike ongeregtigheid en regstelling te vind en om landbouuitsette te bevorder deur meer swart boere tot die hoofstroomekonomie te laat toetree.
tgt_text: our redistributive vision aims to strike a balance between social justice and redress, and enhancing agricultural output by bringing more black farmers into the mainstream of the economy.

src_text: grond is n produktiewe bate wat wins genereer en vir kollateraal gebruik kan word om ander bates te verkry.
tgt_text: land is a productive asset that generates profit and can be used for collateral to secure other assets.

src_text: ons moet ook verseker dat grond wat vir boerderydoeleindes verkry word, produktief gebruik word.
tgt_text: we have to ensure that land acquired for farming purposes is productively used.

src_text: om die toegekende stuk grond vir boerderydoeleindes te beskerm, is die huurreg nie oordraagbaar nie.
tgt_text: to safeguard the allocated state land for farming purposes, the lease is not transferrable.

tgt_text: beneficiaries will sign a lease agreement with the state and pay a rental fee consistent with the land value.

tgt_text: we must also ensure that farmers are supported along the road to sustainability and profitability.

src_text: as deel van die program, sal begunstigdes opleiding in finansiële bestuur en ondernemingsontwikkeling ontvang.
tgt_text: as part of this programme, beneficiaries will be trained in financial management and enterprise development.

src_text: daar is bewysbare sukses met die bemagtiging van vroulike boere onder die bestaande proaktiewe grondverkrygingstrategie (pgvs).

tgt_text: in addition to the land acquisition itself, the department continues to invest in infrastructure, equipment and machinery to enable these entrepreneurs to run successful businesses.

tgt_text: the ultimate goal of releasing these land parcels is to transform the agricultural landscape by growing a new generation of farmers.

tgt_text: leasing land under such favourable conditions must spur them to think big; to not just grow their own businesses but to advance shared wealth and prosperity in the communities in which they farm.

tgt_text: they must heal the deep divisions of our past.

tgt_text: building a society that works vukuzenzele unnamed the launch of the presidential employment stimulus last week marks a fundamental shift in our ap proach to tackling unem ployment.

src_text: ons onderneem n verryken de en ambisieuse openbare belegging in menslike kapitaal, met die staat as beide die skepper en instaatsteller van werksgeleenthede.
tgt_text: we are undertaking a farreaching and ambitious public investment in human capital, with the state as both a creator and an enabler of jobs.

tgt_text: the presidential employment stimulus is unprecedented in its scale and breadth, involving a public investment of r100 billion over the next three years.

tgt_text: we will protect and create directlyfunded jobs and livelihood support interventions while the labour market recovers from the coronavirus pandemic.

src_text: elkeen hiervan is gereed om geïmplementeer te word en is bykomend tot bestaande verpligtinge.
tgt_text: each of these is ready for implementation, and is additional to existing commitments.

src_text: terwyl sommige van die ingrypings voortbou op die sterkpunte van bestaande programme, sluit die stimulus ook nuwe en innoverende benaderings in.
tgt_text: while some of the interventions build on the strengths of existing programmes, the stimulus also includes new and innovative approaches.

src_text: dit sluit n fokus in op wat ons 'maatskaplike indiensneming' noem.
tgt_text: this includes a focus on what we have termed ‘social employment’.

src_text: ons gaan van die veronderstelling uit dat daar geen tekort aan werk is wat gedoen moet word om die magdom maatskaplike probleme in ons samelewing op te los nie.
tgt_text: we are working from the premise that there is no shortage of work to be done to address the many social problems in our society.

src_text: die doelwit is om die aansienlike kreatiwiteit, inisiatief en institusionele vermoëns te ondersteun wat in die breër samelewing bestaan, om mense te betrek by werk wat die algemene belang dien.
tgt_text: the aim is to support the considerable creativity, initiative and institutional capabilities that exist in the wider society to engage people in work that serves the common good.

src_text: dié werk dek n wye verskeidenheid temas, insluitend voedselsekerheid, die beëindiging van geslagsgebaseerde geweld, opgradering van informele nedersettings en baie meer.
tgt_text: this work cuts across a range of themes, including food security, ending genderbased violence, informal settlement upgrading and much more.

tgt_text: this will supplement the efforts of the public sector, allowing for greater scale and social impact as well as new forms of partnership with diverse social actors.

tgt_text: the stimulus includes a new national programme to employ teaching and school assistants in schools.

src_text: skole doen nou reeds dié aanstellings en bied nuwe geleenthede in elke gemeenskap oor die lengte en breedte van die land.
tgt_text: schools are making these appointments right now, delivering new opportunities in every community across the length and breadth of the country.

src_text: openbare indiensneming het nie net op ongeskoolde werk betrekking nie.
tgt_text: public employment is not just for unskilled work.

tgt_text: there is a crosscutting focus on graduates, with opportunities for nurses, science graduates, artisans and others.

tgt_text: the stimulus will also protect jobs in vulnerable sectors that have been hit hard by the pandemic.

tgt_text: as a nation, we need arts and culture to lift our spirits once more – the stimulus provides new funding to help the sector back onto its feet, including support to digital contentcreation and expansion of ecommerce platforms.

src_text: dit sal kunstenaars in staat stel om aan te pas by die nuwe marktoestande wat die pandemie op ons afgedwing het en om nuwe geleenthede vir groei aan te gryp.
tgt_text: this will enable artists to adapt to the new market conditions that the pandemic has imposed on us all and to seize new opportunities for growth.

tgt_text: a critical enabler for wider job creation, made more important by the pandemic, is connectivity.

tgt_text: to overcome the digital divide, the stimulus will provide affordable, highspeed broadband to lowincome households through innovative connection subsidies and the expansion of free public wifi.

src_text: ons betwyfel geensins die omvang van die taak wat voorlê namate ons land herstel van die verwoesting van die koronaviruspandemie nie.
tgt_text: as our country recovers from the devastation of the coronavirus pandemic, we are in no doubt as to the size of the task before us.

src_text: ons moet n ekonomiese herstelpunt bereik wat vinnig en inklusief is.
tgt_text: we have to achieve an economic recovery that is swift and inclusive.

src_text: ons moet soveel moontlik van ons mense weer aan die werk kry.
tgt_text: we have to get as many of our people as possible working again.

src_text: ons moet ook verlore veld herwin betreffende die verskaffing van basiese dienste en kritieke infrastruktuur, wat maat skaplike uitdagings aanpak en townships en landelike gemeenskappe transformeer.
tgt_text: we also have to regain lost ground in the provision of basic services and critical infrastructure, addressing social challenges and transforming townships and rural communities too.

tgt_text: public employment is an instrument that can do all of the above: creating jobs at scale in the short term while markets recover, and creating social value in the process.

tgt_text: the example is often cited of the massive public works programme undertaken by the united states after the great depression in the 1930s.

src_text: dit was nie net n stimulus nie, maar het ook maatskaplike deelname en insluiting behels.
tgt_text: this was not just a stimulus, but also promoted social participation and inclusion.

src_text: daar is verskeie voorbeelde van innoverende openbare werkskeppingsprogramme in die ontwikkelende wêreld, insluitend indië, etiopië en hier in suidafrika.
tgt_text: there are several examples of innovative public employment programmes in the developing world, including in india, ethiopia and here in south africa.

src_text: dié programme maak n direkte beleg ging in plaaslike ekonomieë, wat eerstens armer gebiede bereik en plaaslike klein ondernemings ondersteun en van daar af deursyfer na die breër ekonomie.
tgt_text: these programmes make a direct investment in local economies, reaching poorer areas first, supporting local small enterprises and trickling up into the wider economy from there.

src_text: sulke programme bevorder ook maatskaplike deelname en insluiting, wat aan gemeenskappe die middele verskaf om hulle lewens te verander namate hulle nuwe tipes werk onderneem.
tgt_text: they also promote social participation and inclusion, providing communities with the means to change their lives as they undertake new forms of work.

src_text: sodoende dra hulle by tot die transformasie op beide plaaslike vlak en in die breër samelewing.
tgt_text: in doing so, they contribute to transformation both at a local level and within broader society.

src_text: direkte openbare belegging om indiensneming te ondersteun en ekonomiese geleenthede te skep wat maatskaplike waarde genereer, doen meer as om net die werkloosheidskrisis aan te pak.
tgt_text: direct public investment to support employment and create economic opportunities that generate social value does more than just tackle the unemployment crisis.

src_text: dit is responsief, want dit gebruik die staat se hulpbronne om op plaaslike gemeenskapsbehoeftes te reageer, hetsy vir groener ruimtes, voedselsekerheid, nog meer vroeë kinderontwikkelingsentrums, of beter en meer toeganklike paaie.
tgt_text: it is responsive, because it uses the state’s resources to respond to local community needs, be it for greener spaces, food security, more early childhood development centres, or for better and more accessible roads.

src_text: dit is progressief, want dit bied maatskaplike beskerming en inkomstesekerheid aan diegene wat armoede in die gesig staar omdat hulle nie werk kan kry nie.
tgt_text: it is progressive, because it offers social protection and income security to those who face destitution because they are unable to find work.

src_text: dit is n belegging in die toekoms, omdat dit die breër ekonomie se herstelagenda ondersteun deur dringend ons mense aan die werk te kry om ons nasionale en munisipale infrastruktuur te verbeter.
tgt_text: it is an investment in the future, in that it supports the broader economic recovery agenda by urgently getting our people to work on improving our national and municipal infrastructure.

src_text: deur middel van die ingrypings in die stimulus skep ons werk vir diegene wat dit nodig het, terwyl dit n blywende impak op gemeenskappe laat.
tgt_text: through the interventions in the stimulus, we are creating work for those who need it, while leaving a lasting impact on entire communities.

src_text: net soos openbare diensprogramme wêreldwyd, ondersteun en vul die indiensnemingstimulus die kritieke rol van die privaatsektor in werkskepping aan.
tgt_text: like public employment programmes across the world, this employment stimulus supports and complements the critical role of the private sector in creating jobs.

src_text: dit is teensiklies omdat, namate die herstelproses vorder, die skaal van openbare indiensneming sal afneem.
tgt_text: it is countercyclical, in that as the recovery advances, the scale of public employment will decline.

src_text: die werkservaring en vaardighede wat deur begunstig des van die presidensiële in diensnemingstimulus benodig word, sal hulle vooruitsigte om formele werk te verkry, verbeter.
tgt_text: the work experience and skills acquired by beneficiaries of the presidential employment stimulus will improve their prospects of securing formal employment.

src_text: die ervaring wat opgedoen word, bied ook n pad na entrepreneursaktiwiteit.
tgt_text: the experience gained is also a pathway to entrepreneurial activity.

src_text: deelne mers sal hulle vaardighede en vermoëns om hulle eie besighede te begin, verbeter en kan die vaste inkomste wat deur die openbare indiensneming verskaf word gebruik om na ander inkomstegenererende aktiwiteite uit te brei.
tgt_text: participants will improve their skills and capabilities to start their own businesses, and can use the steady income provided by public employment to branch out into other incomegenerating activities.

src_text: ek het deurentyd bevestig dat die covid19krisis ook n geleentheid bied om ons samelewing weer beter op te bou.
tgt_text: i have consistently affirmed that the covid19 crisis is also a window of opportunity to build back better.

src_text: ons sal, in hierdie tyd van groot omwenteling, onsself geen guns bewys deur onrealistiese beloftes te maak wat verwagtinge skep, net om tekort te skiet wanneer dit nie realiseer nie.
tgt_text: at this time of great upheaval, we would be doing ourselves no favours by making unrealistic promises that raise expectations, only to come short when they are not met.

src_text: dit is waarom elkeen van die betrekkings en bestaansondersteuning ten volle befonds word, tesame met n duidelike implementeringsplan.
tgt_text: this is why each of the jobs and livelihood support interventions is fully funded, with a clear implementation plan.

src_text: die indiensnemingstimulus gaan nie oor vae verpligtinge vir eendag in die toekoms nie, maar oor werk wat hier en nou geskep word.
tgt_text: the employment stimulus is not about vague commitments for some time in the future, but about jobs being created right here and now.

src_text: die stimulus is die resultaat van uitgebreide oorlegpleging met nasionale departemente, provinsies en metrorade om vinnig indiensnemingprogramme te skep wat binne ses maande bekendgestel en uitgebrei kan word.
tgt_text: the stimulus is the result of extensive consultation with national departments, provinces and metros to rapidly design employment pro grammes that can be rolled out or expanded within six months.

src_text: die implementeringsdepartemente en ander belanghebbendes is streng geassesseer op grond van hulle implementeringskapasiteit.
tgt_text: the implementing departments and other stakeholders were rigorously assessed on their capacity to implement.

src_text: in elkeen van die programme wat deel uitmaak van die stimulus, sal geleenthede wyd geadverteer word en werwing sal regverdig, oop en deursigtig wees.
tgt_text: in every one of the programmes that fall under the stimulus, opportunities will be widely advertised and recruitment will be fair, open and transparent.

src_text: die doelwitte wat ons vir onsself gestel het is realisties, meetbaar en bereikbaar en put uit vorige ervaring en internasionale beste praktyk.
tgt_text: the goals we have set ourselves are realistic, measura ble and achievable, and draw lessons from past experience and international best prac tice.

src_text: ons mense is gereed en gewillig om te werk.
tgt_text: our people are ready and willing to work.

src_text: hierdie geweldige potensiaal moet benut word en ons kollektiewe vaardighede en vermoëns moet aangewend word om ons land in die nasleep van die koronavirus te herbou.
tgt_text: this vast potential must be harnessed, and our collective skills and capabilities brought to bear in rebuilding our country in the wake of the coronavirus.

src_text: die presidensiële indiensnemingstimulus verskaf verligting aan gesinne wat n lang, moeilike winter verduur het, met inkomste wat baie verminder het en vir individue wat reeds baie jare sonder werk moes oorleef.
tgt_text: the presidential employment stimulus provides a respite for families who have endured a long hard winter with greatly reduced income, and for individuals who have spent many years without work.

src_text: regte, behoorlike werk is elke mens se reg.
tgt_text: real, decent work is the right of every human being.

src_text: dit is n voorwaarde vir ekonomiese groei en maatskaplike stabiliteit.
tgt_text: it is a precondition for economic growth and social stability.

src_text: die presidensiële indiensnemingstimulus lewer n deurslaggewende bydrae tot die ontwikkeling van n samelewing wat werk, deur uiting aan dié fundamentele reg te gee.
tgt_text: building a society that works vukuzenzele unnamed the launch of the presidential employment stimulus last week marks a fundamental shift in our ap proach to tackling unem ployment.

src_text: herstel in die vooruitsig vir sa vukuzenzele unnamed jakarandabome is oral in die land se hoof stad in volle blom, wat aandui dat die somer aangebreek het.
tgt_text: recovery on the horizon for sa vukuzenzele unnamed the jacaranda trees are in full bloom across the nation’s capital, heralding the start of summer.

src_text: na 'n lang en moeilike winter behoort die begin van 'n nuwe sei soen ons met optimisme te vervul.
tgt_text: after a long and difficult winter, the beginning of a new season should fill us with optimism.

src_text: toe die nasionale ramptoe stand in maart afgekondig is, was ons onmiddellike prioriteit om die versprei ding van die virus te beperk en noodleniging aan burgers, gemeenskappe, werkers en sakeondernemings te bied.
tgt_text: when the national state of disaster was declared in march, our immediate priority was to contain the spread of the virus and provide emergency relief to citizens, communities, workers and businesses.

src_text: deur die loop van agt maan de en met die ondersteuning van ons maatskaplike ven note het ons 'n omvattende stel maatreëls ingestel om die sosiale en ekonomiese impak van die pandemie te beperk.
tgt_text: over the course of eight months and with the support of our social partners, we rolled out a comprehensive set of measures to limit the social and economic impact of the pandemic.

src_text: ons het maatskaplike steun op ’n ongekende skaal wat nog nooit voorheen in die land gesien is nie, uitgebrei.
tgt_text: we massively expanded social protection on a scale that has never been attempted before in this country.

src_text: ons is een van die min lande ter wêreld waar die reg op toegang tot maatskaplike se kerheid in die grondwet ver vat is, en ons kan trots wees dat ons gedurende hierdie ernstige krisis op baie ma niere praktiese uitdrukking aan hierdie reg gegee het.
tgt_text: we are one of the few countries in the world where the right of access to social security is enshrined in the constitution, and we can be proud that during this grave crisis we gave practical expression to this right in many ways.

src_text: benewens ons bestaande maatskaplike toelaes, wat elke maand meer as 17 mil joen mense bereik, het ons die ouderdoms, ongeskiktheidsen kinderonderhoudstoelae aangevul.
tgt_text: in addition to our existing social grants, which reach more than 17 million people every month, we toppedup the old age, disability and child support grants.

src_text: ons het ook 'n spesiale covid19 maats kaplike noodverligtingstoe lae ingestel, wat tot dusver ses miljoen mense bereik het.
tgt_text: we rolled out a special coronavirus disease (covid19) social relief of distress grant, which has reached some six million people to date.

src_text: dit is gedoen binne ’n paar weke nadat die ramptoestand verklaar is.
tgt_text: this was done within weeks of the national state of disaster being declared.

src_text: die omvang van so 'n on derneming kan nie onderskat word nie.
tgt_text: the scale of such an undertaking cannot be understated.

src_text: om hierdie stelsel aanlyn te bring, het omvat tende samewerking tussen die suidafrikaanse agents kap vir maatskaplike seker heid, die suidafrikaanse inkomstediens, binnelandse sake en talle ander instansies geverg.
tgt_text: to bring this system online there was extensive collaboration between the south african social security agency, south african revenue service, home affairs and many others.

src_text: ons het 'n ten volle outomatiese aansoekenuitbetalingsproses opgestel en veelvuldige databasisse geïntegreer, insluitend die nasionale bevolkingsregister en die databasis van die werk loosheidsversekeringsfonds (uif).
tgt_text: we set up a fully automated application and disbursement process, and integrated multiple databases, including the national population register and the unemployment insurance fund (uif) database.

src_text: ons het nuwe toepas singskanale soos whatsapp en ussd ingestel en met die handelsbanke stelsels geskep om die verifikasie van bank besonderhede moontlik te maak.
tgt_text: we set up new application channels like whatsapp and ussd, and created systems with the commercial banks to enable banking detail verification.

src_text: dit is 'n merkwaardige prestasie in 'n baie kort tyd.
tgt_text: this is a remarkable achievement in a very short space of time.

src_text: behalwe die maatreëls wat ons getref het om lewenson derhoud te beskerm en te onderhou, het ons ook suk kelende ondernemings on dersteun.
tgt_text: alongside the measures we took to protect and sustain livelihoods, we also supported ailing businesses.

src_text: ons het steun aan klein ondernemings verleen in die vorm van skuldver ligting, finansiering en die uitstel van belastingbetaling, sowel as ander hulpmiddels.
tgt_text: we provided relief to small businesses in the form of debt relief, finance, tax payment deferrals and other instruments.

src_text: ons het 'n covid19leningwaarborgskema geïmplementeer om onder nemings in staat te stel om hul bedryfsuitgawes tydens die inperking te dek, en ons is tans besig om te kyk hoe hier die skema meer behoeftige ondernemings kan bereik.
tgt_text: we implemented a covid19 loan guarantee scheme to enable businesses to meet their operational expenses during the lockdown, and are currently looking at how this scheme can reach more companies in need.

src_text: ons het inkomstebes kerming aan werkers en verligting aan sakeeienaars verskaf deur middel van die hulpskema vir tydelike werkgewers wat deur die uif bestuur word.
tgt_text: we provided income protection to workers and relief to business owners through the temporary employer relief scheme administered by the uif.

src_text: al hierdie maatreëls was ’n regstreekse reaksie op 'n noodgeval en was van nature tydelik.
tgt_text: these were all in direct response to an emergency and were by nature temporary.

src_text: sommige kom nou tot 'n einde, terwyl ander verleng is terwyl die arbeidsmark herstel.
tgt_text: some are now coming to an end, while others have been extended as the labour market recovers.

src_text: die maatreëls wat ons geïm plementeer het, het daartoe bygedra om ons samelewing te beskerm teen die felle aan slae van covid19.
tgt_text: the measures we implemented went a long way towards protecting our society from the harsh winds of covid19.

src_text: die by komende toelaes het gehelp om te voorkom dat miljoene mense tot onder die voedselarmoedegrens daal.
tgt_text: the additional grants helped to prevent millions of people from falling below the food poverty line.

src_text: as ons nie ingegryp het om lewensonderhoud te verseker en sakeondernemings te red nie, sou die lewensomstan dighede van ons mense en die omstandighede van duisende ondernemings aansienlik er ger gewees het.
tgt_text: had we not intervened to secure livelihoods and save businesses, the living conditions of our people and the circumstances of thousands of businesses would have been considerably worse.

src_text: nou is ons in 'n oorgang van verligting na herstel.
tgt_text: now we are in a transition from relief to recovery.

src_text: die noodmaatreëls wat ons ingestel het, het 'n stewige grondslag gelê waarop ons ekonomie herbou kan word.
tgt_text: the emergency measures we put in place have laid a firm foundation on which to rebuild our economy.

src_text: aangesien ons fokus nou na die implementering van die ekonomiese heropbouenherstelplan verskuif, is ons prioriteit om groei te stimu leer en werk te skep.
tgt_text: as our focus now shifts to the implementation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, our priority will be to stimulate growth and create jobs.

src_text: daar is reeds op verskeie gebiede vordering gemaak.
tgt_text: there has already been progress in a number of areas.

src_text: na afloop van ons infra struktuurprojektafelronde verlede week, het ons nuwe finansieringsverbintenisse vir infrastruktuurontwikkeling verkry.
tgt_text: we are seeing new funding commitments for infrastructure development following an infrastructure project roundtable last week.

src_text: verskeie werkpro gramme onder die president se indiensnemingstimulus het reeds begin.
tgt_text: a number of employment programmes under the presidential employment stimulus have started.

src_text: ons sit ook ekonomiese hervormings voort op gebiede soos energie en telekommunikasie.
tgt_text: we are pushing ahead with economic reforms in areas such as energy and telecommunications.

src_text: planne word omgeskakel na aksie en verbintenisse word weerspieël in werkskepping en geleenthede.
tgt_text: plans are being converted to action and commitments are being reflected in jobs and opportunities.

src_text: dit is soveel te meer krities in hierdie tyd, veral met die feestyd wat aanbreek, dat ons nie ons eie ondergang moet bewerkstellig nie.
tgt_text: it is all the more critical at this time, more so with the festive season approaching, that we do not become the architects of our own undoing.

src_text: ons moet almal die uiterste waaksaamheid aan die dag lê om die virus te stuit.
tgt_text: the greatest vigilance is required from us all to keep the virus at bay.

src_text: 'n oplewing op enige skaal sal nie net ons gesondheids voordele dramaties omkeer nie.
tgt_text: a resurgence at any scale will not just dramatically reverse our health gains.

src_text: dit sal die groen lote van ekonomiese herstel wat ont kiem het, doodwurg en ons van die lente na die winter terugneem.
tgt_text: it will choke the green shoots of economic recovery that have emerged, and take us back from spring to winter.

src_text: om 'n tweede vlaag van covid19infeksies te voor kom, moet ons die riglyne vir openbare gesondheid wat in plek is, getrou nakom.
tgt_text: to prevent a second wave of covid19 infections, we must observe the public health guidelines that remain in place.

src_text: as ons nie 'n masker dra tydens sosiale byeenkomste nie, of geleenthede bywoon waar mense saamdrom, stel ons nie net onsself en ander in gevaar nie.
tgt_text: when we fail to wear a mask at a social gathering, when we attend crowded events, we are not only putting ourselves and others at risk.

src_text: ons stel ook ons ekonomiese herstel in gevaar.
tgt_text: we are also putting our economic recovery in jeopardy.

src_text: laat ons almal steeds ons kant bring.
tgt_text: let us all continue to play our part.

src_text: die positiewe optrede om 'n masker te dra, om sosiale afstand te hou en gereeld ons hande te was, het ons gehelp om die ergste gevolge van die pandemie te oorkom.
tgt_text: the positive actions of wearing a mask, of maintaining social distancing and of regular hand washing helped us overcome the worst effects of the pandemic.

src_text: dit is steeds ons beste beskerming.
tgt_text: they are still our best defence.

src_text: laat ons die opofferings onthou wat ons almal aan die begin van die inperking moes maak om die verspreiding van die virus te beperk.
tgt_text: let us remember the sacrifices we all had to make to contain the spread of the virus in the early days.

src_text: hoewel die meeste sosiale en ekonomiese aktiwiteite hervat is, moet ons steeds alle gesondheidsmaatreëls nakom.
tgt_text: even as most social and economic activity has resumed, we must still observe all the health measures.

src_text: dit is absoluut nood saaklik as ons ons ekonomie wil herbou en hierdie krisis te bowe wil kom.
tgt_text: recovery on the horizon for sa vukuzenzele unnamed the jacaranda trees are in full bloom across the nation’s capital, heralding the start of summer.

src_text: sa is besig om miv en vigs te oorwin vukuzenzele unamed kan nie te midde van ons pogings om die verwoestende koronaviruspandemie te beheer, ander openbare gesondheidsuitdagings wat ons land in die gesig staar, ignoreer nie.
tgt_text: sa overcoming hiv and aids vukuzenzele unnamed as we continue our efforts to manage the devastating coronavirus pandemic, we cannot ignore the other public health challenges that our country faces.

src_text: die land is al vir meer as drie dekades in n voortdurende stryd teen miv en vigs gewikkel, wat baie lewensverliese, swaarkry en lyding veroorsaak.
tgt_text: for more than three dec ades, our country has been engaged in an ongoing struggle against hiv and aids, which has cost many lives and caused great hardship and suffering.

src_text: baie miv, vigsen tuberkulosedienste is swaar getref deur die uitbreek van covid19, die landwye grendeltydperk en die druk op ons gesondheidsfasiliteite.
tgt_text: since the outbreak of cov id19 in the country, with the nationwide lockdown and the pressure on our health facilities, many hiv , aids and tuberculosis services have suffered.

src_text: dit hou n uitdaging in vir mense wat getoets is en met antiretrovirale behandeling begin het.
tgt_text: this has posed a challenge for people testing and starting antiretroviral treatment.

src_text: baie mense sukkel om hulle medisyne te gaan haal en minder mense het toegang tot ander dienste, soos vrywillige manlike mediese besnyding.
tgt_text: many people found it difficult to collect their medicines and fewer people accessed other services, such as voluntary male medical circumcision.

src_text: ons het terselfdertyd baie lesse uit ons openbare gesondheid se reaksie op die koronaviruspandemie geleer, wat ons stryd teen miv en tb kan versterk.
tgt_text: at the same time, there are many lessons that have been learnt from our public health response to the coronavirus pandemic that can strengthen our fight against hiv and tb.

src_text: suidafrika het steeds die grootste aantal mense ter wêreld wat met miv leef.
tgt_text: south africa continues to have the largest number of people living with hiv in the world.

src_text: dit is egter bemoedigend dat ons oor die afgelope dekade vordering gemaak deur die aantal nuwe mivinfeksies in die bevolking met byna 60% te verminder.
tgt_text: it is encouraging, however, that over the last decade we made progress in reducing the number of new hiv infections in the population by nearly 60%.

src_text: dit is ook bemoedigend dat mivinfeksies in tienermeisies en jong vroue oor die afgelope dekade aansienlik afgeneem het.
tgt_text: it is also encouraging that hiv infections in adolescent girls and young women have significantly declined in the last decade.

src_text: dit is n deurslaggewende groep, want hulle is baie meer geneig om in gevaar te wees om miv te kry.
tgt_text: this is a crucial group because they are much more likely to be at risk of getting hiv .

src_text: ons behandelingsprogram het tot n afname van 60% in die aantal sterftes as gevolg van vigs, bygedra.
tgt_text: our treatment programme has contributed to a reduction in the number of deaths due to aids by 60%.

src_text: daar is ook n groter afname in mivverwante sterftes onder jongmense.
tgt_text: there has been a greater reduction in hivrelated deaths among young people.

src_text: dit was moontlik om die aantal sterftes te verminder omdat ons, saam met ons vennote, n uitgebreide antiretrovirale program vanstapel gestuur het, wat miljoene mense wat met die siekte lewe, bereik het.
tgt_text: it was possible to reduce the number of deaths because we, together with our partners, have rolled out an extensive antiretroviral programme reaching millions of people living with the disease.

src_text: ons program om moedernakindoordrag (pmnko) van miv te voorkom het aan die begin van die dekade baie lae dekking gekry.
tgt_text: at the beginning of the decade, our programme to prevent mother to child transmission (pmtct) of hiv had very low coverage.

src_text: ons het nou een van die hoogste dekkingskoerse van pmnko in suiderafrika, wat die infeksiekoers onder kinders beduidend laat afneem het.
tgt_text: now we have one of the highest rates of coverage of pmtct in southern africa, which has substantially reduced rates of infection among children.

src_text: hoewel sterftes en nuwe infeksies afgeneem het, is ons steeds ver van die doelwit af waartoe ons onsself in 2016 verbind het, naamlik om teen 2020 n afname van 75% in mivinfeksies te bereik.
tgt_text: while we have reduced deaths and new infections, we still are far from reaching the goal we committed ourselves in 2016 of achieving a 75% reduction in hiv infections by 2020. if we succeed in doing so, we are likely to end aids as a public health threat by 2030. unfortunately, we are not there yet.

src_text: indien ons sukses behaal, sal ons vigs as n bedreiging vir openbare gesondheid waarskynlik teen 2030 kan beëindig.
tgt_text: we have to do far more to ensure that young people are empowered to prevent infections, including through changing behaviour, accessing condoms and testing regularly.

src_text: ons is ongelukkig nog nie daar nie.
tgt_text: we need to make sure that everyone who is infected has access to treatment and care.

src_text: ons moet baie meer doen om te verseker dat jongmense bemagtig word om infeksie te voorkom, insluitend deur gedragsverandering, toegang tot kondome en gereelde toetsing.
tgt_text: we need to work harder on hiv prevention among key populations, including sex workers, men who have sex with men, and people who inject drugs.

src_text: ons moet ook seker maak dat almal wat die siekte het, toegang tot behandeling en sorg het.
tgt_text: we must end the stigma and discrimination towards these populations.

src_text: ons moet harder werk aan die voorkoming van miv onder die sleutelbevolkings, waaronder sekswerkers, mans wat seks met mans het en mense wat dwelms inspuit.
tgt_text: we cannot hope to end hiv if we ignore the needs, concerns and rights of any part of our population.

src_text: ons moet die stigma en diskriminasie teen dié bevolkingsgroepe stopsit.
tgt_text: south africa needs to increase efforts to medically circumcise young men to reduce their risk of acquiring hiv .

src_text: ons kan nie poog om miv te beëindig as ons die behoeftes, belange en regte van enige deel van ons bevolking ignoreer nie.
tgt_text: unsafe circumcision should not leave young men with lifelong health problems, and no one should die from circumcision.

src_text: suidafrika moet sy pogings om jong mans medies te besny uitbrei, om hul risiko om miv op te doen, te verminder.
tgt_text: we must make sure that young men have safe circumcision.

src_text: onveilige besnyding behoort nie vir jong mans lewenslange probleme te veroorsaak nie en niemand behoort as gevolg van besnyding te sterf nie.
tgt_text: we are encouraged by findings of a recent study on preexposure prophylaxis (prep).

src_text: ons moet seker maak dat daar veilige besnyding vir jong mans is.
tgt_text: unlike antiretroviral treatment that is given to people who are hiv positive, prep involves the regular use of antiretroviral drugs by hiv negative people to prevention infection.

src_text: ons is bemoedig deur die bevindings van n onlangse studie oor voorblootstellingsprofilakse (vbp).
tgt_text: the study, conducted by scientists from the hiv prevention trials network, found that longacting injections once every eight weeks was better than the daily tablet used for hiv prevention.

src_text: vbp behels die gereelde gebruik van antiretrovirale middels deur mivnegatiewe mense om infeksie te verhoed, anders as antiretrovirale behandeling wat aan mivpositiewe mense gegee word.
tgt_text: these findings have the potential to significantly strengthen our response to the epidemic.

src_text: die studie, wat deur wetenskaplikes van die netwerk vir mivvoorkomingsproewe uitgevoer is, het bevind dat langwerkende inspuitings, een keer elke agt weke, beter werk as die daaglikse pil wat vir mivvoorkoming gebruik word.
tgt_text: if we are to succeed in ending aids as a public health threat within the next decade, we need to combine these medical breakthroughs with fundamental changes in behaviour.

src_text: dié bevindings het die potensiaal om ons reaksie op die epidemie aansienlik te versterk.
tgt_text: we also need to tackle the economic and social conditions that contrib ute to high rates of infection.

src_text: as ons vigs binne die volgende dekade as n bedreiging van openbare gesondheid wil beëindig, moet ons dié mediese deurbrake met fundamentele gedragsveranderinge kombineer.
tgt_text: one of our central tasks is to empower adolescent girls and young women, educationally, economically and socially.

src_text: ons moet ook die ekonomiese en gemeenskaplike toestande wat tot hoë infeksiekoerse bydra, aanpak.
tgt_text: they need to be able to make their own decisions about every aspect of their lives, including their sexuality and sexual behaviour.

src_text: een van ons belangsrikste take is om tienermeisies en jong vroue opvoedkundig, ekonomies en maatskaplik te bemagtig.
tgt_text: ultimately, we will achieve the end of aids through the empowerment of young people, women and other people at risk.

src_text: hulle moet in staat gestel word om hul eie besluite oor elke aspek van hulle lewens te maak, insluitend hulle seksualiteit en seksuele gedrag.
tgt_text: this includes empowerment through access to information, advice and support.

src_text: ons sal uiteindelik die einde van vigs bereik deur die bemagtiging van jongmense, vroue en ander mense wat in gevaar is.
tgt_text: it includes access to education and economic opportunities, especially for young women.

src_text: dit sluit bemagtiging deur toegang tot inligting, raad en ondersteuning in sowel as toegang tot onderrig en ekonomiese geleenthede, veral vir jong vroue.
tgt_text: empowerment also means that every person must have access to testing, treatment and other health services.

src_text: bemagtiging beteken ook dat elke persoon toegang tot toetsing, behandeling en ander gesondheidsdienste moet hê.
tgt_text: the people of south africa have come so far, endured so much and made such great progress in the fight against hiv , aids and tuberculosis.

src_text: die mense van suidafrika het so ver gekom, soveel verduur en soveel vordering in die stryd teen miv , vigs entuberkulose gemaak.
tgt_text: sa overcoming hiv and aids vukuzenzele unnamed as we continue our efforts to manage the devastating coronavirus pandemic, we cannot ignore the other public health challenges that our country faces.

src_text: beter 2021 vir alle suidafrikaners die eerste weke van die nuwe jaar was maar moeilik vir alle suidafrikaners.
tgt_text: a better 2021 for all south africans the first weeks of the year have been difficult for all south africans.

src_text: vukuzenzele unnamed die koronaviruspandemie het vererger, met nuwe infeksies wat baie vinniger gestyg en groter getalle bereik het as ooit vantevore.
tgt_text: vukuzenzele unnamed the coronavirus pandemic has gotten worse, with new infections increasing far faster and far higher than before.

src_text: hospitale is onder baie druk geplaas, met al hoe meer mense wat mediese aandag benodig het.
tgt_text: hospitals have been under great strain as more people have needed medical attention.

src_text: alhoewel die meeste van die land se ekonomiese sektore nou al vir n hele paar maande weer in staat was om handel te dryf en te produseer, gaan dit tyd neem vir die ekonomie om te herstel, en werkskepping en indiensname om weer op die been te kom.
tgt_text: while most economic sectors have been able to operate again for several months, it will take some time for the economy to recover and for lost jobs to be restored.

src_text: met die begin van die nuwe jaar is daar baie gesinne en families wie se lewens en lewensbestaan steeds deur die pandemie geraak word.
tgt_text: as the new year starts, many families are still feeling the effects of the pandemic on their lives and livelihoods.

src_text: die wêreld betree nou die tweede jaar van die koronaviruspandemie.
tgt_text: the world is now entering the second year of the coronavirus pandemic.

src_text: vir suidafrika, soos ook vir die meeste lande regoor die wêreld, gaan die jaar 2021 vol uitdagings wees.
tgt_text: for south africa, as for most countries around the world, the year 2021 will be extremely challenging.

src_text: die tweede vlaag kovid19infeksies kan heel moontlik deur nóg vlae gevolg word, wat bedreiging vir beide ons mense se gesondheid en die herstel van ons ekonomie inhou.
tgt_text: the second wave of covid19 infections may well be followed by further waves, which will threaten both the health of our people and the recovery of our economy.

src_text: ek is seker daarvan, so moeilik soos wat vanjaar gaan wees, dat ons die pandemie te bowe sal kom en saam ons land koersvas op die herstelpad sal plaas.
tgt_text: difficult as this year will be, i am certain that we will overcome the pandemic and set our country firmly on the path to recovery.

src_text: dié vertroue wat ek het, is te danke aan die mense van suidafrika.
tgt_text: my confidence comes from the south african people.

src_text: as ek kyk na hoe suidafrikaners van meet af op die krisis reageer het, vandat die eerste koronageval op eie bodem bevestig is, twyfel ek nie vir n oomblik dat ons die deursettingsvermoë, dissipline en vermoëns het om die virus te klop nie.
tgt_text: if i look at how south africans responded to this crisis from the moment the virus arrived on our shores, i have no doubt that we have the resilience, discipline and ability to defeat this disease.

src_text: die volstrekte meerderheid van suidafrikaners het begryp dat dit noodsaaklik was om hul daaglikse doen en late en aktiwiteite te beperk en die maatreëls wat in plek gestel is, te gehoorsaam — natuurlik was daar n paar uitsonderings.
tgt_text: certainly there were exceptions, but the vast majority of south africans understood the need for restrictions on their movement and activities, and complied with the regulations that we had to put in place.

src_text: inteendeel, dié maatreëls is getrou gevolg en die meeste suidafrikaners het voorts ook die verantwoordelikheid vir hulself en diegene om hulle op hulself geneem deur ag te slaan op voorkomingsmaatreëls soos sosiale distansiëring, die dra van maskers en gereelde handewas.
tgt_text: even more important than compliance, most south africans took responsibility for themselves and for others, following advice on issues like social distancing, wearing a mask and hand washing.

src_text: waar dié voorkomende maatreëls egter nie gevolg is nie, was die nagevolge ongelukkig ooglopend.
tgt_text: and where we fell short, we have, sadly, seen the consequences.

src_text: ons besef nou die risiko’s verbonde aan samedromming in geslote spasies en tussen n groot aantal mense, noue kontak met ander mense en wat gebeur as mense nie maskers dra nie en n gesonde afstand van ander mense handhaaf nie.
tgt_text: we now know about the risks of closed spaces and crowded gatherings, of not wearing masks and not keeping our distance from others.

src_text: dit is goeie tekens vir die jaar vorentoe — ons weet immers nou baie meer van die koronavirus en hoe om die verspreiding daarvan te bekamp en, ten spyte van sogenaamde "pandemiemoegheid", is ons, as suidafrikaners, meer vasberade as ooit om te doen wat van ons vereis word.
tgt_text: this bodes well for the year ahead.

src_text: ons gaan ook, benewens dat ons die basiese voorkomingsmaatreëls selfs nog meer pligsgetrou gaan handhaaf, n reuse inentingsveldtog van stapel stuur.
tgt_text: we now know much more about the disease and how to prevent its spread.

src_text: ons gaan, namate daar meer en meer mense ingeënt word, lewens red en boonop voortskrydend die risiko van infeksie onder die bevolking verminder.
tgt_text: and despite what one could call ‘pandemic fatigue’, we are no less determined as south africans to do what needs to be done.

src_text: een van die jaar se grootste uitdagings gaan wees om genoeg inentings te bekom — en seker te maak dat dit die mense wat dit benodig, bereik.
tgt_text: as we adhere even more rigorously to the basic prevention measures, we will also be rolling out a mass vaccination campaign.

src_text: wat dit verder bemoeilik, is dat al die lande regoor die wêreld meeding vir die beperkte voorraad inentings wat beskikbaar is.
tgt_text: as more and more people are vaccinated, we will both save lives and progressively reduce the risk of infection across the population.

src_text: ons werk egter saam met handelsvennote, asook vennote in die arbeidsektor en die burgerlike samelewing, hard daaraan om soveel moontlik inentings te bekom.
tgt_text: getting enough vaccines as quickly as possible – and making sure that they reach the people who need them – will be one of the biggest tasks of the year.

src_text: ons is tans op n hele paar fronte besig om inentings te probeer kry, insluitend die globale covaxfasiliteit, die inisiatief van die afrikaunie asook deur ons eie samesprekings met entstofvervaardigers.
tgt_text: this will be particularly challenging as every country in the world is clamouring to secure a limited supply of vaccines.

src_text: ons gaan ook kragte moet saamsnoer om ons ekonomie te herbou en transformeer, namate ons saamstaan om die pandemie die hoof te bied.
tgt_text: but we are hard at work with partners in business, labour and civil society to make this happen.

src_text: ons het beide die vermoëns en die wil om ekonomiese aktiwiteite te stimuleer, die ekonomie te ontwikkel en sodoende werkskepping te bevorder; dít alles te midde van n pandemie.
tgt_text: we are working on several fronts to get vaccines, including through the global covax facility, the african union initiative and through our own engagements with vaccine manufacturers.

src_text: staatsfinansies is erg onder druk, nou meer as ooit vantevore, weens die koste van ons gesondheidsaksieplan met betrekking tot kovid19 en die maatskaplike en ekonomiese verligtingsmaatreëls wat ons in plek gestel het om besighede en armoedige huishoudings te steun.
tgt_text: as we act together to overcome the pandemic, we will need to work together to rebuild and transform our economy.

src_text: die krimping in die ekonomie beteken dat belastinginkomste ook noemenswaardig afgeneem het.
tgt_text: we have both the ability and the will to stimulate economic activity, grow our economy and create jobs.

src_text: daar is sommige dele van die ekonomie wat langer gaan neem om te herstel, danksy die daling in die algemene wêreldwye aanvraag, asook die beperkings op internasionale reis.
tgt_text: and to do so in the midst of a pandemic.

src_text: ons gaan juis daarom innoverend moet wees en ons moet toespits op ons planne om die ekonomie te herbou.
tgt_text: public finances are under extreme strain, now even more so because of the cost of our health response to covid19 and the social and economic relief measures we put in place to assist businesses and poor households.

src_text: dit is noemenswaardig dat die ekonomiese herkonstruksieen herstelplan wat ons laasjaar in oktober aangekondig het, gebaseer is op die breë konsensus onder alle maatskaplike vennote rakende die aksies wat geneem moet word om die ekonomie te herbou.
tgt_text: the contraction of the economy also meant that tax revenue has declined significantly.

src_text: dit skep n vaste basis vir doeltreffende samewerking gestel in die hulpbronne, vermoëns en kragte van alle dele van die samelewing.
tgt_text: there are some parts of the economy that will take longer to recover due to lower global demand generally and restrictions on international travel.

src_text: dié is merkbaar op verskeie praktiese maniere.
tgt_text: that is why we need to be innovative and focused in our plans to rebuild the economy.

src_text: ons is, byvoorbeeld, in noue samewerking met verskeie privaat befondsers en multilaterale ontwikkelingsinstellings met betrekking tot infrastruktuurprojekte in gebiede soos vervoer, menslike nedersettings, water en telekommunikasie.
tgt_text: significantly, the economic reconstruction and recovery plan that we announced in october last year is based on broad consensus among all social part ners on the actions needed to rebuild the economy.

src_text: ons is besig om befondsingsmodelle vir dié projekte te ontwikkel wat van verskeie bronne in beide die openbare en privaat sektor gebruik sal maak en wat die infrastruktuurfonds as middel gebruik.
tgt_text: this lays a firm basis for effective cooperation that draws on the resources, capabilities and energies of all sections of society.

src_text: dit is veral van belang gegewe die huidige beperkings op staatsfinansies.
tgt_text: we are seeing this in various practical ways.

src_text: die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus is nog n voorbeeld van sulke vennootskappe in aksie.
tgt_text: for example, we have been working closely with private funders and multilateral development institutions to prepare infrastructure projects in areas like transport, human settlements, water and telecommunications.

src_text: ons het, met die verstandhouding dat dit tyd gaan neem vir ekonomiese groei om n styging in werkskepping in die privaat sektor te toon, die ekonomiese stimulus geloods om onmiddellik te begin om werksgeleenthede te skep.
tgt_text: using the infrastructure fund as one of the vehicles, we are developing funding models for these projects that draw on several sources in both the public and private sectors.

src_text: die presidensie koördineer dié program, maar dit word deur n verskeidenheid staatsdepartemente en verskillende staatsfere geïmplementeer.
tgt_text: this is particularly important at a time when public finances are limited.

src_text: derduisende werklose mense is, danksy dié program, nou in staat om beide geld te verdien asook om nuwe vaardighede aan te leer terwyl hulle waardevolle maatskaplike dienste lewer.
tgt_text: the presidential employment stimulus is another example of partnership in action.

src_text: dié program sal mettertyd ook n 'maatskaplike' indiensnamegedeelte insluit, waar ons saam met ander maatskaplike rolspelers bande gaan smee om mense in n verskeidenheid aktiwiteite in diens te stel — wat wissel van die bevordering van voedselsekuriteit tot die aanspreek van geslagsgebaseerde geweld en die opgradering van informele nedersettings — alles in die belang van die samelewing.
tgt_text: understanding that it will take time for economic growth to translate into private sector employment, we have launched the employment stimulus to start creat ing work opportunities now.

src_text: al dié werk word benadruk met n aggressiewe fokus op die ekonomiese hervormings wat tot die grootste mate op groei gefokus is.
tgt_text: this programme is being coordinated from the presiden cy, but is being implemented by a range of government departments and different spheres.

src_text: dit sluit in om elektrisiteitsopwekkingkapasiteit te verhoog, om ons hawens meer doeltreffend en mededingend te maak, om toegang tot bekostigbare breëband te verbeter, en om die omkeertye van water, mynbouen ander lisensies te verbeter.
tgt_text: through this programme, tens of thousands of unemployed people are able to both earn and learn as they provide valuable social services.

src_text: dié werk word gesamentlik deur my kantoor en die nasionale tesourie gemonitor en gekoördineer.
tgt_text: in time, this programme will include a ‘social employment’ part, where we will partner with other social actors to employ people in a variety of activities – from improving food security, to tackling genderbased violence to upgrading informal settlements – that all contribute to the common good.

src_text: daar is soveel wat ons in die jaar wat voorlê te doen staan en ons gaan sonder twyfel teen baie steil uitdagings te staan kom.
tgt_text: all this work is being reinforced by an aggressive focus on those economic reforms that will have the greatest focus on growth.

src_text: ons het egter getoon dat ons as n nasie sukses kan behaal, mits ons saamwerk in die strewe na n gemeenskaplike doel.
tgt_text: these include the expansion of electricity generation capacity, making our ports more efficient and competitive, improving access to affordable broadband, and improving turnaround times for water, mining and other licenses.

src_text: ons kan verseker, solank ons dit onthou en verenig optree, dat 2021 net beter gesondheidheid en beter lewens vir ons almal sal inhou.
tgt_text: these efforts are being coordinated and monitored jointly by my office and national treasury.

src_text: ek wens julle net die beste toe vir die nuwe jaar.
tgt_text: a better 2021 for all south africans the first weeks of the year have been difficult for all south africans.

src_text: 'n eer om die au te lei vukuzenzele unnamed suidafrika se ter myn as voorsitter van die afrikaunie het ten einde geloop.
tgt_text: an honour to lead the african union vukuzenzele unnamed south africa’s term as chair of the african union has come to an end.

src_text: wanneer ons oor ons jaar in hierdie posisie besin, onthou ek die ou spreekwoord wat lui: "van die nood ‘n deug maak.
tgt_text: as we reflect on our year in this position, i am reminded of the old saying that ‘in crisis lies opportunity’.

src_text: "dit was ’n vuurdoop, omdat ons die voorsitterskap oorgeneem het in dieselfde maand as wat die eerste geval van die koronavirus op die kontinent aangemeld is.
tgt_text: ours was a baptism of fire, having assumed the chairship in the same month the first case of coronavirus was reported on the continent.

src_text: die prioriteite wat ons vir ons termyn gestel het, waaronder die uitbreiding van vrede en sekuriteit, die ekonomiese bemagtiging van vroue en ’n verdieping van ekonomiese integrasie, moes onmiddellik en ingrypend aangepas word om ons op die pandemie toe te spits.
tgt_text: the priorities we outlined for our term, among them furthering peace and security, the economic empowerment of women and deepening economic integration, had to be immediately and dramatically reoriented to deal with the pandemic.

src_text: ons dringendste taak was om die fokus van die afrikaunie te rig op die hantering van die ergste wêreldwye noodsituasie in meer as ‘n eeu.
tgt_text: our most pressing task was to steer the focus of the african union to addressing the worst global emergency in over a century.

src_text: covid19 het al die lande op die kontinent geaffekteer.
tgt_text: covid19 has affected all the countries on the continent.

src_text: tot op hede is daar meer as 3,5 miljoen bevestigde gevalle in afrika, en meer as 88 000 mense het gesterf.
tgt_text: to date there are more than 3.5 million confirmed cases in africa, and more than 88,000 people have died.

src_text: dit was ’n gesondheids, humanitêre, sosiale en ekonomiese krisis vir afrikalande, en die meeste van hierdie lande beskik nie oor voldoende hulpbronne om ‘n gesondheidskrisis van so ‘n omvang te hanteer nie.
tgt_text: it has been a health, humanitarian, social and economic crisis for african countries, most of whom are inadequately resourced to manage a health emergency of this size.

src_text: en tog, so ongeëwenaard as wat die aard van hierdie pandemie tot dusver was, so ongeëwenaard was ook die wyse waarop afrikalande saamgestaan het om dit te beveg.
tgt_text: and yet, as unprecedented as the nature of the pandemic has been, so too has been the manner in which african countries have come together to fight it.

src_text: ons het hoofsaaklik op die kontinent se eie kundigheid, vermoëns en instellings gesteun, waaronder die afrika sentrum vir siektebeheer en voorkoming (africa cdc).
tgt_text: in doing so we have drawn principally on the continent’s own expertise, capabilities and institutions such as the africa centres for disease control and prevention (africa cdc).

src_text: afrika het nie net passief sit en toekyk hoe die werklike omvang en gevaar van die pandemie ontvou nie.
tgt_text: africa did not sit by passively as the true extent and danger of the pandemic unfurled.

src_text: sedert die vroegste dae van die pandemie is daar onder leiding van die au spoedig ’n kontinentale reaksiestrategie ontwikkel wat aangedryf is deur die afrika cdc en streekstaakmagte.
tgt_text: from the earliest days of the pandemic and led by the au, we swiftly developed a continental response strategy, driven by the africa cdc and regional task forces.

src_text: ons het besef dat elke land op die kontinent ernstig deur die pandemie geraak sou word.
tgt_text: we realised that every country on the continent would be severely affected by the pandemic.

src_text: die meeste lande sou nie oor die nodige hulpbronne beskik om die uitdagings van die openbare gesondheidsektor te hanteer of hulle ekonomieë te beskerm nie.
tgt_text: most would not have the resources needed to meet the public health challenge or to protect their economies.

src_text: ons het daarom as afrikalande ooreengekom om verskeie prominente afrikane aan te wys as spesiale verteenwoordigers om met internasionale befondsers en multilaterale instellings in gesprek te tree om afrika se saak vir finansiële ondersteuning en skuldverligting te stel.
tgt_text: we therefore agreed as african countries to appoint several prominent africans as special envoys, who would engage with international funders and multilateral institutions to make the case for financial support and debt relief on africa’s behalf.

src_text: op hierdie wyse was ons, deur as ‘n kontinent saam te werk, in staat om skuldverligting en finansiële hulp vir baie lande ten opsigte van ons covidrespons en ekonomiese herstel te beding.
tgt_text: in this way, working as a one continent, we were able to achieve debt relief for many countries and financial assistance towards our covid response and economic recovery.

src_text: maar al het afrikalande hulle na die internasionale gemeenskap gewend vir hulp, het ons eers onsself gehelp – deur ‘n kontinentale covid19reaksiefonds op te rig en te kapitaliseer.
tgt_text: but much as african countries went to the international community for support, we first helped ourselves – establishing and capitalising a continental covid19 response fund.

src_text: vir elke vennootskap wat met lande met meer hulpbronne asook die internasi onale skenkergemeenskap aangegaan is, het ons ons eie innoverende en baanbreker afrikamediesevoorraadportaal gevestig om alle afrikalande in staat te stel om vinnig persoonlike beskermende toerusting en ander mediese voorraad op ’n billike en bekostigbare wyse te bekom.
tgt_text: for every partnership forged with betterresourced nations and the international donor community, we set up our own innovative and groundbreaking african medical supplies platform to enable all african countries to quickly secure personal protective equipment and other medical supplies in an equitable, affordable manner.

src_text: en nou dat die covid19entstof beskikbaar is, het ons as ‘n kollektief saamgewerk om te verseker dat die kontinent sy regverdige deel kry deur saam met die covaxfasiliteit te werk, gelei deur ons eie entstoftaakspan (african vaccine acquisition task team).
tgt_text: and now that the covid19 vaccine is available, we have worked as a collective to ensure that the continent gets its fair share, working with the covax facility and led by our own african vaccine acquisition task team.

src_text: ontplooiing van die entstof het reeds ’n aanvang geneem op die konti nent en ons streef daarna om die meerderheid van die kontinent se bevolking teen die einde van 2021 ingeënt te hê om kuddeimmuniteit te bereik.
tgt_text: vaccine rollout has already commenced on the continent and we aspire to have the majority of the continent’s population vaccinated by the end of 2021 to achieve herd immunity.

src_text: ons het soos een mens opgetree om gesondheid, mense en mense se bestaansmiddele op die kontinent te beskerm.
tgt_text: we have acted as one to protect health, people and livelihoods on the continent.

src_text: deur dit te doen, het ons gewys dat ons die kapasiteit het om na onsself te kyk en oor die vermoë beskik om ons eie ontwikkeling aan te dryf.
tgt_text: in doing so, we have demonstrated our capacity for selfreliance and our ability to be the drivers of our own development.

src_text: ongeag die oorheersing van covid19, het ons nog steeds daarin geslaag om in talle van ons sleutelprioriteite vordering te maak.
tgt_text: despite the dominance of covid19, we have still managed to make advances in several of our key priorities.

src_text: tydens ons termyn is die afrika kontinentale vryehandelsgebied (afcfta) uiteindelik bekendgestel, wat ’n nuwe era van intraafrika handelen ekonomiese integrasie inlui.
tgt_text: during our term, the africa continental free trade area (afcfta) was finally launched, heralding a new era of intraafrican trade and economic integration.

src_text: selfs onder die moeilike omstandighede weens die pandemie het die kontinent voortgestu om die "gewere op die kontinent stil te maak."
tgt_text: even under the difficult conditions posed by the pandemic, the continent has pushed ahead with towards the goal of ‘silencing the guns’ on the continent.

src_text: die au was onder andere aktief betrokke in onderhandelinge rakende die groot ethiopiese renaissancedam, die bewerkstelliging van ’n skietstilstand in libië sowel as die bevordering van vrede in suidsoedan.
tgt_text: the au has been actively involved in negotiations around the grand ethiopian renaissance dam, in achieving a ceasefire in libya and promoting peace in south sudan.

src_text: nog ‘n fokuspunt van ons termyn was die ekonomiese bemagtiging van vroue, waarmee ons sal voortgaan al het ons termyn verstryk, en ook regdeur die afrikavroue se dekade van finansiële en ekonomiese insluiting tot 2030. wanneer ons dan nou die stokkie oorgee aan die demokratiese republiek van die kongo (drc), laat ons hierdie voortreflike kontinentale liggaam in ’n sterker posisie.
tgt_text: another focus of our term has been on the economic empowerment of women, which we will continue to champion even beyond our term and throughout the decade of african women’s financial and economic inclusion to 2030. as we hand over the baton to the democratic republic of congo (drc) we leave this preeminent continental body in a position of greater strength.

src_text: suidafrika sal voortgaan om sy kant te bring om integrasie op die kontinent te bewerkstellig, en sal die inkomende voorsitter sowel as die organisasie ondersteun in sy pogings om die aspirasies van die au se agenda 2063 te bereik.
tgt_text: south africa will continue to play its part to foster integration on the continent, and support the incoming chair and the organisation in its efforts to meet the aspirations of the au’s agenda 2063. when the organisation for african unity was founded in 1963, member states planted the seeds of cooperation and solidarity in pursuit of a better life for all the peoples of africa.

src_text: toe die organisasie vir afrikaeenheid in 1963 gestig is, het lidstate die saadjies van samewerking en solidariteit in navolging van ‘n beter lewe vir al die mense van afrika gesaai.
tgt_text: they affirmed that african unity was paramount if the welfare and wellbeing of africa’s people was to be assured.

src_text: hulle het bevestig dat afrikaeenheid van die grootste belang is om die welsyn en welvaart van afrika se mense te verseker.
tgt_text: history bears witness that these seeds have not always fallen on fertile ground, and over the years the continental unity project has experienced many hurdles and false starts.

src_text: die geskiedenis kan getuig dat hierdie saadjies nie altyd in vrugbare grond geval het nie en deur die jare het die kontinentale eenheidsprojek baie struikelblokke teëgekom of onsuksesvolle wegspringpogings gehad.
tgt_text: but the grave threat posed by this pandemic has galvanised african countries to collective action.

src_text: maar die groot bedreiging wat hierdie pandemie ingehou het, het afrikalande tot kollektiewe aksie saamgesnoer.
tgt_text: in the hothouse of the covid19 crisis, the seeds of unity and cooperation planted by our pioneering forebears have come to life and flourished.

src_text: in die kweekhuis van die covid19krisis het die saadjies van eenheid en samewerking wat deur ons baanbrekervoorvaders geplant is, lewe gekry en geblom.
tgt_text: this time of great trial and difficulty has been among the au’s finest hours.

src_text: hierdie tydperk van groot beproewing en swaarkry was van die au se beste tye.
tgt_text: we are honoured to have been given the opportunity to lead the organisation through this period, when it practically demonstrated the true meaning of the words african union.

src_text: ons is geëerd om die geleentheid te kon hê om die organisasie deur hierdie tydperk te lei toe dit die ware betekenis van die woorde afrikaunie prakties kon demonstreer.
tgt_text: an honour to lead the african union vukuzenzele unnamed south africa’s term as chair of the african union has come to an end.

src_text: stappe om die ekonomie weer op die been te bring vukuzenzele unnamed dit sal binnekort n jaar wees sedert die eerste koronavirusgeval in ons land aangeteken is.
tgt_text: steps to revive the economy vukuzenzele unnamed it will soon be a year since the first reported case of coronavirus disease (covid19) in our country.

src_text: die pandemie het n hewige tol geëis in beide openbare gesondheid en die lewensbestaan van miljoene van ons mense.
