tgt_text: the pandemic has come at a great cost to both public health and the livelihoods of millions of our people.

src_text: baie werknemers het deel van hul inkomste verloor met die afskaal van hul werksure, met baie ander wat hul werk heeltemal kwyt is weens afleggings.
tgt_text: many workers lost part of their income as their work hours were reduced with many being retrenched.

src_text: verskeie ondernemings het groot verliese gely weens werksaamhede wat afgeskaal is.
tgt_text: several businesses have incurred heavy losses from scaledback operations.

src_text: ander besighede moes heeltemal sluit.
tgt_text: others have had to close.

src_text: werkers in die informele sektor het ook hieronder gely.
tgt_text: people working in the informal sector have also suffered.

src_text: die ergste van alles is dat die pandemie die broodwinners in baie gesinne geëis het, wat dié gesinne behoeftig en vol vrees vir die toekoms laat.
tgt_text: most difficult of all, the pandemic has claimed the lives of breadwinners in many families, leaving them destitute and fearful for the future.

src_text: dít is hoekom die omvattende verligtingsmaatreëls wat ons in plek gestel het beide broodnodig en baie dringend was.
tgt_text: this is why the extensive relief measures we put in place were both necessary and urgent.

src_text: en nou, n jaar later, is die doeltreffendheid van dié maatreëls bewese.
tgt_text: and, now that nearly a year has passed, we can say that these measures have proved effective.

src_text: van al die verligtingsmaatreëls wat ons in plek gestel het, is die twee met die grootste impak bes moontlik die spesiale kovid19toelae en die wvf se kovid19 tydelike werkgewerwerknemerverligtingskema, algemeen bekend as kovid ters.
tgt_text: of the full package of relief measures that we introduced, perhaps the two measures that had the greatest impact were the special covid19 social relief of distress grant and the unemployment insurance fund's (uif) covid19 temporary employer/employee relief scheme, generally known as covid ters.

src_text: ons sou nie hierdie maatreëls so vinnig kon uitrol as ons nie reeds n omvattende maatskaplike sekerheidsinfrastruktuur in plek gehad het nie.
tgt_text: we would not have been able to roll out these measures in such a short space of time if we had not had an extensive social security infrastructure already in place.

src_text: ons was in staat om vinnig op dié dringende en reuse behoefte in ons samelewing te reageer danksy die wesenlike landswye infrastruktuur en stelsels van die suidafrikaanse maatskaplike sekerheidsagentskap (sassa) en die werkloosheidsversekeringsfonds (wvf).
tgt_text: we were able to respond to this huge and immediate need in our society thanks to the substantial nationwide infrastructure and systems of the south african social security agency and the uif.

src_text: daar het ongetwyfeld hier en daar n paar tegniese en ander foute ingeglip, maar meeste hiervan is sommer gou reggestel.
tgt_text: there were certainly technical and other glitches along the way, but most of these were speedily resolved.

src_text: dié staatsagentskappe het uitstekende werk verrig om miljoene mense te registreer en seker te maak dat hulle hul uitbetalings ontvang.
tgt_text: these government agencies did outstanding work to enroll millions of new beneficiaries and ensure they were paid.

src_text: die steun wat deur die wvf gelewer is, was n lewenslyn aan ondernemings en individue in nood.
tgt_text: the support provided by the uif was a lifeline to struggling businesses and employees.

src_text: dit was die verskil tussen ondernemings wat hul deure kon oophou of moes sluit; tussen werke wat behou is en wat verlore gegaan het.
tgt_text: it made the difference between companies remaining open and being forced to close, between jobs saved and jobs lost.

src_text: dit het besighede soos sihle’s brew, n restaurant in gauteng, bevoordeel; die restaurant was in staat om sy 18 werknemers te behou, danksy die tersskema.
tgt_text: this benefited businesses like sihle’s brew, a restaurant in gauteng, which was able to retain its 18 employees because of the ters scheme.

src_text: danksy staatsondersteuning kon mamoshalagae trading and projects, n outoelektriese onderneming in mokopane, sy werkers betaal asook die besigheid se huurgeld en uitgawes tydens die inperking dek.
tgt_text: thanks to government support, mamoshal agae trading and projects, an autoelectrical business in mokopane, was able to pay its workers as well as its rent and rates during the lockdown.

src_text: werknemers in nood was in staat om n deel van hul salarisse te ontvang.
tgt_text: employees in dire straits were able to receive a portion of their salaries.

src_text: lindiwe ntuli, n regsassistent in centurion, het getuig hoe die toelae wat sy ontvang het, dit vir haar moontlik gemaak om van die huis af te kon werk en haar huur te kon bekostig.
tgt_text: lindiwe ntuli, a paralegal in centurion, has told how receiving her benefits enabled her to work from home and be able to afford her rent.

src_text: daar is baie verhale van ondernemings wat die afgelope jaar danksy die steun wat hulle van die wvf ontvang het hul deure kon oophou.
tgt_text: there are many stories of companies that have been able to stay afloat over the past year because of the support they received from the uif.

src_text: dit geld ook vir kleinhandelsake wat deur die verskeie toelae en lenings wat deur verskillende departemente toegestaan is, geholpe is.
tgt_text: the same can be said of the small businesses helped by the various grants and loans provided by a number of departments.

src_text: dié maatreëls het ons mense in tye van nood bygestaan.
tgt_text: these measures greatly helped our people in their time of need.

src_text: soos wat ons beweeg van verligting na herstel, moet ons van rat verander.
tgt_text: as we transition from relief to recovery, we have to shift gear.

src_text: terwyl hierdie verligtingsmaatreëls van tydelike aard is, gaan die ekonomie steeds vir n hele ruk die nagevolge van die pandemie ervaar.
tgt_text: while these relief measures were designed to be temporary, the economy will continue to feel the effects of the pandemic for some time.

src_text: selfs met die verslapping van baie van die inperking se beperkings, sukkel vele ondernemings steeds met die nagevolge van maande en maande se beperkte werksaamhede en verlore inkomste.
tgt_text: even as lockdown restrictions have been eased, many companies are struggling to cope with the fallout of months of diminished operations and lost revenue.

src_text: daar is dus besluit, na aanleiding van omvattende gesprekvoering met maatskaplike vennote by nedlac, dat die kovid tersvoordele met drie maande verleng sal word tot 15 maart 2021 in sektore wat nog nie ten volle operasioneel is nie.
tgt_text: it is for this reason that, following extensive discussion with social partners at the national economic development and labour council the covid ters benefit has been extended until 15 march 2021 for sectors that have not been able to fully operate.

src_text: die spesiale kovidtoelae is met drie maande verleng.
tgt_text: the special covid grant has been extended for another three months.

src_text: dit bly egter korttermynmaatreëls.
tgt_text: these remain shortterm measures.

src_text: ons moet nou daarop begin fokus om n omgewing te skep waarin besighede kan herstel en wat werkskepping en belegging aanmoedig.
tgt_text: our focus now must be on creating an enabling environment for businesses to recover, and for economic growth that spurs job creation and attracts invest ment.

src_text: die herstel gaan moeilik wees en tyd neem, veral synde ons steeds te midde van die pandemie is.
tgt_text: the recovery will be difficult and will take time, not least because we are still in the midst of the pandemic.

src_text: so belangrik soos die verligtingsmaatreëls is, kan ons dit nie onbepaald in plek hou nie.
tgt_text: important as these relief measures are now, we will not be able to sustain them indefinitely.

src_text: ons moet seker maak dat hierdie verligtingsmaatreels n stewige basis vorm vir die breër herstel van die ekonomie sonder om die land verder in die skuld te dompel.
tgt_text: we need to make sure that these relief measures provide a firm foundation for a broader recovery without driving the country deeper into debt.

src_text: tensy ons ons nasionale skuld kan afbring na onderhoubare vlakke, sal geen betekenisvolle herstel moontlik wees nie.
tgt_text: unless we can bring our national debt down to sustainable levels no meaningful economic recovery will be possible.

src_text: ons nasionale bewussyn moet nou verby verligting na herstel strek, en ons moet almal ons deel bring om dit te bewerkstellig.
tgt_text: our national consciousness must now move beyond the realm of relief into that of recovery, and we must all be part of this effort.

src_text: as die staat gaan ons vanjaar moeilike besluite oor openbare besteding moet neem en implementeer.
tgt_text: as government, hard decisions on public spending will need to be made and implemented this year.

src_text: maatskappye gaan innoverend moet wees met be stuursmetodes en prosesse om hul volhoubaarheid en winsgewendheid te verseker, met die voorkoming van werksverlies as hul grootste oorweging.
tgt_text: companies will need to be innovative in driving methods and processes that secure their sustainability and profitability, with job retention being their foremost consideration.

src_text: ons moet geld in ons ekonomie terugplaas deur plaaslike produkte te koop, plaaslike besighede en bedrywe te ondersteun en by plaaslike verskaffers te aan te koop.
tgt_text: we must put our money back into our economy by buying local products, supporting local businesses and industrie and procuring from local suppliers.

src_text: n beseerde pasiënt met goeie kanse vir herstel ontvang gereelde fisioterapie om hom te help om sterker te word sodat hy gou weer op sy eie voete kan staan.
tgt_text: an injured patient with strong prospects for recovery is given regular phys ical therapy to help them get stronger until they can stand unaided.

src_text: so ook moet dié tydelike verligtingsmaatreëls beskou word as n manier om ons ekonomie weer op die been te bring.
tgt_text: so must these temporary relief measures be seen as the means to get our economy back on its feet.

src_text: ons uiteindelike doel is om weer self te kan loop.
tgt_text: our ultimate goal is to walk again.

src_text: kom ons almal strek as n nasie n helpende hand uit.
tgt_text: as a nation, let us all lend a hand.

src_text: kom ons wees saam deel van ons eie ontwikkeling en vordering.
tgt_text: let us be part of our own development and progress.

src_text: laat ons gebruik maak van dié verlengde verligtingsmaatreëls om sterk ekonomiese herstel te bewerkstellig.
tgt_text: steps to revive the economy vukuzenzele unnamed it will soon be a year since the first reported case of coronavirus disease (covid19) in our country.

src_text: 'n professionele staatsdiens vukuzenzele unnamed met my verkiesing as staatspresi dent het ek des tyds gesê dat die skepping van ’n doeltreffende, be kwame en etiese regering, vry van enige korrupsie, een van my grootste prio riteite is.
tgt_text: a professional public service vukuzenzele unnamed when i was elected to the position of president of south africa, i said that building an efficient, capable and ethical state free from corruption was among my foremost priorities.

src_text: slegs ’n bekwame, doeltref fende, etiese en ontwikke lingsgeoriënteerde regering kan die verbintenis tot die verbetering van die lewens van die mense van hierdie land nakom.
tgt_text: only a capable, efficient, ethical and developmentoriented state can deliver on the commitment to improve the lives of the people of this country.

src_text: dit beteken dat die staats diens beman moet word deur mense wat professioneel, vaardig, onbaatsugtig en eerlik is.
tgt_text: this means that the public service must be staffed by men and women who are professional, skilled, selfless and honest.

src_text: hulle moet daartoe verbind wees om die waardes van die grondwet te handhaaf en moet, soos ek in my in huldigingstoespraak gesê het, "hulself getrou vir geen ander saak as dié van die publiek beywer nie".
tgt_text: they must be committed to upholding the values of the constitution, and must, as i said in my inaugural speech, "faithfully serve no other cause than that of the public".

src_text: tydens die afgelope twee weke het openbare kon sultasies plaasgevind met betrekking tot ’n belangrike beleidsdokument wat groter dryfkrag gaan gee aan ons werk om die staatsdiens te steun, versterk en bevoeg te maak.
tgt_text: over the past two weeks, public consultations have been underway on an important policy document that will give greater impetus to our efforts to bolster, strengthen and capacitate the civil service.

src_text: die konsep vir die nasionale implementeringsraamwerk vir die professionalisering van die staatsdiens is daarop gemik om ’n regering tot stand te bring wat ons volk beter dien, wat geïsoleer is van onbehoorlike politieke inmenging, en waar aanstel lings op meriete plaasvind.
tgt_text: the draft national implementation framework towards the professionalisation of the public service aims to build a state that better serves our people, that is insulated from undue political interference and where appointments are made on merit.

src_text: die raamwerk is in novem ber laasjaar deur die kabinet goedgekeur en gestruktureer de konsultasie met verskeie sektore van die samelewing word tans onderneem.
tgt_text: the framework was approved by cabinet in november last year and structured consultation with various sectors of society are now underway.

src_text: na seweentwintig jaar van demokrasie kan ons die vol gende van die staatsdiens sê: ondanks uitnemendheid op talle terreine, is daar in baie staatsdepartemente steeds ernstige uitdagings met betrekking tot vaardighede, bekwaamheid en professio naliteit.
tgt_text: twentyseven years into democracy, it can be said of the public service that while several pockets of excellence exist, we have serious challenges in many government departments with regards to skills, competence and professionalism.

src_text: te dikwels is mense aange stel in en bevorder tot sleutel posisies waarvoor hulle nie geskik of bekwaam was nie.
tgt_text: all too often, people have been hired into and promoted to key positions for which they are neither suitable nor qualified.

src_text: dit het die werksprestasie van die regering beïnvloed en ook bygedra tot nepo tisme, politieke inmenging in die werksverrigting van departmente, ’n gebrek aan verantwoordbaarheid, wan bestuur en korrupsie.
tgt_text: this affects government performance, but also contributes to nepotism, political interference in the work of departments, lack of accountability, mismanagement and corruption.

src_text: daar is ook die verwante probleem van politieke en uitvoerende inmenging in die administrasie van die staatsdiens.
tgt_text: there is also the related problem of political and executive interference in the administration of the public service.

src_text: 'n mens hoef net te kyk na die onstabiliteit in staatsdepartemente wan neer seniorbestuur verskuif of vervang word elke keer as ’n nuwe minister aangestel word.
tgt_text: one need only to look at the instability in government departments when senior managers are swopped or replaced each time a new minister is appointed.

src_text: direkteursgeneraal en pro vinsiale departementshoofde word veral hierdeur geraak.
tgt_text: directorsgeneral (dgs) and provincial heads of departments (hods) are particularly affected.

src_text: in sommige departemente het dgs, departementshoofde en uitvoerende bestuur die voor deel van 'n stabiele amps termyn geniet, wat sulke departemente in staat gestel het om met min ontwrigting aan te hou funksioneer.
tgt_text: in some departments, dgs, hods and executive managers have had stability of tenure, enabling the departments to function with little disruption.

src_text: in die meeste sulke departemente waar daar stabiele leierskap is, is ouditverslae geneig om positief en openbare be fondsing verantwoordbaar te wees.
tgt_text: in most of these departments where there is leadership stability, audit outcomes tend to be positive and public funds can be accounted for.

src_text: daarenteen is daar dikwels administratiewe onstuimigheid in departe mente met ’n hoë omset van leierskap.
tgt_text: where there is a high turnover of heads of department, there is often administrative turmoil.

src_text: een van die belangrikste voorstelle in die konsepraamwerk is dat die staats diens gedepolitiseer moet word en dat staatsdeparte mente van politiek geïsoleer moet word.
tgt_text: one of the key recommendations made in the draft framework is that the public service must be depoliticised and that government departments must be insulated from politics.

src_text: professionalisering is nood saaklik vir stabiliteit in die staatsdiens, veral in die se nior range.
tgt_text: professionalisation is necessary for stability in the public service, especially in the senior ranks.

src_text: staatsamptenare moet hul pligte kan uitvoer "ondanks enige veranderinge onder die ministers, lede van die uitvoerende raad of raadslede in die regerende party met betrekking tot die administrasie, of verskui wings van politieke partye na afloop van verkiesings".
tgt_text: public servants must be able to continue doing their jobs "regardless of any changes of ministers, members of the executive council or councillors within the governing party in charge of the administration, or changes to political parties after elections".

src_text: ons stel ’n aantal verrei kende hervormings voor, byvoorbeeld die verlen ging van die ampstermyn van departementshoofde op grond van meriete en prestasie, die instelling van beroepsgebaseerde bekwaamheidsassesserings asook die betrokkenheid van die staatsdienskomis sie wanneer onderhoude met kandidate vir die poste van direkteursgeneraal en adjunkdirekteursgeneraal gevoer word.
tgt_text: we are proposing a number of farreaching reforms, such as extending the tenure of hods based on merit and performance, doing occupationbased competency assessments and involving the public service commission in the interviews of dgs and deputy dgs.

src_text: die instelling van integri teitstoetsing vir alle kandi date wat op die kortlys is, sal daartoe bydra dat ons staatsamptenare kan werf wat met eerbaarheid kan dien.
tgt_text: introducing integrity tests for all shortlisted individuals will help so that we can recruit civil servants who can serve honestly.

src_text: ons moet voorts ook die verpligte intreeeksamens wat ons in april 2020 inge stel het, uitbrei na meer as slegs die senior bestuurders.
tgt_text: we also need to extend the compulsory entrance exams that we introduced in april 2020 beyond senior management.

src_text: suksesvolle ontwikkelende regerings het soortgelyke maatreëls wat professiona lisme onder die staatsdiens bevorder.
tgt_text: successful developmental states have similar measures which help advance professionalism within the public service.

src_text: soos ons in die konsepraamwerk noem, "moet die burokrasie voortdurend lo jaal en nougeset die politieke mandaat wat deur die kiesers en die party daargestel is, implementeer, maar hulle daarvan weerhou om self politieke rolspelers te wees.
tgt_text: as we note in the draft framework, "the bureaucracy must continue to loyally and diligently implement the political mandate set by voters and the party, but to refrain from being political actors themselves.

src_text: "ons voorstel is ’n stren ger benadering jeens die werwing en keuring, in duksie en prestasiebestuur van staatsamptenare.
tgt_text: "we are suggesting a more rigorous approach towards recruitment and selection of public servants, induction and performance management.

src_text: dit sluit in volgehoue leer en ’n duidelike professionele ontwikkelingspad vir elke staatsamptenaar.
tgt_text: this includes continuous learning and a clear professional development path for every public servant.

src_text: die konsepraamwerk benadruk die behoefte om staatsamptenare verant woordbaar te hou vir on reëlmatighede en sodoende ’n kultuur van straffeloos heid in die wanbestuur en misbruik van regeringshulp bronne te verhoed.
tgt_text: the draft framework puts emphasis on the need to hold public servants accountable for irregularities, to do away with a culture of impunity in the mismanagement and misappropriation of state resources.

src_text: professionalisering van die staatsdiens behels die opleiding van rekening kundige beamptes oor al die regeringsfere heen met betrekking tot die toepaslike wetlike bepalings.
tgt_text: professionalising the public service involves training for accounting officers across all spheres of government on the applicable legislative provisions.

src_text: die nasionale regerings kool speel ’n sleutelrol in hierdie verband.
tgt_text: the national school of government (nsg) has a vital role to play in this regard.

src_text: professionalisme behels nie net die regte kwalifikasies en tegniese kennis nie, maar ook die toepaslike standaarde van respek, hoflikheid en integriteit in skakeling met lede van die publiek.
tgt_text: professionalism is not only about having the right qualifications and technical skills, but also about having appropriate standards of respect, courtesy and integrity in dealing with members of the public.

src_text: die staatsdiens is uiteen lopend, met ’n wye verskei denheid vaardighede, kwa lifikasies en bekwaamhede.
tgt_text: the public service is diverse, with a huge range of skills, qualifications and capabilities.

src_text: baie staatsamptenare het gespesialiseerde vaardig hede wat noodsaaklik is vir doeltreffende dienslewering.
tgt_text: many public servants have specialised skills that are necessary for the effective provision of services.

src_text: dit is dus nie noodwendig die geval dat ons ’n kleiner staatsdiens benodig nie; wat ons wel nodig het is ’n ef fektiewe staatsdiens met die nodige vaardighede, profes sionele etiek en ’n verbintenis om die gemeenskap te dien.
tgt_text: it is therefore not necessarily the case that we need a smaller public service: what we actually need is a fitforpurpose public service with suitable skills, a professional ethic and a commitment to serving the people.

src_text: die mense in die staatsdiens moet in staat gestel word om hul rol te vervul in die strewe na ontwikkeling en die kon solidering van demokrasie.
tgt_text: the men and women of the public service need to be capacitated to play their role in driving development and consolidating democracy.

src_text: dit is ons beste waarborg vir ’n bekwame staat wat die belange van sy landsburgers dien.
tgt_text: this is our best guarantee of a capable state that serves the interests of citizens.

src_text: ek doen ’n beroep op julle almal om deel te neem aan die openbare konsultasie proses vir hierdie konsepraamwerk, wat op die nasionale regeringskool se webwerf beskikbaar is, en om jul stemme te laat hoor.
tgt_text: i call on you to be part of the public consultation process around this draft framework, which is available on the nsg's website, and to make your voice heard.

src_text: die staatsdiens behoort nie aan een spesifieke party nie; en dit behoort ook nie die domein van enige bepaalde belangegroep te wees nie.
tgt_text: the public service does not belong to any one party, nor should it be the domain of any particular interest group.

src_text: dit behoort nie bo die wet te staan nie.
tgt_text: it should not be a law unto itself.

src_text: die staatsdiens behoort aan die mense van suidafrika.
tgt_text: the public service belongs to the people of south africa.

src_text: dit moet hulle en slegs hulle dien.

tgt_text: traditional leaders key to recovery efforts vukuzenzele unnamed in the last few months, we have had to bid a sad farewell to two of our country’s most respected traditional monarchs.

tgt_text: the zulu people recently laid to rest his majesty king goodwill zwelithini ka bhekuzulu who reigned for half a century.

src_text: die bapedivolk het in januarie kgoshikgolo thulare thulare iii ter ruste gelê wat minder as n jaar na sy inhuldiging oorlede is.
tgt_text: in january, the bapedi people buried kgoshikgolo thulare thulare iii, who passed away less than a year after his inauguration.

src_text: ons het, met hul afsterwe, kampioene van die bewaring van ons land se erfenis en die geskiedenis van hul onder skeie volke verloor.
tgt_text: with their passing, we have lost champions of the preservation of our heritage, and revered custodians of the histories of their respective peoples.

src_text: hulle het terselfdertyd ook wesenlik tot landelike ont wikkeling bygedra en was toegewy aan die steun van programme ter verbetering van hul mense se lewensge halte.
tgt_text: at the same time, they were vital players in rural development, and were committed to driving programmes to uplift the material conditions of their people.

src_text: een van die nuwe regering se prioriteite, met die koms van demokrasie in 1994, was om die integriteit en reg matigheid van tradisionele leierskap in ooreenstemming met tradisionele wette en gebruike, en onderworpe aan die grondwet van die republiek, te hervestig.
tgt_text: with the advent of democracy in 1994, it was a priority of the new government to restore the integrity and legitimacy of traditional leadership in line with indigenous law and customs and subject to the constitution of the republic.

src_text: die tradisionele leierskaps instelling speel steeds n belangrike rol in die lewens van miljoene mense regoor ons land, veral in landelike gebiede.
tgt_text: the institution of traditional leadership continues to play an important role in the lives of millions of people around our country, especially in rural areas.

src_text: tradisionele leiers ondersteun en dryf ontwik keling in hul gemeenskappe.
tgt_text: traditional leaders support and drive development in their communities.

src_text: ek het onlangs die geleent heid gehad om oor die debat van die opening van die na sionale huis van tradisionele leiers deel te neem; dié debat het op die dringende kwes sies wat die land in die gesig staar, gefokus.
tgt_text: recently, i had the opportunity to participate in the debate on the opening of the national house of traditional leaders, which was concerned with the most pressing issues currently facing the country.

src_text: wat juis besonders verfris send van dié kragtige ge sprekvoering was, was dat die tradisionele leierskap n besondere begrip van die moeilike ekonomiese toe stande wat die land in die gesig staar het en graag deel wil wees van die poging om die uitdagings van onderont wikkeling en armoede in hul omgewings aan te spreek.
tgt_text: what was particularly refreshing about the robust engagement was that traditional leadership has a keen appreciation of the difficult economic conditions facing our country, and want to be part of addressing the many challenges of underdevelopment and poverty in their areas.

src_text: ek het nog altyd gesê dat ons ekonomiese herstel na af loop van die koronaviruspan demie inklusief moet wees, en dat niemand agtergelaat moet word nie.
tgt_text: i have consistently said that our economic recovery in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic must be inclusive, and that nobody must be left behind.

src_text: die sukses van die ekono miese herkonstruksieen her stelplan rus op die smee van sterk vennootskapsbande tussen nie net die staat, han del en arbeid nie, maar ook met tradisionele leierskap en ander gemeenkapsgroepe.
tgt_text: the success of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan rests on forging strong partnerships between not just government, business and labour, but also with traditional leadership and other societal formations.

src_text: n deurlopende tema tydens die debat was dat tradisio nele leiers nie van aalmoese nie vir hulle gemeenskappe afhanklik wil wees nie en ook nie wil hê hul gemeenskappe moet die heeltyd van die regering se finansiële steun afhanklik wees nie.
tgt_text: a constant refrain from participants in the debate recently was that they do not want to be dependent on handouts or for their communities to perpetually look to government for financial assistance.

src_text: hulle wil die nodige steun, opleiding en bemagtiging hê om landelike gemeenskappe in staat te stel om selfversor gend te wees.
tgt_text: they want to be provided with the necessary support, training and enabling environment to allow rural communities to be selfsufficient.

src_text: hulle wil die stedelikelandelike skeiding, met be trekking tot staatsdienste en privaat sektorhulpbronne, oorbrug.
tgt_text: they want to bridge the urbanrural divide in access to government services and private sector resources.

src_text: hul wil graag sien dat lande like gebiede omskep word in spoelpunte van ekonomiese aktiwiteit, asook bedryfsen werksgeleenthede.
tgt_text: what they would like to see is for rural areas to become centres of economic activity, industry and employment opportunity.

src_text: dit weer spieël die doelwitte van die distriksontwikkelingsmodel (dom) wat in 2019 geloods is.
tgt_text: this mirrors the aspirations of the district development model (ddm), which was launched in 2019. traditional leaders are well positioned to ensure that district plans are informed by and respond to the real needs of communities and that they reflect the lived reality in rural areas.

src_text: tradisonele leiers is goed geplaas om te verseker dat distriksplanne ingelig word deur en ook spreek tot die ware behoeftes van ge meenskappe en dat hulle die lewensrealiteite in landelike gebiede getrou weerspieël.
tgt_text: just as the ddm supports localised programmes that focus on the needs, strengths and opportunities in specific areas, traditional leaders have pioneered their own approach to local economic development.

src_text: tradisionele leiers het hul eie weg gebaan met hul eie benadering tot plaaslike eko nomiese ontwikkeling, net soos wat die dom plaaslike programme ondersteun wat op die behoeftes, sterkpunte en geleenthede in spesifieke areas fokus.
tgt_text: they have developed the investrural masterplan, which was launched in north west last month.

src_text: hulle het die investrural masterplan ontwikkel wat laasmaand in die noordwes geloods is.
tgt_text: it is greatly encouraging that traditional leaders have rallied behind the plan and want to work with local authorities to ensure it is a success.

src_text: dit is besonders bemoedigend dat tradisio nele leiers hul gewig agter dié plan gooi en saam met plaas like owerhede wil werk om die plan se sukses te verseker.
tgt_text: during the debate in the national house of traditional leaders it was proposed that a major success factor for the investrural programme is that traditional structures are trained, strengthened and capacitated.

src_text: daar is tydens die debat in die nasionale huis van tradisionele leiers voor gestel dat een van die die vernaamste suksesfaktore van die investruralprogram sou behels dat tradisionele strukture opgelei, versterk en bevoeg gemaak word.
tgt_text: a number of participants outlined economic plans that are already in advanced stages of development.

src_text: van die deelnemers aan die debat het ekonomiese planne voorgelê wat reeds in gevorderde stadiums van ontwikkeling is.
tgt_text: these range from agricultural projects to bioprospecting to renewable energy.

src_text: dié planne behels onder meer landbou projekte, bioprospektering en hernubare energie.
tgt_text: what was evident is that the institution of traditional leadership understands that professionalisation is necessary for rural businesses in the form of small, medium and micro enterprises and cooperatives to become part of the mainstream economy.

src_text: dit was ooglopend dat die tradisionele leierskap begryp dat professionalisering nood saaklik is vir landelike besig hede soos klein, mediumen makroondernemings asook koöperasies om deel van die hoofstroomekonomie te word.
tgt_text: the traditional leaders who spoke presented their vision of ‘developmental monarchs’, who see themselves as not just custodians of heritage but also as drivers of economic prosperity and progress.

src_text: die tradisionele leiers wat toesprake tydens die debat gelewer het, het hul visie van 'ontwikkelingsheersers' bekend gestel, wat hulself nie net as die bewaarders van erfenis beskou nie, maar ook as drywers van ekonomiese vooruitgang en sukses.
tgt_text: they have identified several projects and economic opportunities that will create jobs and improve livelihoods in rural areas.

src_text: hulle het verskeie projekte en eko nomiese geleenthede geïden tifiseer wat werkskepping en die lewensgehalte in lande like gebiede sal bevorder.
tgt_text: traditional leaders have also expressed their willingness to play an active part in the land reform process.

src_text: tradisionele leiers het ook hul gewilligheid uitgespreek om n aktiewe rol in die grond hervormingsproses te speel.
tgt_text: since 2018, traditional leaders have made around 1 500 000 hectares of communal land available for development, and it is hoped this will increase in future.

src_text: tradisionele leiers het sedert 2018 ongeveer 1 500 000 hektaar gemeenskaplike grond beskikbaar gestel vir ontwikkeling en daar word gehoop dat dit in die toekoms nog meer sal word.
tgt_text: to develop a coordinated and sustainable strategy, we have agreed to hold a presidential land summit in the next year.

src_text: ons het, ten einde n geko ördineerde en volhoubare strategie te ontwikkel, oor eengekom om in die ko mende jaar n presidensiële spitsberaad oor grond te hou.
tgt_text: this will discuss pressing issues around land reform and its impact on communal land, much of which is located in rural areas.

src_text: dié spitsberaad sal dringende kwessies rakende grond hervorming en die impak daarvan op gemeenskaplike grond — waarvan groot dele in landelike omgewings geleë is — bespreek.
tgt_text: the tone of the debate in the national house was a fitting reflection of a climate in which economic recovery is foremost among our considerations.

src_text: die stemming van die debat in die nasionale huis was n gepaste weerspieëling van n klimaat waarin ekono miese herstel bo aan die lys is.
tgt_text: at the same time it was a promising signal that traditional leaders appreciate their role in being part of the national recovery effort through being proactive and innovative.

src_text: dit was terselfdertyd n belowende teken dat tradi sionele leiers hul waardering van hul rol as deel van die nasionale herstelpoging toon deur proaktief en innoverend te wees.
tgt_text: the most fitting legacy of great leaders is that the seeds of development they sow during their tenure grow into mighty trees that protect and shelter their communities for posterity.

src_text: die mees gepaste nalaten skap van groot leiers is dat die saadjies van ontwikkeling wat hulle tydens hul bewind saai, uiteindelik groei tot groot, sterk bome wat hul gemeenskappe veilig hou en koester vir nageslagte daarna.
tgt_text: traditional leaders key to recovery efforts vukuzenzele unnamed in the last few months, we have had to bid a sad farewell to two of our country’s most respected traditional monarchs.

src_text: godsdienstige gemeenskap is onontbeerlik in die stryd teen kovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed baie suidafrikaners het onlangs saam met mense regoor die wêreld belangrike ge wyde feeste gevier.
tgt_text: religious community vital in the fight against covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed recently many south africans of faith have joined others across the world in important religious observances.

src_text: lede van die joodse geloof het pesach eerbiedig, chris tene vier paasfees en mos lems sal binnekort die hei lige maand van ramadan onderhou.
tgt_text: members of the jewish faith celebrated pesach, chris tians observed easter and muslims will soon be observing the holy month of ramadan.

src_text: vir die tweede agtereen volgende jaar word hierdie geleenthede gevier te midde van ’n vernietigende wêreld wye pandemie wat reeds die lewens van 2.5 miljoen mense regoor die wêreld geëis het.
tgt_text: for the second year, these occasions have been marked in the midst of a devastating global pandemic that has cost the lives of more than 2.5 million people across the world.

src_text: geloofsgebaseerde orga nisasies was sover onont beerlik in ons nasionale reaksie tot die siekte, nie net deur geestelike vertroosting en leiding te bied nie, maar ook deur te sorg vir diégene wat die kwesbaarste is vir die nagevolge van die pandemie, onder meer deur die verskaf fing van kos, huisvesting en ander maatskaplike dienste.
tgt_text: faithbased organisations have been vital to our national response to the disease, not only providing spiritual comfort and guidance, but also by caring for those most vulnerable to the effects of the pandemic, including through the provision of food, shelter and other social services.

src_text: geloof speel ’n belangrike rol in die lewens van mil joene suidafrikaners, en gesamentlike aanbidding as ’n geloofsgemeenskap speel ’n onontbeerlike rol in hulle godsdienstige uitlewing.
tgt_text: religion plays an important role in the lives of millions of south africans, and congregational worship forms a vital part of their religious practice.

src_text: om as ’n geloofsgemeens kap te kan vergader, is ook ’n welkome blaaskans te midde ’n tydperk van erge swaarkry vir individue, gesinne en ge meenskappe.
tgt_text: being able to gather for religious services is also a welcome respite from a period of great hardship for individuals, families and communities.

src_text: dit is te verstane dat na meer as ’n jaar van gebuk gaan onder beperkings op godsdienstige saamtrekke, die godsdienstige gemeens kap uitsien na ’n teken van normaliteit.
tgt_text: it is understandable that after more than a year of labouring under restrictions on religious gatherings that the faith community are keen for a return to a semblance of normality.

src_text: ter erkenning van die belangrikheid van gemeens kaplike aanbidding vir ons mense het die regering met die geloofsgemeenskap in gesprek getree.
tgt_text: in recognition of the importance of congregational worship to the lives of our people, government has been engaging with the faith community.

src_text: leiers van die geloofsge meenskap begryp en voorsien die gevaar van ’n nuwe vlaag van kovid19infeksies.
tgt_text: leaders of the faith community understand and appreciate the very real danger of a new wave of covid19 infections.

src_text: sedert die uitbreek van die pandemie het godsdienstige leiers proaktiewe en posi tiewe maatreëls in plek gestel om die verspreiding van die siekte onder aanbidders te beperk.
tgt_text: since the outbreak of the pandemic, religious organisations have taken proactive and positive measures to limit the spread of the disease among worshippers.

src_text: nog ’n belangrike faktor is dat godsdienstige orga nisasies wesenlike verliese tydens die onderskeie inper kingsvlakke gely het, wat gevolglik hul volhoubaar heid bedreig.
tgt_text: another important factor is that during the various alert levels, religious organisations have incurred substantial financial losses that threaten their sustainability.

src_text: as regering bly ons daartoe verbind om saam met die geloofsgemeenskap te werk om werkbare oplos sings te vind.
tgt_text: as government we remain committed to working with the faith community to find workable solutions.

src_text: terselfdertyd moet openba re gesondheid en veiligheid ons belangrikste oorweging bly.
tgt_text: at the same time, public health and safety must be our paramount consideration.

src_text: die geloofsgemeenskap het ondernemingsgees en inisiatief in hul aanbidding getoon in ’n tyd wat daar groot onsekerheid oor die gang van die pandemie was.
tgt_text: the religious community has shown innovation and initiative in the holding of worship at a time when there was a great deal of uncertainty over the trajectory of the pandemic.

src_text: byeenkomste is aanlyn ge hou en aanbidders is aange moedig om tuis te bid eerder as om dienste by te woon.
tgt_text: congregational services were held online and worshippers were encouraged to pray in their homes instead of attending services.

src_text: dit het baie bygedra tot die nasionale poging om die verspreiding van die virus te bekamp.
tgt_text: this greatly aided the national effort to contain the spread of the disease.

src_text: godsdienstige leiers speel ’n deurslaggewende rol daarin om die publiek aan te moedig om gesondheids maatreëls rakende belangrike gebruike en kulturele rituele, soos begrafnisse, na te kom.
tgt_text: religious leaders played a pivotal role in encouraging public adherence to health measures around important customary and cultural rituals like burials.

src_text: net so het ons mense ook hul verbintenis getoon om openbare gesondheidsmaat reëls en sosiale afstand te handhaaf.
tgt_text: by equal measure, our people have demonstrated their commitment to adhering to public health protocols and to social distancing.

src_text: hulle verstaan ook dat hulle moet voortgaan om groot skares te vermy.
tgt_text: and they correctly appreciate that they must continue to avoid large gatherings .

src_text: ons is nou in ’n tyd waar voorsorg belangriker as ooit is.
tgt_text: we are now at a time where precaution is needed above all.

src_text: die koronaviruspande mie is nog nie uitgewis nie, hetsy in ons eie land of in die wêreld.
tgt_text: the coronavirus pandemic has not been eliminated, either in our own country or around the world.

src_text: die gevaar van ’n derde vlaag is ’n werklikheid.
tgt_text: the threat of a third wave is real and everpresent.

src_text: internasionale ondervin ding het ons geleer dat ons nie die noodlot moet tart nie.
tgt_text: international experience has taught us that we should not tempt fate.

src_text: baie lande het hulle maatreëls, verslap, net om daarna weer ’n skerp toe name in infeksies te ervaar, wat dan die instelling van selfs strenger beperkings noodsaak.
tgt_text: many countries have eased restrictions, only for there to be resurgences, necessitating the imposition of even harsher restrictions.

src_text: groot byeenkomste, hetsy godsdienstig of andersins, het die potensiaal om die virus te versprei ongeag die toepassing van maatreëls oor sosiale afstand en ontsmet ting.
tgt_text: large gatherings, whether religious or otherwise, have the potential to spread the virus, despite the application of measures around social distancing and sanitising.

src_text: miljoene suidafrikaners onderhou deurlopend steeds ’n belangrike beginsel van hul geloof.
tgt_text: millions of south africans have been observing an important tenet of their faith.

src_text: in ’n land wat die reg tot godsdiensvry heid verskans, moet alles moontlik gedoen word om ons mense te ondersteun in die uitoefening van hierdie reg.
tgt_text: in a country that enshrines the right to religious freedom, all effort must be made to support our people in the exercise of this right.

src_text: en in die uitoefening van hierdie reg moet ons seker maak dat ons nie die regte of lewens van ander op die spel plaas nie.
tgt_text: and in exercising this right, we need to make sure that we do not place the rights or the lives of others at risk.

src_text: dit is ’n beginsel wat die godsdienstige leiers met wie ek gepraat het, ten volle begryp en ondersteun.
tgt_text: this is a principle that the religious leaders i met with fully support and appreciate.

src_text: hulle verstaan die verantwoorde likheid van alle gelowiges – inderdaad van alle suidafrikaners – om die praktiese maatreëls wat in plek gestel is om mense se gesondheid te beskerm en lewens te red, na te kom.
tgt_text: they understand the responsibility of all people of faith – indeed of all south africans – to observe the practical measures put in place to protect people’s health and save lives.

src_text: vir langer as ’n jaar het ons as samelewing saamgespan om die pandemie in bedwang te hou.
tgt_text: for more than a year, we have worked together as a society to contain this pandemic.

src_text: soos ons nou werk om dit te oorwin, moet ons ons gedeelde vasberadenheid herbevestig om versigtig en verantwoordelik op te tree.
tgt_text: now as we work to overcome it, we need to reaffirm our shared determination to act responsibly and cautiously.

src_text: deur dit te doen, sal ons prakties uitvoering gee aan die universele boodskap van hoop, redding, vryheid en solidariteit waarvan in die kerke, sinagoges, moskees en huise van ons land gepraat sal word in die dae en weke wat kom.
tgt_text: religious community vital in the fight against covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed recently many south africans of faith have joined others across the world in important religious observances.

src_text: durbanhawe skep 'n see vir sa van geleenthede vukuzenzele unnamed ek het onlangs die durbanhawe be soek om te gaan kyk na die werk wat verrig word om die hawe meer doeltreffend en mededin gend te maak.
tgt_text: port of durban creates a sea of opportunities for sa vukuzenzele unnamed recently, i visit ed the port of durban to see for myself the work being done to make the port more efficient and competitive.

src_text: ek het, na n inligtingsessie met transnet se senior be stuur, per sleepboot deur die hawe getoer.
tgt_text: after a briefing with the senior management of transnet, i toured the harbour in a pilot boat, which is usually used to guide large ships through the entrance channel to the pier.

src_text: sleepbote word gewoonlik gebruik om groot skepe deur die ingangskanaal na die dokke te begelei.
tgt_text: seeing the workings of the port from the water, one is reminded of its vast scale and complexity.

src_text: met dié dat ek die bedrywig hede in en om die hawe vanaf die water kon aanskou, het ek weereens die reuse omvang en ingewikkeldheid daarvan besef.
tgt_text: if the port does not function efficiently, the entire economy suffers, from importers and exporters to consumers.

src_text: as die hawe nie doeltreffend funksioneer nie, lei die hele ekonomie daaronder — van invoerders en uitvoerders tot verbruikers.
tgt_text: on the other hand, if the port works well it can drive economic growth and position our country as a gateway to the region and the continent.

src_text: aan die ander kant, as die hawe doeltreffend funksioneer kan dit ekonomiese groei dryf en ons ekonomie posisioneer as n poort tot die streek en ook die kontinent.
tgt_text: when i visited durban in october 2019, many local businesses and port users raised concerns with me about the performance of the durban port.

src_text: toe ek in oktober 2019 durban besoek het, het baie plaaslike besighede en gebruikers van die hawe hul besorgdheid oor die werksver rigting van die durbanhawe met my gedeel.
tgt_text: shipping companies, in particular, expressed concern about truck congestion and waiting times, ship berthing delays and anchorage times, poor maintenance of equipment and generally low productivity in the port.

src_text: skeepsmaatskappye, in besonder, het hul kommer uitgespreek oor verkeersop eenhopings met betrekking tot vervoertrokke en wagtye, vertragings in ankerlegging en verankering, swak in standhouding van toerusting en algemene lae produktiwiteit in die hawe.
tgt_text: my recent visit to the port was to check whether the commitments made in response to these concerns had been implemented.

src_text: my onlangse besoek aan die hawe was om te gaan kyk of die verbintenisse wat na aanleiding van dié kwessies aangegaan is, wel geïmple menteer is.
tgt_text: there has indeed been great progress over the past year in turning around the performance of the port, despite the impact of covid19.

src_text: daar is werklik oor die afge lope jaar groot vordering ge maak om die werksverrigting van die hawe om te swaai, ten spyte van kovid19 se impak.
tgt_text: these efforts are already showing results in improved maintenance of equipment, reduced congestion, quicker turnaround times and increased use of rail instead of road transport.

src_text: dié harde werk toon reeds resultate in die verbeterde in standhouding van toerusting, verminderde verkeersopeen hopings, korter omkeertye en meer gebruik van spoorver voer eerder as padvervoer.
tgt_text: while this is important progress, there is still much work to be done to position durban as a worldclass port and as a hub port for the southern hemisphere.

src_text: dié vordering is belangrik, maar daar is nog baie werk wat gedoen sal moet word om durban as n wêreldklashawe en middelpunt in die suidelike halfrond te posisioneer.
tgt_text: in recent years, the port has slipped from its position as first in africa to third, behind tangier in morocco and port said in egypt.

src_text: die hawe het oor die afge lope paar jaar van sy posisie as die nommer een hawe in afrika tot nommer drie gedaal; na tangier in morokko en port said in egipte.
tgt_text: truck turnaround times have greatly improved.

src_text: omkeertye in trokvervoer het reuse vordering getoon.
tgt_text: similarly, the reliability of cargo handling equipment has improved to 80% and is heading towards at least 95% to meet international benchmarks.

src_text: so ook het die betroubaarheid van skeepsladingtoerusting tot 80% verbeter en is dit vinnig oppad na minstens 95% om internasionale standaarde te haal.
tgt_text: ship waiting times have reduced to impressive levels.

src_text: skeepswagtye het tot in drukwekkende vlakke gedaal.
tgt_text: these statistics may seem technical and obscure, but they have a direct impact on the growth of our economy and on the prices we pay as consumers.

src_text: dié statistieke mag dalk teg nies en duister voorkom, maar dit het n direkte invloed op ons ekonomiese groei en op die pryse wat ons as verbruikers betaal.
tgt_text: we have made improving the efficiency of our ports a priority of operation vulindlela and have focused on rebuilding transnet, which is one of our valued stateowned enterprises.

src_text: ons het die verbetering van die doeltreffendheid van ons hawens as deel van operasie vulindlela n prioriteit gemaak en fokus daarop om trans net, een van ons waardevolle staatsbeheerde onderne mings, te herbou.
tgt_text: the new management of transnet and its operating divisions are resolutely focused on turning the performance of the port around.

src_text: transnet se nuwe bestuur en hul bedryfsafdelings is spits gefokus op die omkeer van die hawe se werksverrigting.
tgt_text: the management has ambitious and exciting expansion plans for all five of the port’s precincts.

src_text: die bestuur het ambisieuse en opwindende planne vir die uitbreiding vir al vyf van die hawe se pole.
tgt_text: these include the deepening of the maydon wharf channel to allow larger, modern vessels to enter the port, the infill of pier 1 and pier 2 to create additional capacity for con tainers and the development of a new container terminal in the point precinct.

src_text: dit sluit in die verdieping van die maydonkaai om groter, meer moderne skepe in staat te stel om die hawe binne te vaar, die invulling van pier 1 en pier 2 om ekstra kapasiteit te skep vir houers, en die ontwikkeling van n nuwe hou erterminaal in die pointpool.
tgt_text: altogether, the expansion of infrastructure at the port will require r100 billion in new investment over the next decade and more.

src_text: die uitbreiding van die hawe sal altesaam r100 miljard in nuwe beleggings oor die volgende dekade en langer benodig.
tgt_text: this will completely transform the port, expanding its capacity for container handling from 2.9 million units to more than 11 million units.

src_text: dit gaan die hawe heeltemal van gedaante laat verwissel en sy kapasiteit vir die hantering van skeepshou ers verhoog van 2.9 miljoen eenhede tot meer as 11 mil joen eenhede.
tgt_text: these ambitious plans will require greater private sector participation and investment.

src_text: dié ambisieuse planne gaan groter deelname en belegging van die privaatsektor vereis.
tgt_text: transnet, including the durban port, is an important national asset belonging to the people of south africa.

src_text: transnet, waaronder die durbanhawe, is n belangrike nasionale bate wat aan die mense van suidafrika be hoort.
tgt_text: partnerships with the private sector are crucial to bring new investment, technology and expertise to port operations and to modernise equipment and infrastructure.

src_text: vennootskappe met die pri vaatsektor is noodsaaklik om nuwe beleggings, tegnologie en kundigheid tot hawebedry wighede by te dra en om die toerusting en infrastruktuur te moderniseer.
tgt_text: transnet is planning, for example, to advertise a concession later this year to build and operate the new point terminal.

src_text: transnet beplan byvoorbeeld om later vanjaar n konsessie te adverteer om die nuwe pointterminaal te bou en te bestuur.
tgt_text: this will bring in private investment and improve the efficiency of container handling.

src_text: ons leef in n land waar al mal toegelaat word om hul kultuur en tradisies vrylik uit te leef.
tgt_text: we live in a country where everyone is permitted to freely practise their culture and traditions.

src_text: dit is n land waar enig iemand vrylik en op enige plek ter ondersteuning van maatskaplike, politieke en ander sake kan betoog.
tgt_text: it is a country where anyone can freely protest in support of social, political and other causes anywhere.

src_text: ons grondwetlike bedeling is geskoei op n aanspreeklike regering waar die uitvoeren de raad rekenskap aan die mense verskuldig is en waar die parlement verteenwoor digend van die mense is.
tgt_text: our constitutional dispensation is premised on accountable government, where the executive is answerable to the people and where parliament is representative of the people.

src_text: dit is n land waar die reg gelyk op enige burger toepas lik is.
tgt_text: it is a country where the law applies equally to any citizen.

src_text: ons het nou n regering van die mense, vir die mense en deur die mense.
tgt_text: we now have a government of the people, for the people and by the people.

src_text: die apartheidsregime het, toe hy triomfantlik sy ras sistiese grondwet 60 jaar gelede voor die wêreld geparadeer het, misplaaste vertroue gehad dat dit in stand sou bly.
tgt_text: when the apartheid regime triumphantly paraded its racist constitution to the world 60 years ago, it had misplaced confidence that it would endure.

src_text: nelson mandela het, n maand voor dat die republiek verklaar is, in n brief aan verwoerd wat nie beantwoord was nie, die bevrydingsbeweging se verwerping van die blanke republiek wat met geweld afgedwing is, verklaar.
tgt_text: in an unanswered letter to verwoerd a month before the republic was declared, nelson mandela affirmed the liberation movement’s rejection of the forcibly imposed white republic.

src_text: hy het gesê dat geen grondwet of vorm van rege ring waarop daar besluit is sonder die deelname van die afrikamense, morele geldig heid sou geniet nie.
tgt_text: he said that no constitution or form of government decided without the participation of the african people would enjoy moral validity.

src_text: trouens, geen stelsel wat die stelselmatige ontkenning van mense se regte verskans, kan volhou word nie.
tgt_text: indeed no system that entrenches the systematic denial of people’s rights can be sustained.

src_text: ons het uiteindelik ons vryheid gewen, alhoewel dit meer as drie dekades sou neem voordat daar aan die eise van die bevrydingsbeweging voldoen is.
tgt_text: though it would be over three decades before the demands of the liberation movement were met, we eventually won our freedom.

src_text: ons het, toe ons die apart heidsgrondwet na die asblik van geskiedenis verban het, onsself verbind tot n nuwe grondwet en n nuwe stel waardes.
tgt_text: in relegating the apartheid constitution to the dustbin of history, we committed ourselves to a new constitution and a new set of values.

src_text: toe ek 25 jaar gelede die grondwetlike vergadering aangespreek het, het ek gesê dat ons grondwet meer as woorde op papier moet word; dit moet n werklikheid in ons mense se lewens word.
tgt_text: when i addressed the constitutional assembly 25 years ago, i said our constitution must become more than words on a page; it must become a reality in the lives of our people.

src_text: dié progressiewe en re volusionêre dokument sal ontoepaslik en niksseggend word as ons dit nie doen nie.
tgt_text: unless we do so, this progressive and revolutionary document will be rendered irrelevant and meaningless.

src_text: ons het lank reeds besluit watter tipe samelewing ons wil wees.
tgt_text: we have long decided what kind of society we want to be.

src_text: dit is n samelewing geskoei op menswaardig heid, gelykheid, vryheid en niediskriminasie.
tgt_text: it is a society rooted in human dignity, equality, freedom and nondiscrimination.

src_text: ons het vir n kwarteeu daaraan gewerk om so n sa melewing te ontwikkel.
tgt_text: for a quarter of a century we have worked to build such a society.

src_text: ons het onbetwisbaar gevorder, maar ons het steeds baie uit dagings en daar is baie werk wat nog gedoen moet word.
tgt_text: we have made undeniable progress, but we still have many challenges and there is much work still to be done.

src_text: kom ons dink aan hoe beslissend die breek met die stelsel wat deur rassisme, uit buiting, onteiening en onder drukking onderstut is en wat voorheen geseëvier het, was wanneer ons die herdenking vier van ons demokratiese grondwet se goedkeuring.
tgt_text: as we mark the anniversary of the adoption of our democratic constitution, let us remember what a decisive break it was with the system underpinned by racism, exploitation, dispossession and oppression that had come before.

src_text: kom ons onthou ook dat dit van ons afhang om die visie in die grondwet n werklik heid te maak, want dit is slegs deur te verseker dat alle suidafrikaners in staat is om hul grondwetlike regte vrylik en ten volle uit te leef dat ons werklik n verenigde nasie kan word.
tgt_text: sa strives to realise the vision of the constitution vukuzenzele unnamed sixty years ago, on 31 may 1961, apartheid south africa became a republic, cutting its ties with the british empire.

src_text: die jeug is ons grootste bate vukuzenzele unnamed op 16 junie 1976 het die jeug van so weto en ander dele van die land opge staan teen die gru wel van bantoe onderwys.
tgt_text: the youth are our greatest asset vukuzenzele unnamed on june 16th 1976, the youth of soweto and other parts of the country rose up against the iniquity of bantu education.

src_text: op daardie dag en die dae wat daarop sou volg, het baie mense hulle lewens verloor.
tgt_text: on that day and in the days that followed, many lost their lives.

src_text: hulle is vermoor deur ‘n hartelose regering wat bitter min omgegee het vir swart lewens, en wat niks daarvan gedink het nie om met geweervuur los te brand op ongewapende kinders in skoolklere nie.
tgt_text: they were killed by a callous regime that had little regard for black lives and thought nothing of opening fire on unarmed, uniformed schoolchildren.

src_text: hierdie gebeure het die internasionale sentiment teen die apartheidsregering versterk en verdere stukrag aan die bevrydingstryd verleen.
tgt_text: these events hardened international opinion against the apartheid regime and gave further impetus to the liberation struggle.

src_text: jong mense het nog altyd die voortou geneem in sosiale verset van die antioutoritêre optogte in latynsamerika in die laat 1950’s tot die betogings regoor afrika in die laat 1960’s.
tgt_text: young people have always been at the forefront of social protest, from the antiauthoritarian protests in latin america in the late 1950s, to the protests across africa in the late 1960s.

src_text: die geskiedenis het die bydrae van die generasie van 1976 tot die internasionale studentebeweging en sy standpunt teen onderdrukking en onregverdigheid getrou opgeteken.
tgt_text: history faithfully records the contribution of the generation of 1976 to the international student movement and its stance against oppression and injustice.

src_text: hierdie historiese gebeurtenis 45 jaar gelede word nog steeds regoor afrika en die wêreld herdenk.
tgt_text: this historic event 45 years ago continues to be commemorated across africa and the world.

src_text: daarom is dit ontstellend dat kennis oor 16 junie besig is om af te neem onder jong suidafrikaners.
tgt_text: it is therefore disturbing that knowledge of june 16th is diminishing among young south africans.

src_text: dit gebeur veral onder die sogenaamde generasie z, die jong mense wat tussen 1997 en 2015 gebore is.
tgt_text: this is particularly so among the socalled generation z, or young people born between 1997 and 2015. the 2019/2020 south african social attitudes survey published by the human sciences research council found that close to 40% of generation z has not heard of the historical events of june 16th.

src_text: die 2019/2020 suidafrikaanse sosialehoudingsopname wat deur die raad vir geesteswetenskaplike navorsing (rgn) gepubliseer is, het bevind dat byna 40% van generasie z nie weet van die historiese gebeure van 16 junie nie.
tgt_text: a similar percentage has heard about it but knows very little or nothing about it.

src_text: ‘n soortgelyke persentasie het daarvan gehoor, maar weet baie min of niks daaromtrent nie.
tgt_text: nevertheless, the survey also found that young people of this generation are open to learning about key historical events and believe in their continued importance.

src_text: desondanks het die opname bevind dat jong mense van hierdie generasie bereid is om meer te leer oor sleutel historiese gebeure en ook glo in die voortgesette belangrikheid daarvan.
tgt_text: we need to do more as a country to ensure that the message of 1976 is transmitted faithfully.

src_text: ons as ‘n land moet meer doen om seker te maak dat die boodskap van 1976 getrou oorgedra word.
tgt_text: this is a collective responsibility of government, schools, tertiary institutions, parents, families, musicians, artists, and all of society.

src_text: dit is die regering, skole, tersiêre instellings, ouers, families, musikante, kunstenaars en die hele samelewing se gesamentlike verantwoordelikheid.
tgt_text: the generation that was born after apartheid ended inherited a country with a democratic constitution and where fundamental freedoms are protected.

src_text: die generasie wat gebore is nadat apartheid beëindig is, het ‘n land geërf met ‘n demokratiese grondwet waar fundamentele vryhede beskerm word.
tgt_text: the opportunities young black people have today are both vastly different and greatly improved.

src_text: die geleenthede wat jong swartmense vandag het, verskil hemelsbreed van die verlede en het groot veran deringe ondergaan.
tgt_text: keeping the story of june 16th alive is a reminder to today’s generation of the great sacrifices made to secure their freedom.

src_text: deur die storie van 16 junie lewendig te hou, dien dit as ‘n herinnering aan vandag se generasie van die groot opofferings wat gemaak is om hulle vryheid te bewerkstellig.
tgt_text: youth day is a reminder of the immense power and agency that young people have to create a better future for themselves.

src_text: jeugdag is ‘n herinnering aan die ontsaglike krag en bemiddeling waaroor jong mense beskik om vir hulleself ‘n beter toekoms te skep.
tgt_text: the struggles of young people in south africa today are many.

src_text: vandag se jong mense beleef baie struikelblokke.
tgt_text: young people have remained at the forefront of activism, whether in pursuit of free education or against social ills like genderbased violence.

src_text: jong mense bly steeds aan die voorpunt van aktivisme, ongeag of dit in die strewe na gratis opvoeding of teen maatskaplike euwels soos geslaggebaseerde geweld is.
tgt_text: today the greatest struggle young people wage is against unemployment, which has worsened under the covid19 pandemic.

src_text: die grootste stryd wat jong mense vandag stry, is teen werkloosheid, wat onder die covid19pandemie toegeneem het.
tgt_text: creating more opportunities for young people, and access to these opportunities, is government’s foremost priority.

src_text: die regering se eerste prioriteit is om meer geleenthede, sowel as toegang daartoe, vir ons jong mense te skep.
tgt_text: everything that we do as a government contributes towards improving the lives of young people.

src_text: alles wat ons as ‘n regering doen, dra by tot die verbetering van die lewens van jong mense.
tgt_text: tackling youth unemployment requires accelerating economic growth, particularly in labourintensive sectors, and building the capability of the state to fulfil its developmental role.

src_text: om werkloosheid onder die jeug aan te pak, vereis versnelde ekonomiese groei, veral in arbeidsintensiewe sektore, sowel as die uitbouing van die staat se vermoë om sy ontwikkelingsrol te vervul.
tgt_text: we are also driving this agenda through targeted interventions.

src_text: ons bevorder hierdie agenda deur teikenintervensies.
tgt_text: these include the presidential employment stimulus, which has provided work opportunities and livelihoods support for many young people.

src_text: dit sluit in die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus, wat werksgeleenthede en lewensonderhoud aan baie jong mense verskaf het.
tgt_text: we have launched a range of additional measures to create opportunities, enhance skills development, support young entrepreneurs and enable the full participation of young people in the economy.

src_text: ons het ‘n reeks addisionele maatreëls in plek gestel om geleenthede te skep, vaardigheidsontwikkeling te verbeter, jong entrepreneurs te ondersteun en jong mense in staat te stel om ten volle by die ekonomie in te skakel.
tgt_text: this includes the establishment of a national pathway management network, sa youth, to make it easier for young people to view and access opportunities and receive active support to find pathways into the labour market.

src_text: dit sluit in die vestiging van ‘n nasionale roetebestuursnetwerk, sa jeug, wat dit makliker moet maak vir jong mense om geleenthede raak te sien en te benut, en om aktiewe ondersteuning te kry om roetes na die arbeidsmark te betree.
tgt_text: these are among the priorities of the presidential youth employment intervention, which was launched just weeks before we entered a national lockdown last year and which is now entering full implementation.

src_text: laasgenoemde is enkele van die presidensiele jeugindiensnemingsintervensie se prioriteite, wat slegs weke voor die nasionale inperking verlede jaar bekendgestel is en wat tans ten volle geïmplementeer word.
tgt_text: the presidential youth employment intervention was built on the understanding that addressing the youth unemployment crisis requires innovative thinking and strong partnerships across society.

src_text: die presidensiële jeugindiensnemingsintervensie is gebou op die verstandhouding dat die oplossing vir die jeug se werkloosheidskrisis innoverende denke en sterk vennootskappe regoor die samelewing vereis.
tgt_text: its ultimate objective is to find models that work, whether in skills development or active labour market policies, and to scale these rapidly to reach as many young people as possible.

src_text: die uiteindelike doelwit is om modelle te kry wat werk, of dit nou in vaardigheidsontwikkeling is of aktiewe arbeidsmarkbeleide, en om dit vinnig te skaleer sodat soveel as moontlik jongmense bereik word.
tgt_text: most importantly, it recognises that young people must be at the centre of any effort to boost youth employment.

src_text: die belangrikste is dat die presidensiële jeugindiensnemingsintervensie erken dat jong mense sentraal moet staan in enige poging om jeugindiensneming ‘n hupstoot te gee.
tgt_text: young people are our greatest asset, and our greatest weapon in this fight.

src_text: jong mense is ons grootste bate en ons grootste wapen in hierdie stryd.
tgt_text: we salute the resilience of every young person playing their part to build and develop this country.

src_text: ons salueer die veerkragtigheid van elke jong persoon wat hulle deel doen om hierdie land op te bou en te ontwikkel.
tgt_text: they are the young people volunteering in our communities, building our country through the presidential employment stimulus, running their own businesses and studying to better themselves.

src_text: hulle is die jong mense wat vrywilligerwerk in ons gemeenskappe doen en ons land opbou deur die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus, wat hulle eie besighede bedryf en studeer om hulleself beter te bekwaam.
tgt_text: they are the young people who are forging their own path and bringing their families along with them.

src_text: hulle is die jong mense wat hulle eie paadjie uitkap en hulle gesinne saam met hulle neem.
tgt_text: we salute young people who keep working to improve their lives.

src_text: ons salueer jong mense wat aanhou werk om hulle lewens te verbeter.
tgt_text: young people are doing their part; they need government, and indeed all of society, to do ours.

src_text: jong mense doen hulle deel.
tgt_text: our country is going through the most difficult of times, but we are working daily to expand the frontiers of hope.

src_text: hulle het nodig dat die regering, en weliswaar die hele samelewing, hulle deel doen.
tgt_text: we are seeing the green shoots of growth in our economy, and are confident this will translate to better opportunities for all.

src_text: ons land gaan deur een van die moeilikste tye nog, maar ons werk daagliks daaraan om die grense van hoop uit te brei.
tgt_text: the youth are our greatest asset vukuzenzele unnamed on june 16th 1976, the youth of soweto and other parts of the country rose up against the iniquity of bantu education.

src_text: sterker soe’s moet ekonomiese groei en transformasie aandryf vukuzenzele unnamed suidafrika se onder nemings in staats besit (soe’s) word op die voorgrond al jare lank merendeels met staatskaping, finan siële wanbestuur en onbe kwaamheid vereenselwig.
tgt_text: soes must drive economic growth and transformation vukuzenzele unnamed for some years now, south africa’s stateowned enterprises (soes) have mostly been associated in the public eye with state capture, financial mismanagement and inefficiency.

src_text: benewens die gereelde finansiële inspuitings wat sommige van die land se grootste en belangrikste soe’s vanaf die regering benodig, sukkel hulle boonop om hul mandate na te kom.
tgt_text: in addition to needing regular bailouts from government, some of the country’s biggest and most important stateowned companies have been struggling to meet their mandates.

src_text: hierdie soe’s behoort aan die spits van ekonomiese en gemeenskaplike transformasie te staan.
tgt_text: these soes should be at the forefront of economic and social transformation.

src_text: hulle is daarvoor verantwoordelik om die infrastruktuur en dienste te verskaf waarop die ekonomie staatmaak, hetsy dit elektrisiteitsopwekking, pendelaarvervoer, waterverskaffing, vraglogistiek of telekommunikasie is.
tgt_text: they are responsible for providing the infrastructure and the services on which the economy depends, whether it be in the generation of electricity, commuter transport, water provision, freight logistics or telecommunications.

src_text: daar word aan ons benadering tot staatsbesit gestalte gegee deur die behoefte aan belangrike netwerkbedrywe wat doeltreffend funksioneer, soos energie en hawens, en die behoefte om te verseker dat daar aan die basiese behoeftes van alle suidafrikaners, veral die behoeftiges, voldoen kan word.
tgt_text: our approach to state ownership is informed by the need for the effective functioning of key network industries, such as energy and ports, and by the need to ensure that the basic needs of all south africans, particularly the poor, can be met.

src_text: ons glo vas dat staatseienaarskap in kernsektore van die ekonomie nodig is en dat die land sterk soe’s benodig wat ekonomiese groei en transformasie kan aandryf.
tgt_text: we firmly believe that public ownership is necessary in critical sectors of the economy and that the country needs robust soes that are able to drive economic growth and transformation.

src_text: dit is veral die geval in die lewering van staatsgoedere soos elektrisiteit en water waar soe’s in staat is om n ontwikkelingsmandaat in die openbare belang, teenoor n uitsluitlik kommersiële een, na te streef.
tgt_text: this is particularly the case in the delivery of public goods such as electricity and water, where soes are able to pursue a developmental mandate in the public interest as opposed to a purely commercial one.

src_text: dit is waarom ons die ommeswaai van hierdie ondernemings n regeringsprioriteit gemaak het – om korrupsie met wortel en tak uit te roei, hul bestuur te verbeter en hul in staat te stel om hul nodige rol te speel om ekonomiese groei en werkskepping aan te spoor.
tgt_text: that is why we have made it a priority of this government to turn these companies around to root out corruption, improve their governance and enable them to play the role they should in driving economic growth and employment creation.

src_text: ons het, met dié doel voor oë, n aantal verbeterings onderneem om hierdie soe’s te versterk sodat hulle die resultate wat die land benodig en verwag, kan lewer.
tgt_text: to this end, we have embarked upon a number of reforms to strengthen these soes so that they can produce the results that the country needs and expects.

src_text: een van die belangrikste verbeterings is in die energiesektor.
tgt_text: one of the most important reforms is in the energy sector.

src_text: ons het die proses begin om eskom te herstruktureer in drie soe’s wat verantwoordelik is vir onderskeidelik opwekking, geleiding en verspreiding.
tgt_text: we have begun the process of restructuring eskom into three different soes, responsible for generation, transmission and distribution, respectively.

src_text: die rede hiervoor is dat die vorige struktuur van eskom nie gepas was vir die veranderende energielandskap nie – dit het ondoeltreffend en duur geword en was nie deursigtig genoeg nie.
tgt_text: this is because the previous structure of eskom was illsuited for a changing energy landscape.

src_text: die spesifieke vestiging van n geleidingsentiteit sal beteken dat eskom in staat sal wees om krag vanaf n wyer reeks verskaffers, beide privaat en vanaf die staat, aan te koop.
tgt_text: it had become inefficient and costly and was not sufficiently transparent.

src_text: dit sal deursigtigheid verbeter, mededingendheid verhoog en die aankoop van elektrisiteit teen die laagste koste bevorder.
tgt_text: the establishment of a transmission entity in particular will mean that eskom will be able to purchase power from a broader range of providers, both private and public.

src_text: daar was beduidende privaat belegging in kragopwekking as deel van die program vir die verkryging van hernubare energie van onafhanklike kragprodusente (reippp).
tgt_text: this will improve transparency, increase competitiveness and promote the purchase of lowestcost electricity.

src_text: ons kan selfs meer privaat beleggings verwag met die voorstel om lisensiëringsvrystelling vir vasgelegde geleiding – waar maatskappye vir hulself en ander kommersiële verbruikers elektrisiteit vervaardig – van 1mw tot 100mw te verhoog.
tgt_text: through the renewable energy independent power producers programme, there has been significant private investment in energy generation.

src_text: dit is van kernbelang op n tydstip wat die land weens erge en volgehoue elektrisiteitstekorte swaarkry en waar nóg eskom nóg die regering in staat is om in nuwe opwekkingskapasiteit te belê.
tgt_text: with the proposal to raise the licencing exemption for embedded generation – where companies produce electricity for themselves and other commercial users – from 1mw to 100mw, we can expect even more private investment.

src_text: dit is belangrik dat dié verbeterings ook aan eskom die ruimte sal gun om sy finansiële en bestuursuitdagings aan te spreek.
tgt_text: this is vital at a time when the country is suffering from severe and sustained electricity shortages and where neither eskom nor the state is able to invest in new generation capacity.

src_text: nóg n belangrike verbetering is die vestiging van die nasionale haweowerheid as n onafhanklike filiaalmaatskappy van transnet.
tgt_text: importantly, these reforms will give eskom the space to address its financial and operational challenges.

src_text: dit is n deurslaggewende deel van transnet se breedvoerige strategie om nuwe lewe te blaas in ons logistiekinfrastruktuur.
tgt_text: another critical reform is the establishment of the national ports authority as an independent subsidiary of transnet.

src_text: transnet beplan om oor die volgende vyf jaar r100 miljard in die opgradering van sy infrastruktuur regoor die hawestelsel te belê.
tgt_text: this a crucial part of transnet’s broader strategy to revitalise our logistics infrastructure.

src_text: dit sal ons hawens meer doeltreffend en ons uitvoere meer mededingend maak en die hele ekonomie bevoordeel.
tgt_text: transnet plans to invest r100 billion over the next five years in upgrading its infrastructure across the ports system.

src_text: vir die gewone verbruiker beteken dit verlaagde pryse op baie van ons goedere oor die langtermyn.
tgt_text: this will make our ports more efficient and our exports more competitive, and benefit the entire economy.

src_text: vir ons uitvoerders sal dit meer mededingendheid in wêreldmarkte beteken.
tgt_text: for the ordinary consumer, it will mean reduced prices in the long term for many of our goods.

src_text: ons ekonomie sal uitbrei en meer werke skep namate ons uitvoere groei.
tgt_text: for our exporters, it will mean greater competitiveness in global markets.

src_text: meer doeltreffende hawens sal die hele ekonomie beter laat werk – ’n styging in hawevolumes sal lei tot groter werkskepping in die hawens self.
tgt_text: as our exports grow, our economy will expand and create more jobs.

src_text: die vestiging van die nasionale haweowerheid as n transnetfiliaalmaatskappy met sy eie raad sal, onder meer, beteken dat inkomste wat deur die hawens gegenereer word, gebruik kan word om ou toerusting te vervang en ons hawens op te gradeer en uit te brei – werk wat vir meer as n dekade vertraag is.
tgt_text: more efficient ports will make the entire economy work better – and as port volumes increase, jobs will be created at the ports themselves.

src_text: dié verbeterings sal onder meer meer privaat belegging in die land se ekonomiese infrastruktuur aanspoor.
tgt_text: establishing the national ports authority as a transnet subsidiary with its own board will, among other things, mean that revenues generated by the ports can be used to replace old equipment and upgrade and expand our ports, work which has been delayed for more than a decade.
