src_text: sommige mense het kommer uitgespreek dat dit die belangrikheid of waarde van soe’s sal verminder – inderwaarheid sal dit die teenoorgestelde tot gevolg hê.
tgt_text: among other things, these reforms will encourage greater private investment in the country’s economic infrastructure.

src_text: dié verbeterings sal verseker dat ons soe’s meer doeltreffend sal word en die bedrywe wat deur hulle ondersteun word meer mededingend sal word, terwyl strategiese infrastruktuur steeds stewig in staatsbesit bly.
tgt_text: some people have expressed concerns that this will diminish the importance or reduce the value of soes.

src_text: dié verbeterings is ook belangrik om te verseker dat soe’s hul breër ontwikkelingsmandate implementeer om alle landsburgers en die ekonomie te ondersteun.
tgt_text: in fact, the contrary is true.

src_text: ons beleid bly dat soe’s n belangrike ontwikkelingsrol moet speel in die ondersteuning van ons ekonomiese groei.
tgt_text: these reforms will ensure that while strategic infrastructure remains firmly in state hands, our soes will become more efficient and the industries they support will become more competitive.

src_text: ons taak is om hulle op goeie voet te plaas sodat hulle hul uiteindelike aandeelhouers – suidafrikaners – kan dien.
tgt_text: soes must drive economic growth and transformation vukuzenzele unnamed for some years now, south africa’s stateowned enterprises (soes) have mostly been associated in the public eye with state capture, financial mismanagement and inefficiency.

src_text: steun vir besighede en werkers vukuzenzele unnamed om n besigheid te begin en te bedryf is baie soos om n gesin groot te maak.
tgt_text: support for businesses and workers vukuzenzele unnamed starting and building a business is a lot like raising a family.

src_text: dit neem van kleintyd tot volwassenheid tyd, geduld, volgehoue ondersteuning en koestering.
tgt_text: it takes time, patience, con stant support and consistent nurturing from infancy to maturity.

src_text: dit is vir baie besigheidseie naars hartverskeurend om te sien hoe die besigheid wat jy van niks af begin het en opgebou het, nou sukkel om aan die gang te bly of sy deure moet sluit.
tgt_text: for many business owners, seeing a business that you grew from scratch struggling to survive, or even being forced to close its doors, is heartbreaking.

src_text: dit is egter sedert uitbreek van die kovid19pandemie die situasie waarin baie besig hede — groot én klein — hulself bevind; nie net in ons land nie, maar regoor die wêreld.
tgt_text: since the onset of the covid19 pandemic, this has sadly been the situation facing many businesses both large and small, not just in our country but around the world.

src_text: die pandemie en die maatreëls wat ons moes instel om die verspreiding van die virus te bekamp, het n nadelige impak op besighede gehad.
tgt_text: the pandemic and the meas ures we have had to take to contain the spread of the virus have had a detrimental impact on businesses.

src_text: ons het, soos wat ons die pandemie hanteer, gepoog om n bewysgebaseerde benadering te volg, beide in beleid en praktyk, deur wetenskaplike navorsing, kliniese deskundigheid en vermoëns en daarmee saam ook die impak van die pandemie op alle dele van die bevolking, in oorweging te bring.
tgt_text: in dealing with the pandemic we have sought to adopt an evidencebased approach in both policy and practice, con sidering scientific research, clinical expertise and capabil ities, and impact on all sectors of the population.

src_text: ons het gepoog om n balans tussen die red van lewens en die red van mense se lewensbestaan, te handhaaf.
tgt_text: we have sought to have a balance between saving lives and preserving livelihoods.

src_text: ons het gepoog om die impak van die opeenvolgende inper kingbeperkings op mense se lewensbestaan te versag en terselfdertyd die risiko van n tweede en selfs erger armoedeen hongersnoodepidemie in die toekoms te vermy.
tgt_text: we have sought to mitigate the impact of the successive lockdown restrictions on people’s livelihoods, or risk a second and possibly worse epidemic of poverty and hunger in future.

src_text: ons het laasjaar, aan die begin van die pandemie, maat reëls soos die kovid19 tydelike werkgewer/werknemerverligtingskema (ters), die kovid19leningswaarborgskema en verskeie ander meganismes ingestel om klein besighede te ondersteun en onmiddellike, korttermynverligting aan werknemers en besigheidseienaars te bied.
tgt_text: in the earliest days last year, we introduced measures such as the covid temporary employer/employee relief scheme (ters), the covid19 loan guarantee scheme and various mechanisms to support small businesses to provide immediate and shortterm relief to burdened employees and business owners.

src_text: daarbenewens het die spesiale kovid19 maatskaplike noodverligtingstoelaag tesame met meer breedvoerige bestaande maatskaplike toelaes n lewenslyn aan behoeftige individue en gesinne gebied.
tgt_text: in addition, the special covid19 social relief of distress grant and broadening access to existing social grants provided lifelines to indigent individuals and families.

src_text: dit was, deur dié ingrypings, vir ons moontlik om die ergste gevolge van die pandemie te versag, die sluiting van baie besighede en daarmee saam ver dere werksverliese, te vermy.
tgt_text: through these interventions we were able to mitigate the worst effects of the pandemic, preventing the closure of many businesses and the loss of even further jobs.

src_text: dié ingrypings het n stewige basis vir die ekonomiese heropbouen herstelplan wat ons in oktober laasjaar geloods het, gevorm.
tgt_text: they pro vided a firm foundation for the economic reconstruction and recovery plan that we launched in october last year.

src_text: ons het die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus as deel van daardie plan gestig om inkomsteen lewensbestaansteun aan miljoene begunstigdes te verskaf.
tgt_text: as part of that plan, we introduced the presidential employment stimulus to provide income and livelihood support to millions of beneficiaries.

src_text: meer as 300 000 jongmense is, danksy dié stimulus, as skoolassistente aangestel.
tgt_text: through the stimulus, over 300 000 young people have been placed as school assistants.

src_text: meer as 100 000 bestaansboere is op die eerste databasis van sy soort geregi streer, waar hulle toegang tot tegniese steun het.
tgt_text: more than 100 000 subsistence farmers are registered on the firstever database of its kind where they have access to technical support.

src_text: meer as 30 000 jongmense is geleenthede in die kulturele, kreatiewe en sportsektore gegun.
tgt_text: more than 30 000 young people have been given opportunities in the cultural, creative and sports sectors.

src_text: jong beroepsmense is geleenthede in infrastruktuurontwikkeling, gesondheidsorg, omgewingsbewaring en n aantal ander sektore, gegun.
tgt_text: young professionals have been given opportunities in infrastructure development, healthcare, environmental conservation and a number of other sectors.

src_text: daar is belowende tekens dat ons ekonomie voortdurend herstel, met groei en werkskepping in n aantal sektore, van ver vaardiging tot mynwese en landbou.
tgt_text: there are promising indi cations that our economy is steadily recovering, with growth and job creation in a number of sectors, from manufacturing to mining to agriculture.

src_text: ons weet terselfdertyd dat dié "groter prentjie" nie veel van n vertroosting vir werkers en besigheidseienaars is wat in die afgelope jaar en n half vreeslik swaargekry het en gehoop het om n verbetering in hul omstandighede te sien met die stadige heropening van die ekonomie, nie.
tgt_text: at the same time we know that this ‘bigger picture’ is cold comfort to workers and business owners who have suffered immeasurably over the past year and a half, and were hoping to see their situa tions improve as the economy slowly opened up.

src_text: die blitsige styging in infeksies wat deur die nuwe deltavariant aangevuur word, het strenger beperkings op, onder meer, die beweging van mense, die bedryf van sekere soorte besighede en openbare byeenkomste vereis.
tgt_text: the rapid rise in infections being fueled by the new delta variant necessitated the imposing of tighter restric tions on the movement of persons, on the operation of certain businesses and on public gatherings, among others.

src_text: dié besluite was nie maklik om te maak nie, gedagtig aan die impak wat dit op mense se lewensbestaan sou hê.
tgt_text: these were not been easy decisions to make, mindful of their impact on people’s livelihoods.

src_text: ons het, net soos wat ons aan die begin van die pandemie gedoen het, met al ons maatskaplike vennote en die handel, arbeiden burgerlike samelewing beraadslaag om te sien watter vol houbare finansiële maatreëls ons kon instel om besighede en mense in nood in dié tyd te ondersteun.
tgt_text: just as we did at the beginning of the pandemic, we engaged in deliberations with all social partners, business, labour and civil society to see what financially sustainable measures we could intro duce to support businesses and individuals in distress at this time.

src_text: die onderhandelinge by die nasionale ekonomiese, ontwikkelingsen arbeidsraad het tot n konsensus gelei dat die mees praktiese en volhoubare finansiële maatreël wat drin gende verligting kan bring, die verlenging van die kovid19 tersskema in sektore wat deur die aangepaste waarsku wingsvlak 4beperkings geraak word, is.
tgt_text: the negotiations at the national economic development and labour council resulted in consen sus that the most practical and financially sustainable measure that can provide urgent relief is extending the covid19 ters scheme to sectors that have been affected by the adjusted level 4 restrictions.

src_text: ons het, as ondersteuning vir besighede, die geldigheid van hulle bedryfslisensies en per mitte wat tussen maart 2020 en junie 2021 verval het, tot 31 desember 2022 verleng.
tgt_text: to support businesses whose operating licenses and per mits expired between march 2020 and june 2021, we are extending their validity until 31 december 2022. in addition, new business licenses or permits that are issued from the 1 july will also be valid until 31 december 2022, and no license fee will be payable.

src_text: daarbenewens sal alle nuwe besigheidslisensies en permitte wat vanaf 1 julie 2021 uitgereik is, ook tot 31 desember 2022 geldig wees, en geen lisensie fooie sal gehef word nie.
tgt_text: over the past year, we have also been working consist ently to protect vulnerable workers whose jobs were at risk, particularly in hardhit sectors like retail, food and beverage and the metals industry.

src_text: ons het in die afgelope jaar ook deurlopend daaraan gewerk om kwesbare werkers wie se werke in gedrang was, veral in sektore soos kleinhandel, voedsel en drank en die metaalbedryf wat swaar getref is, te beskerm.
tgt_text: through processes facili tated by the commission for conciliation, mediation and arbitration, some 58 000 jobs have been saved.

src_text: sowat 58 00 werke is, deur middel van prosesse wat deur die kommissie vir versoening, bemiddeling en arbitrasie onder steun is, gered.
tgt_text: with the pandemic show ing no immediate signs of ending, businesses and work ers remain vulnerable.

src_text: besighede en werkers bly, met geen teken dat die pandemie binnekort te eindig nie, kwesbaar.
tgt_text: it is thanks to the social com pacts we continue to forge that government, business and labour have been able to work together to buffer work ers and businesses from the pandemic’s harsh economic impacts.

src_text: ons kan, danksy die voortdurende maatskaplike ooreenkomste voortgaan om as staat, handel en arbeid saam te werk om n buffer te skep om werkers en besighede teen die pandemie se ergste ekonomiese impakte te beskerm.
tgt_text: for now, our priority is saving lives, and ensuring that we provide the necessary support, within our means, to prevent more businesses closing down and more jobs being lost.

src_text: ons eerste prioriteit bly vir nou om lewens te red en te verseker dat ons die nodige steun, binne ons vermoëns, verskaf om te ver hoed dat meer besighede sluit en meer werksgeleenthede verlore gaan.
tgt_text: support for businesses and workers vukuzenzele unnamed starting and building a business is a lot like raising a family.

src_text: inklusiewe gemeenskappe is noodsaaklik vir sa se sukses vukuzenzele unnamed alhoewel die ge weld en verwoes ting wat dele van kwazulunatal en gauteng onlangs ge teister het, groot skade aan eiendom en mense se lewensbestane be rokken het, het dit ook n reuse impak op die samehorigheid in ons gemeenskappe gehad.
tgt_text: inclusive communities critical to sa’s success vukuzenzele unnamed while the violence and destruction that engulfed parts of kwazulunatal and gauteng recently caused much damage to property and livelihoods, it also had a huge impact on the cohesion of our communities.

src_text: dit was veral ooglopend in die tragiese gebeure wat rondom phoenix en ethekwini afgespeel het.
tgt_text: this was most evident in the tragic events that took place in and around phoenix in ethekwini.

src_text: tydens die ergste onluste in ons demokrasie, en in n klimaat wat reeds gelaai is met agterdog en paranoia, het mense wat voorheen sy aan sy in relatiewe vrede geleef het, teen mekaar gedraai.
tgt_text: during some of the worst unrest in our democracy, and in a climate already thick with suspicion and paranoia, people that had lived sidebyside in relative peace turned on each other.

src_text: daar is nog baie wat aan die lig moet kom oor die gebeure wat plaasgevind het.
tgt_text: there is still much we have to unearth about the events that took place.

src_text: die toe name in vals nuus, gedokterde foto’s en foutiewe inligting het dit moeilik gemaak om tussen feit en fiksie te onderskei.
tgt_text: the proliferation of fake news, doctored images and incorrect information has made it difficult to separate fact from fiction.

src_text: maar ons weet wel, uit die amptelike verslae en persoon like ervarings van mense, dat mense volgens rasseprofiel uitgesonder is by onwettige padblokkades, dat sommige mense uit hul motors geruk en geslaan is, en dat sommige mense verne der en beledig is.
tgt_text: but we do know from official reports and personal accounts that people were racially profiled at illegal roadblocks, some people were pulled out of cars and beaten, and some were humiliated and degraded.

src_text: talle mense is om die lewe gebring.
tgt_text: several people were killed.

src_text: baie van die dinge wat gebeur het, is die onver mydelike uiteinde wanneer mense die reg in eie hande neem.
tgt_text: much of what has happened is the inevitable outcome when people take the law into their own hands.

src_text: eiegeregtigheid en vigilantisme sal nie in hierdie land geduld word nie.
tgt_text: vigilantism will not be tolerated in this country.

src_text: dit is onwettig en dit is gevaarlik.
tgt_text: it is criminal and it is dangerous.

src_text: noudat rus en vrede in die areas herstel is, is ons wetstoepassingsagentskappe besig om alle kriminele dade te ondersoek.
tgt_text: now that calm has been restored to the affected areas, our law enforcement agencies are investigating all acts of criminality.

src_text: n span speurders is aan gestel om die moorde te ondersoek en werk nou saam met die plaaslike gemeenskappe.
tgt_text: a team of detectives has been assigned to deal with the murders and are working closely with local communities.

src_text: daar is al inhegtenisnames uitgevoer en diegene wat verantwoordelik is, sal met die volle mag van die reg te doen kry.
tgt_text: there have been arrests and those responsible will face the full might of the law.

src_text: n groot deel van die relaas rondom die gebeure in phoenix is oorheers deur pogings om een ras teen n ander op te stook.
tgt_text: much of the narrative around the events in phoenix has been dominated by attempts to turn one race against another.

src_text: dit is aangeblaas deur naamlose mense wat buitensporige aantygings op sosiale media en boodskapgroepe ge maak het en wraaklustig heid onder mense gesaai het.
tgt_text: it has been stoked by anonymous people on social media and in messaging groups making outrageous claims and calling for revenge.

src_text: daar is n poging om dit te laat blyk as die ineenstorting van rasseverhoudinge tussen afrikaen indi ërgemeenskappe.
tgt_text: there is an attempt to present this as a sign of imploding race relations between african and indian communities.

src_text: net soos daar mense was wat probeer het om mense se weerloosheid uit te buit en chaos te veroorsaak, is daar diegene wat kriminele dade volgens rasseterme wou voorhou om hul eie agenda te dien.
tgt_text: just as there were people who tried to exploit people’s vulnerability and cause mayhem, there are those who want to present criminal acts in racial terms to serve their own purposes.

src_text: hulle sal nie slaag nie.
tgt_text: they will not succeed.

src_text: suidafrika het n trotse geskiedenis van begin selvaste, nierassige en werkersklassolidariteit.
tgt_text: south africa has a proud history of principled nonracialism and working class solidarity.

src_text: afrikaen indi ërgemeen skappe is verenig in die stryd teen apartheid en, tesame met ander gemeenskappe, bly verbind tot n verenigde en demokratiese samelewing.
tgt_text: african and indian communities were united in the struggle against apartheid and, together with other communities, remain committed to a united and democratic society.

src_text: in antwoord op die vrees en wantroue werk die mense van phoenix en die aan grensende bhambayi, zwelitsha en amaoti hard daaraan om die skade te herstel.
tgt_text: in response to the fear and mistrust, the people of phoenix and the neighbouring areas of bhambayi, zwelitsha and amaoti are working to repair the damage.

src_text: met behulp van n vredes forum wat deur die suid afrikaanse polisiediens op die been gebring is, in vennootskap met gemeenskapsleiers, het die gemeenskappe byeen gekom om diegene te ondersteun wat deur die onrus geraak is en om gesprekskanale te skep.
tgt_text: aided by a peace forum established by the south african police service in partnership with community leaders, the communities have come together to support those affected by the unrest and to open channels of dialogue.

src_text: dit is nie die enigste deel van die land wat voor sulke uitdagings staan nie.
tgt_text: this is not the only part of the country that is confronted with such challenges.

src_text: ons pogings om geïnte greerde gemeenskappe te bou word bemoeilik deur die nalatenskap van die beplanning onder apartheid en voortdurende ongelykheid.
tgt_text: our efforts to build integrated communities are frustrated by the legacy of apartheid planning and persistent inequality.

src_text: ons stede, dorpe en landelike gebiede word steeds verdeel op gronde van ras sowel as klas.
tgt_text: our cities, towns and rural areas are still all divided by both race and class.

src_text: dit ontmoe dig samewerking en begrip, en is n remskoen in ons poging om n nierassige samelewing te bou.
tgt_text: this discourages cooperation and understanding, and hampers the work we have undertaken to build a nonracial society.

src_text: om hierdie ruimtelike verwrongenheid reg te stel, moet n deel van ons werk wees om n inklusiewe ekonomie te bou en die lewenstoestande van alle suidafrikaners te verbeter.
tgt_text: correcting these spatial distortions must be part of our work of building an inclusive economy and improving the living conditions of all south africans.

src_text: dit is waarom ons hard werk om florerende informele nedersettings en landelike ekonomieë te vestig en fokus op die groei van kleinsakeondernemings.
tgt_text: it is why we are working to build flourishing township and rural economies, and focusing on the growth of small businesses.

src_text: dit is waarom ons in infra struktuur in hierdie areas belê en werk om diensver skaffing te verbeter.
tgt_text: it is why we are investing in infrastructure in these areas and working to improve the provision of services.

src_text: terselfdertyd moet ons ras sisme in ons samelewing konfronteer.
tgt_text: at the same time, we need to confront racism in our society.

src_text: ons moet eer like gesprekke hê, nie net oor ons gesindhede teenoor mekaar nie, maar ook oor die materiële toestande wat ons verdeel.
tgt_text: we need to have honest conversations not only about our attitudes to one another, but also about the material conditions that divide us.

src_text: solank as wat die verdeling van rykdom en geleenthede in suidafrika nog grootliks deur ras en geslag bepaal word, sal ons nie in staat wees om n werklik verenigde nasie te kan bou nie.
tgt_text: for as long as the division of wealth and opportunity in south africa is largely still determined by race and gender, we will not be able to build a truly united nation.

src_text: die gebeure in phoenix is n pynlike herinnering aan hoe veel werk ons nog moet doen om inklusiewe gemeenskappe te bou waar die grense van die verlede suksesvol afge breek is.
tgt_text: the events in phoenix are a painful reminder of how much work we still need to do to build inclusive communities that have successfully broken down the boundaries of the past.

src_text: hierdie gebeure toon ook hoe vasberade sommige mense is om ons te verdeel, en hoe ons alles in die stryd moet werp om hulle te weer staan.
tgt_text: these events also demonstrate how determined some people are to divide us, and how we need to do everything we can to resist them.

src_text: dit is ons gesamentlike ver antwoordelikheid om hierdie gemeenskappe in ethekwini en elders te ondersteun in hul reis na versoening en genesing.
tgt_text: it is our collective responsibility to support these communities in ethekwini and elsewhere in their journey towards reconciliation and healing.

src_text: ons demokrasie is gebou deur brugbouers en vrede makers.
tgt_text: our democracy was built by peacemakers and bridgebuilders.

src_text: die argitekte van ons vryheid was waagmoedige afrika, indiër, kleurlingen wit mans en vrouens wat die pad van versoening bo vergelding gekies het, wat vrede bo oorlog gestel het.
tgt_text: the architects of our freedom were african, indian, coloured and white men and women of great courage who chose the path of reconciliation over retribution, and of peace over war.

src_text: soos ons daarna strewe om van hierdie gesament like nasionale trauma te herstel, laat ons soos een mens saamstaan.
tgt_text: as we strive to heal from this collective national trauma, let us stand as one.

src_text: laat ons ons verskille oorkom ter wille van ons almal se wel stand.
tgt_text: let us overcome our differences in pursuit of the common good.

src_text: laat ons saamwerk om n gemeenskaplike toekoms te smee waarin almal n gelyke aandeel het.
tgt_text: inclusive communities critical to sa’s success vukuzenzele unnamed while the violence and destruction that engulfed parts of kwazulunatal and gauteng recently caused much damage to property and livelihoods, it also had a huge impact on the cohesion of our communities.

src_text: om n samelewing vry van staatskaping te bou vukuzenzele unnamed die geskeduleerde verhore van die regterlike kommissie van ondersoek na staatskaping het onlangs ten einde geloop, meer as 1 000 dae nadat die eerste getuienis aangehoor is.
tgt_text: building a society free of state capture vukuzenzele unnamed the scheduled hearings of the judicial commission of inquiry into allegations of state capture, corruption and fraud in the public sector, including organs of state, recently ended, more than 1 000 days after the first witness testimony was heard.

src_text: alhoewel die kommissie se voorsitter, adjunkhoofregter, raymond zondo, gesê het dat dit nodig mag wees dat daar nog n paar persone se getuienis aangehoor word, is die kommissie se werk nou een tree nader aan voltooiing.
tgt_text: while the commission’s chairperson, deputy chief justice raymond zondo has said it may be necessary for a few more witnesses to testify, the work of the commission is now one step closer to completion.

src_text: dit is n belangrike mylpaal wat ons nog nader bring aan afrekening met een van die mees vernietigende episodes in die geskiedenis van ons demokrasie.
tgt_text: this is a significant milestone that brings us ever closer to a reckoning with one of the most ruinous episodes in the history of our democracy.

src_text: selfs nog voordat regter zondo sy bevindings en aanbevelings aan die president voorlê, sal ons almal saam stem dat die kommissie se werk van onskatbare waarde was.
tgt_text: even before judge zondo submits his findings and recommendations to the president, we can all agree that the commission’s work has been invaluable.

src_text: oor die verloop van drie jaar het ons gedetailleerde getuienis aangehoor van beweerde dade van korrupsie op n massiewe skaal.
tgt_text: over the course of three years, we have heard testimony detailing alleged acts of corruption on a massive scale.

src_text: ons het gehoor van aksies wat gelei het tot die diefstal van miljarde rande se staatsgeld.
tgt_text: we have heard about actions that resulted in the theft of billions of rands of public money.

src_text: ons het gehoor hoeveel instansies en staatsbeheerde maatskappye opsetlik verswak is.
tgt_text: we have heard how many public institutions and stateowned companies were deliberately weakened.

src_text: hierdie blootlegging van die aard, omvang en diepte van staatskaping het nie agter geslote deure plaasgevind nie, maar is oor die hele land uitgesaai.
tgt_text: this exposure of the nature, extent and depth of state capture did not take place behind closed doors, but was broadcast to the entire country.

src_text: deur toe te laat dat suidafrikaners die kommissie se verrigtinge volg, het dit gehelp om openbare vertroue in ons demokrasie by die publiek in te boesem deur die wyse waarop dit openheid en deursigtigheid bevorder.
tgt_text: by allowing all south africans to follow the commission’s proceedings, it has helped to instil public confidence in our democracy in the way it promotes openness and transparency.

src_text: die land is groot dank verskuldig aan almal wat betrokke was by die werk van die kom missie — vanaf diegene wat n massiewe hoeveelheid inligting moes ondersoek, navors en saamstel, die talle getuies wat getuig en bewyse voorgelê het, die joernaliste wat ywerig verslaggedoen het oor die verrigtinge tot die prokureurs wat getuienis help aanbied het.
tgt_text: the country owes a debt of gratitude to all who were involved in the work of the commission; from those who investigated, researched and compiled a huge amount of information; to the many witnesses who testified and provided evidence; to the journalists who diligently reported on the proceedings; to the lawyers who helped present evidence.

src_text: ons is ook dank verskuldig aan die talle individue, waarvan sommige onbekend is, wie se optrede in die eerste plek tot die totstandkoming van die kommissie gelei het.
tgt_text: we also owe a debt of gratitude to the many individuals, some of whom remain unknown, whose actions led to the establishment of the commission in the first place.

src_text: dit is diegene wat hierdie kriminele dade aan die lig gebring het, wat weerstand gebied het, wat uitgepraat het en veldtogte begin het — sowel in die openbaar as agter die skerms — om staatskaping tot n einde te bring.
tgt_text: these are the people who unearthed these alleged criminal acts, who resisted, who spoke out and who took up campaigns – both public and behind the scenes – to end state capture.

src_text: dit is danksy hulle dat ons nou van staatskaping in die verlede tyd kan praat.
tgt_text: it is thanks to them that we now speak of state capture in the past tense.

src_text: staatskaping het nie vanself tot n einde gekom nie.
tgt_text: state capture did not end of its own accord.

src_text: dit is tot n einde gebring deur die gesamentlike dade van suidafrikaners uit alle vlakke van die samelewing wat op verskeie terreine saamgewerk het om die waardes van ons grondwetlike demokrasie te herstel en die onus rus op ons almal om te verseker dat hierdie praktyke nooit weer herhaal sal word nie.
tgt_text: it was brought to an end by the concerted actions of south africans from all walks of life, working in various areas to restore the values of our constitutional democracy.

src_text: ons het oor die afgelope drie jaar verskeie belangrike stappe geneem om korrupsie en staatskaping aan te pak.
tgt_text: and it is up to all of us to ensure that these practices are never allowed to happen again.

src_text: ons het liggame soos die nasionale vervolgingsgesag (nvg), die suidafrikaanse polisiediens (sapd), die suidafrikaanse inkomstediens (said) en ander met noukeurigheid begin herop bou.
tgt_text: over the past three years, we have taken several important steps to tackle corruption and state capture.

src_text: ons het nuwe strukture opgerig, soos die ondersoek direktoraat van die nvg om hoëvlakkorrupsie te vervolg en die soe se spesiale beslissingsraad om gesteelde staatsfondse terug te win.
tgt_text: we have been painstakingly rebuilding bodies like the national prosecuting authority (npa), the south african police service, the south african revenue service and others.

src_text: ons het ons misdaadbestrydings kapasiteit verbeter deur die totstandkoming van die verbindingsentrum wat verskeie wetstoepassingsagentskappe bymekaar bring om inligting te deel en die ondersoek en vervolging van misdaad te koördineer.
tgt_text: we have set up new structures, like the investigating directorate in the npa to prosecute highlevel corruption and the special investigating unit (siu) special tribunal to recover stolen public funds.

src_text: ons het die leierskap van verskeie strategiese staats beheerde ondernemings verander en het die proses begin om hulle finansiële en operasionele gesondheid te herstel.
tgt_text: we have improved our crimefighting capacity through the establishment of the fusion centre, which brings together various lawenforcement agencies to share information and coordinate the investigation and prosecution of crime.

src_text: ons kyk na n nuwe sbomodel wat groter deursigtigheid, verantwoord baarheid en volhoubaarheid bevorder.
tgt_text: we have changed the leadership at several strategic stateowned enterprises (soes), and begun the process of restoring them to financial and operational health.

src_text: baie van hierdie werk is van voortgaande aard.
tgt_text: we are working towards a new soe model that promotes greater transparency, accountability and sustainability.

src_text: daar is gebiede waar die vorde ring baie stadiger is as wat ons wou hê, en hierdie areas geniet nou groter aandag.
tgt_text: much of this work is ongoing.

src_text: die bevindinge en aanbeve lings van die kommissie sal hierdie pogings ongetwyfeld versterk.
tgt_text: there are areas where progress has been far slower than we would have hoped, and these are now receiving closer attention.

src_text: ons verwag dat die kommissie sommige van die sistemiese swakplekke wat staatskaping moontlik gemaak het, sal identifiseer.
tgt_text: the findings and recommendations of the commission will undoubtedly strengthen these efforts.

src_text: dit sal ons in staat stel om verdere korrektiewe maatreëls te implementeer.
tgt_text: we expect that the commission will identify some of the systemic weaknesses that allowed state capture to take place.

src_text: alhoewel ons kan sê dat die era van staatskaping verby is, het ons nog nie korrupsie oorwin nie.
tgt_text: this will empower us to take further corrective measures.

src_text: bedrog en korrup sie bly diep ingebed in sowel die openbare as die privaat sektor.
tgt_text: while we can say that the era of state capture is over, we have not defeated corruption.

src_text: alhoewel dit nie op die skaal van staatskaping lê nie, kom sulke kriminele aktiwiteite ons land duur te staan, verswak ons instellings en ontneem dit suidafrikaners van baie basiese behoeftes.
tgt_text: fraud and corruption remain pervasive and deeply entrenched in both the public and private sectors.

src_text: korrupsie is ten beste immo reel, maar dit sny nog dieper ten tyde van n humanitêre krisis.
tgt_text: although it may not be on the scale of state capture, such criminal activities cost our country greatly, weaken our institutions and deprive south africans of many basic needs.

src_text: n mens praat hier van die afskuwelike dade van korrupsie, verlede jaar, in die verkryging van goedere en dienste wat nodig was in ons stryd teen die kovid19pandemie.
tgt_text: corruption is deeply immoral at the best of times, but takes on a greater depravity in the midst of a humanitarian crisis.

src_text: ons het vinnig opgetree om sodanige korrupsie te staak, om diegene wat verantwoordelik is te identifiseer en teen hulle op te tree.
tgt_text: one speaks here of the despicable acts of corruption last year in the procurement of goods and services needed for our fight against the covid19 pandemic.

src_text: dit is n bewys van ons toewyding om kor rupsie uit te roei.
tgt_text: we acted swiftly to stop such corruption, to identify those responsible and to take action against them.

src_text: ons het die tesourieregulasies verskerp, die verbindingsentrum gestig en die spesiale ondersoekeenheid (soe) n breë mandaat gegee om alle kovid19ver wante korrupsiebewerings te ondersoek.
tgt_text: this is proof of our commitment to root out corruption.

src_text: in wat as n eerste vir die land beskou word, het ons al die besonderhede van alle kovid19ver krygingskontrakte van alle staatsentiteite aanlyn gepubliseer.
tgt_text: we tightened up treasury regulations, established the fusion centre and gave the siu a wideranging mandate to investigate all covid19related corruption allegations.

src_text: die skade wat aan ons land aangerig is deur staatskaping, is diepliggend.
tgt_text: in a first for the country, we also published online the details of all covid19 procurement contracts across all public entities.

src_text: die nagevolge sal nog vir baie jare gevoel word, maar deur saam te werk, het ons begin om dinge reg te stel.
tgt_text: the damage done to our country by state capture is deep.

src_text: ons het begin om te herbou en te herstel.
tgt_text: its effects will be felt for many years to come.

src_text: ons kan verwag dat die uitkomste van die zondokommissie hierdie pogings oneindig sal versterk.
tgt_text: but, working together, we have started to put things right.

src_text: hier die uitkomste sal aan ons die geleentheid bied om n besliste en blywende breuk met die staatskapingsera te maak.
tgt_text: we have started to rebuild and restore.

src_text: daar is nog baie werk wat voorlê, en baie uitdagings moet nog die hoof gebied word, maar ons is op pad om n samelewing te bou wat vry is van die euwels van staatskaping en korrupsie.
tgt_text: building a society free of state capture vukuzenzele unnamed the scheduled hearings of the judicial commission of inquiry into allegations of state capture, corruption and fraud in the public sector, including organs of state, recently ended, more than 1 000 days after the first witness testimony was heard.

src_text: suidafrika huldig oopvlekkers vukuzenzele unnamed in die afgelope drie jaar sedert die kommissie van ondersoek na staatskaping afgeskop het, het ons te hore gekom van die uiterstes waartoe die oortreders wat korrupsie gepleeg het, gegaan het om hul misdade weg te steek.
tgt_text: sa salutes whistleblowers vukuzenzele unnamed over the course of the three years, since the commission of inquiry into state capture started its work, we have heard of the lengths to which the perpetrators of corrupt acts have gone to conceal their misdeeds.

src_text: dit was n uiterse ingewik kelde taak om die strekking van die netwerke van invloed wat korrupsie bemoontlik het, te ontrafel.
tgt_text: it has been an extremely complex undertaking to unravel the networks of influence that enabled corruption.

src_text: onder meer is talle frontmaatskappye gestig om fondse rond te skuif en beta lings aan politiesinvloedryke individue te verskans.
tgt_text: among other things, vast webs of front companies were established to move funds around and disguise payments made to politicallyconnected individuals.

src_text: dieselfde patrone is gesien in verskeie onder soeke na korrupsie wat onderneem is deur die spe siale ondersoekeenheid, die direktoraat van prioriteitsmis daadondersoek, die nasionale vervolgingsowerheid (nvo) se ondersoekdirektoraat en andere.
tgt_text: the same patterns have been seen in a number of investigations into corruption being undertaken by the special investigating unit (siu) the directorate for priority crime investigation, the national prosecuting authority's (npa) investigating directorate and others.

src_text: namate hierdie ondersoeke gevorder het en die strop al nouer getrek het om individue wat in hierdie misdade ver wikkel is, het ons ook gesien hoe ooggetuies gedreig is, hul families geïntimideer is, hulle geforseer is om weg te kruip, en selfs vermoor is.
tgt_text: as these investigations progressed and the net began to close on implicated individuals, we have seen witnesses being threatened, their families intimidated, being forced into hiding, and even killed.

src_text: die moord op babita deoka ran, n senior finansiesbeampte in die gautengse departement van gesondheid, beklemtoon weereens wát alles op die spel geplaas word in ons gesa mentlike poging om hierdie kanker uit ons samelewing te sny.
tgt_text: the murder of babita deokaran, a senior finance official in the gauteng health department, is a stark reminder of the high stakes involved in our collective quest to remove this cancer from our society.

src_text: alhoewel ons nog nie weet wat die beweegrede agter haar moord is nie, weet ons dat sy n sleutelgetuie was in n soeondersoek na die verkryging van persoonlike veiligheids toerusting in die departement.
tgt_text: while we do not yet know the motive for her murder, she was a key witness in a siu investigation into the procurement of personal protective equipment in the department.

src_text: die sapd en privaat sekuri teitspanne wat onlangs sewe verdagtes vasgetrek het, moet geprys word vir hul harde werk.
tgt_text: the saps and the private security teams who apprehended seven suspects recently are to be commended for their work.

src_text: die dossier is oorgegee aan die valke en die ondersoek sal hopelik verdere lig werp op die rede waarom me.
tgt_text: the docket has been transferred to the hawks, and the investigation will yield further information on why ms deokaran was murdered.

src_text: deokaran om die lewe gebring is.
tgt_text: regardless of the circumstances behind this tragedy, ms deokaran was a hero and a patriot.

src_text: ongeag die omstandighede agter hierdie tragedie, is me.
tgt_text: as are the legions of whistleblowers who, at great risk to themselves, help to unearth instances of misdeeds, maladministration, cronyism and theft.

src_text: deokaran n heldin en n patriot, so ook die krygsmag oopvlek kers wat, teen groot eie risiko, help om gevalle van misdaad, wanadministrasie, baantjies vir boeties en diefstal aan die kaak te stel.
tgt_text: without their brave and principled interventions, we would be unable to unmask those committing corruption.

src_text: sonder hul dapper en begin selvaste intrede sou ons nie in staat wees om diegene wat korrupsie pleeg, te ontmasker nie.
tgt_text: though much focus in recent times has been on whistleblowers in the public sector, we also owe a debt of gratitude to those in the private sector whose actions receive less attention, but are equally important.

src_text: alhoewel die aandag die afgelope ruk merendeels op oopvlekkers in die openbare sektor gevestig is, is ons ook dankbaarheid verskuldig aan dié in die privaat sektor wie se optrede minder aandag geniet het, maar net so belangrik is.
tgt_text: whistleblowers are important guardians of our democracy.

src_text: oopvlekkers is belangrike bewakers van ons demokra sie.
tgt_text: they raise the alarm against unethical acts and practices in government and organisations.

src_text: hulle maak alarm teen onetiese dade en praktyke in die regering en organisasies.
tgt_text: they speak out in good faith and with a reasonable expectation not only that action will be taken on their disclosures, but that they will be protected and not suffer victimisation or prejudice.

src_text: hulle kom op en maak stem dik in goedertrou en met die billike verwagting dat daar nie net opgetree sal word na aan leiding van hul onthullings nie, maar dat hulle ook beskerm sal word en nie geviktimiseer of vooroordeel sal word nie.
tgt_text: in south africa there is extensive legislative protection for whistleblowers, including through the protected disclosures act, labour relations act, companies act, protection against harassment act, and the constitution itself.

src_text: in suidafrika is daar breed voerige wetlike beskerming vir oopvlekkers, waaronder by wyse van die wet op beskerm ende bekendmakings, die wet op arbeidsverhoudinge, die maatskappywet, die wet op beskerming teen teistering asook die grondwet self.
tgt_text: in addition, the department of justice and correctional services, working with other lawenforcement agencies, administers the office of witness protection to provide support to vulnerable and intimidated witnesses in any judicial proceedings.

src_text: daarbenewens verskaf die kantoor vir getuiebeskerming wat deur die departement van justisie en korrektiewe diens te in samewerking met ander wetstoepassingsagentskappe bestuur word, steun aan weerlose getuies en getuies wat tydens enige regsprosesse geïntimideer word.
tgt_text: entering witness protection is voluntary, and neither the saps nor the npa can compel a witness to do so.

src_text: om die getuiebeskermingsprogram te betree is vrywillig en nóg die sapd nóg die nvo kan n getuie daarin forseer nie.
tgt_text: should a witness receive threats to their life or feel unsafe, they have to inform investigators and apply for admission to the programme.

src_text: sou n getuie lewensdrei gemente ontvang of onveilig voel, moet hulle die speurders in kennis stel en aansoek om die program doen.
tgt_text: this successful programme has played a key role in securing successful prosecutions since its inception, particularly with regards to organised crime.

src_text: hierdie suksesvolle program het al meermale sedert die stigting daarvan n sleutelrol gespeel om suksesvolle vervolgings te verseker, veral met betrekking tot georganiseerde misdaad.
tgt_text: it is clear that as the fight against corruption gathers momentum, we need to urgently review our current approach not only to witness protection, but also to the broader protection of whistleblowers.

src_text: dit is duidelik dat, soos wat die stryd teen korrupsie momentum bou, ons drin gend ons huidige benadering tot nie slegs die beskerming van getuies nie, maar ook die beskerming van oopvlekkers in die algemeen moet hersien.
tgt_text: while numerous systems are in place to enable whistleblowers to report anonymously, we need to tighten up existing systems and provide greater support to those who publicly come forward with information.

src_text: alhoewel verskeie stelsels in plek gestel is om oopvlekkers toe te laat om inligting ano niem te onthul, moet ons die huidige stelsels verskerp en meer ondersteuning lewer aan diegene wat in die openbaar met inligting na vore kom.
tgt_text: as society, we need to identify where existing laws and policies are inadequate in protecting the livelihoods, reputations and safety of whistleblowers – and work together to address these.

src_text: as samelewing moet ons vasstel waar ons huidige wetgewing en beleide ontoerei kend is om die lewensbestaan, reputasies en veiligheid van oopvlekkers te beskerm en saam werk om dit aan te spreek.
tgt_text: the intent of the criminals who target whistleblowers is not only to silence particular individuals – it is also to send a message to other potential whistleblowers.

src_text: kriminele wat oopvlekkers teiken het nie net ten doel om sekere individue stil te maak nie — hulle wil ook n boodskap stuur aan ander voornemende oopvlekkers.
tgt_text: day by day, brave south africans like babita deokaran are standing firm that they will not be party to corruption and they are prepared to bear witness against it.

src_text: dag na dag staan suidafrikaners soos babita deokaran vas; hulle weier om deel te wees van korrupsie en is bereid om as getuies teen dit te staan.
tgt_text: as the south african people, we salute her and all the whistleblowers in the public and private sectors who are exposing corruption to the harshest of glares.

src_text: as suidafrikaners bring ons hulde aan haar en al die ander oopvlekkers in die openbare en privaat sektor wat korrupsie ontbloot.
tgt_text: they are doing so without expectation of acknowledgement or reward.

src_text: hulle doen dit sonder om erkenning of vergoeding te verwag.
tgt_text: theirs is the highest form of public service.

src_text: dít is die hoogste vorm van openbare diens.
tgt_text: we cannot let them down.

src_text: ons kan hulle nie in die steek laat nie.
tgt_text: we must, and we will, ensure that their disclosures result in prosecutions and do much more to ensure that they are protected from harm.

src_text: ons moet, en ons sal, seker maak dat hul onthullings lei tot vervolgings en ook meer doen om seker te maak dat hulle beskerm word.
tgt_text: as south africans, we want to send a strong a message that we will not be intimidated.

src_text: as suidafrikaners wil ons n sterk boodskap stuur dat ons nie geïntimideer sal word nie.
tgt_text: sa salutes whistleblowers vukuzenzele unnamed over the course of the three years, since the commission of inquiry into state capture started its work, we have heard of the lengths to which the perpetrators of corrupt acts have gone to conceal their misdeeds.

src_text: brics n sleutelfaktor in sa se groei vukuzenzele unnamed n jaar voordat die eerste demokratiese verkiesing plaas gevind het, het president nelson mandela n artikel in die foreign policytyd skrif geskryf oor die nuwe suidafrika se toekomsti ge buitelandse beleid.
tgt_text: brics key to sa's growth vukuzenzele unnamed a year before the first democratic elections, president nelson mandela wrote an article in foreign policy magazine on the new south africa’s future foreign policy.

src_text: in sy nadenke oor die wêreldwye bondgenoot skappe wat gevorm is weens die beëindiging van die koue oorlog, het hy geskryf dat lande "weer hulle nette sal moet uitgooi" as hulle enigsins wou baatvind by internasionale sake.
tgt_text: reflecting on the shifts in global alliances brought about by the end of the cold war, he wrote that countries would have to "recast their nets" if they were to reap any benefit from international affairs.

src_text: sedert die tektoniese ver skuiwing van 1994 toe ons besluit het om nie net apart heid af te skaf nie, maar ook weg te breek van die inter nasionale opvatting van apartheid se argitekte, word suidafrika se buitelandse beleid gekenmerk deur dié "heruitgooi van die nette".
tgt_text: since the tectonic shift of 1994 when we made a decisive break with not just apartheid but the international relations outlook of its architects, south africa’s foreign policy continues to be characterised by this "recasting the net".

src_text: ons buitelandse beleidspri oriteite is streeksintegrasie op politieke en ekonomiese gebied, die ontwikkeling van afrika, multilaterale betrok kenheid en die bevordering van demokrasie, vrede en menseregte.
tgt_text: our foreign policy priorities are regional political and economic integration, pursing african development, multilateral engagement and the promotion of democracy, peace and human rights.

src_text: ons het met dié doel ons strategiese alliansies met sowel die lande van die globale suide as wedersyds voordelige samewerking met die lande van die noorde opgebou.
tgt_text: to this end, we have forged strategic alliances with both the countries of the global south and mutually beneficial cooperation with the countries of the north.

src_text: ons inskakeling by die bricslande in 2010 was n mylpaal in ons strewe om ons eie nasionale ontwikkelings prioriteite te bevorder deur sterker bande te smee met die belangrike ontluikende ekonomieë van brasilië, rus land, indië en china.
tgt_text: joining the brics group of countries in 2010 was a milestone in our quest to advance our own national development priorities by forging stronger ties with the important emerging economies of brazil, russia, india and china.

src_text: in konteks gesien, kom 41% van die wêreldbevolking in die bricslande voor en sorg dié lande vir 24% van die glo bale bbp en vir ongeveer 16% van wêreldwye handel.
tgt_text: put into context, brics countries comprise roughly 41% of the world’s population and account for around 24% of global gdp and some 16% of global trade.

src_text: in ons lidmaatskap van dié blok het ons die meeste gebaat op die gebied van ekonomiese samewerking.
tgt_text: we have reaped the benefits of membership of this important bloc, most notably in the area of economic cooperation.

src_text: bilaterale handel het gegroei, veral met china en indië, met kommoditeits uitvoere en die invoer van vervaardigde goedere hoog op die lys.
tgt_text: bilateral trade has grown, particularly with china and india, with commodity exports and manufactured goods imports featuring strongly.

src_text: die bricslande is steeds belangrike bronne van buitelandse direkte beleggings op sleutelgebiede soos mynbou, die motorbe dryf, vervoer, skoon energie, finansiële dienste en it.
tgt_text: the brics countries continue to be important sources of foreign direct investment in key such as mining, automotive, transportation, clean energy, financial services and it.

src_text: n hersiening van ons bricslidmaatskap in 2018 deur die professionele diens temaatskappy, deloitte, het uitgewys dat bricsvennote "drie keer meer kapitaal in die land belê het as in die sewe jaar voor 2011".
tgt_text: a 2018 review of our brics membership by professional services firm deloitte noted that brics partners "invested three times more capital in the country compared to the seven years prior to 2011".

src_text: dié beleggings en projekte het op hulle beurt tot beduidende werkskepping gelei.
tgt_text: these investments and projects have in turn led to significant job creation.

src_text: sedert die ontstaan van die nuwe ontwikkelings bank, wie se streekkantoor in johannesburg geleë is, is suidafrika n begunstigde van finansiering en tegniese ondersteuning vir projekte in vervoer, skoon energie, omgewingsbeskerming, waterinfrastruktuur en die vermindering van kweek huisgasse.
tgt_text: since the formation of the new development bank, whose regional office is located in johannesburg, south africa has been a beneficiary of financing and technical support for projects in transportation, clean energy, environmental protection, water infrastructure and greenhouse gas emissions reduction.

src_text: sedert die uitbreek van die kovid19pandemie, het suidafrika $2 miljard in befondsing van die nuwe ontwikkelingsbank onder die kovid19noodfinansie ringsprogram ontvang om die pandemie te bestry en om ekonomiese herstel te steun.
tgt_text: since the outbreak of the covid19 pandemic, south africa has received $2 billion in funding from the new development bank under the covid19 emergency loan programme to fight the pandemic and to support our economic recovery.

src_text: daar was ook beduidende samewerking met ons bricsvennote om persoonlike beskermende toerusting te bekom, asook ten opsigte van die toegang tot en versprei ding van entstof.
tgt_text: there has also been substantial cooperation with our brics partners in securing personal protective equipment and cooperation around vaccine access and distribution.

src_text: ons het onlangs deel geneem aan die 13de bricsspitsberaad waar bricslande ooreengekom het om nog nouer saam te werk om kovid19 te bestry en om die politieke en finansi ële hulpbronne te mobiliseer wat nodig is vir toekomstige pandemiegereedheid.
tgt_text: we recently participated in the 13th brics summit, where brics countries agreed to deepen cooperation to fight covid19 and mobilise the political support and financial resources needed to respond to future pandemic preparedness.

src_text: dit behels die ves tiging van n virtuele bricsentstofnavorsingen ontwikkelingsentrum asook n geïntegreerde vroeë waarskuwingstelsel om toekomstige uitbrekings van aansteeklike siektes in bricslande te voorspel.
tgt_text: this includes the establishment of a virtual brics vaccine research and development centre and a brics integrated early warning system to forecast future outbreaks of infectious diseases.

src_text: nog n belangrike gebied van ooreenkoms was die wedersydse erkenning van nasionale dokumente oor inenting en stelsels vir kovid19toetse — wat noodsaaklik sal wees vir oorgrensreise in die toekoms.
tgt_text: another important area of agreement was on mutual recognition of national documents of vaccination and systems of covid19 testing – something that will be vital to crossborder travel in the future.

src_text: die begrip van wedersyds voordelige same werking sal veral belangrik wees in die globale ekono miese herstelplanne waar ongelyke ontwikkeling beteken dat sommige lande vinnig sal herstel en ander agter sal raak.
tgt_text: the concept of mutually beneficial cooperation will be particularly important in the global economic recovery, where unequal development means that some countries will bounce back quickly, while others will lag behind.

src_text: ter ondersteuning van ekonomiese herstel, het die bricsvennote ooreengekom om hulle samewerking te ver stewig in katalitiese sektore soos energie, it, wetenskap, tegnologie en innovering, landbou en die groen eko nomie.
tgt_text: in support of economic recovery, brics partners agreed to strengthen collaboration in catalytic sectors such as energy, it, science, technology and innovation, agriculture and the green economy.

src_text: dit is almal belangrike sektore wat geïdentifiseer is in ons ekonomiese heropbouen herstelplan wat verlede jaar aangekondig is.
tgt_text: these are all important sectors identified in our economic reconstruction and recovery plan announced last year.

src_text: samewerking met ander bricslande, veral op die terrein van innovasienavors ing, sal help om ons land se industrialisasie te versnel en om ons doelwitte vir die vierde nywerheidsom wenteling te bereik.
tgt_text: cooperation with other brics countries, particularly in the field of innovation research, will help to accelerate our country’s industrialisation and help us meet our fourth industrial revolution aspirations.

src_text: in dié verband is samesprekings oor die vorming van formele bricsplatforms gehou om beste praktyk, kennis en kun digheid te deel, insluitend die gebruik van oopbrontegnolo gieplatforms.
tgt_text: in this regard, discussions were held around the creation of formal brics platforms to share best practice, knowledge and expertise, including the use of open source technology platforms.

src_text: die bricsvennote het saamgestem dat ontwikke lende lande hulp nodig het om die vn se volhoubare ontwikkelingsdoelwitte te bereik, en dat skenkerlande hulle verantwoordelikhede in dié verband moet nakom.
tgt_text: the brics partners agreed that developing countries need assistance to achieve the un sustainable development goals, and that donor countries should honour their commitments in this regard.

src_text: dit is veral belangrik in die konteks van klimaatsaksie.
tgt_text: this is particularly important within the context of climate action.

src_text: soos die meeste lande, wil suidafrika n laekoolstof ontwikkelingspad volg, wat inklusief en volhoubaar is en wat ons status as n ontwik kelende land in ag neem.
tgt_text: like most countries, south africa seeks to move towards a lowcarbon development path that is inclusive, sustainable and that takes into account our status as a developing country.

src_text: die brics se samewerkingsplat form vir energienavorsing sal baie nuttig wees soos ons poog om ons energiehulp bronne te diversifiseer.
tgt_text: the brics energy research cooperation platform will be valuable as we move to diversify our energy sources.

src_text: in die elf jaar sedert ons by brics aangesluit het, het ons lidmaatskap ons nasionale belang aansienlik bevorder.
tgt_text: in the 11 years since we joined brics, our membership has substantially advanced our national interest.

src_text: deur n lid van brics te wees het ons posisie as n belangrike opkomende ekonomie bevor der.
tgt_text: being a member of brics has enhanced our position as an important emerging economy.

src_text: dit het ons toegang gegee tot beleidsen tegniese kun digheid van groter en meer gevestigde ekonomieë, asook toegang tot die ondersteu ning van die nasionale ontwikkelingsbank.
tgt_text: it has given us access to policy and technical expertise of larger and established economies, as well as access to the support of the national development bank.

src_text: dit het ons aktivisme op die wêreld verhoog versterk, veral wat betref die hervorming van multilaterale instellings.

src_text: ander sake wat binne die bestek van die gepo val, sluit die volgende in: amptenare wat versuim om hul pligte ingevolge die fonds se wet en reëls uit te voer; die verbreking van n verbintenis sonder n gegronde rede; en verkeerde of misleidende inligting wat deur gepfwerknemers verskaf is.
tgt_text: other issues within the gepo’s scope include: the failure of officials to perform their duties in terms of the fund’s law and rules; breaking a commitment without a justifiable reason; and incorrect or misleading information provided by the gepf employees.

tgt_text: "within two weeks from the date that the complaint is received, the gepo will consider [the case] and inform the complainant whether it can investigate and decide on the matter."

src_text: asidi bespoedig skoolinfrastruktuur more matshediso nkululeko ralo primêre skool is n goeie voorbeeld van die positiewe uitkomste wat bereik kan word wanneer die gemeenskap en regering saamwerk.
tgt_text: asidi fast tracks school infrastructure more matshediso nkululeko ralo primary school is a good example of how positive results can be achieved when communities and government work together.

src_text: die skool, wat in mthatha in die ooskaap geleë is, is aanvanklik vanuit n motorhuis van n gemeenskapslid, nkululeko ralo, bedryf – na wie dit ook vernoem is.
tgt_text: the school, based in mthatha in the eastern cape, first started operating in a garage at the home of community member nkululeko ralo, who it is named after.

src_text: soos die skool oor die jare heen gegroei het, het dit n paar keer van adres verwissel.
tgt_text: over the years, the school moved a number of times as it expanded.

src_text: leerders en onderwysers het egter nooit toegang tot voldoende fasiliteite geniet nie ... tot onlangs, toe hul nuwe, moderne skool sy deure geopen het.
tgt_text: however, learners and teachers never had the benefit of proper facilities until recently, when they walked through the doors of their new, stateoftheart school.

src_text: die skool is voltooi as deel van die versnelde skoleinfra struktuurleweringsinisiatief (asidi) wat deur die departement van basiese onderwys in 2011 bekendgestel is.
tgt_text: the school was completed as part of the accelerated schools infrastructure delivery initiative (asidi), which was launched by the department of basic education in 2011. the initiative aims to replace schools that compromise the safety of learners and staff, due to a lack of proper infrastructure, water, sanitation and electricity.

src_text: die inisiatief streef daarna om skole op te knap of vervang waar die veiligheid van leerders en personeel in gevaar gestel word weens n gebrek aan behoorlike infrastruktuur, water, sanitasie en elektrisiteit.
tgt_text: to date, asidi has built 266 schools, provided 886 schools with sanitation, 1 030 with water and 372 with electricity.

src_text: tot dusver het asidi 266 skole gebou en sanitasie voor sien aan 886 skole, water aan 1 030 skole en elektrisiteit aan 372 skole.
tgt_text: the learners of nkululeko ralo primary school now have proper classrooms and access to a resource centre, science laboratory, multipur pose and a nutrition centre.

src_text: die leerders van nkululeko ralo primêre skool het nou voldoende klaskamers en toe gang tot n hulpbronsentrum, wetenskaplaboratorium, en ook n veeldoelige sentrum en n voedingsentrum.
tgt_text: a shared vision principal koleka gilman is passionate about improving education in mthatha.

src_text: 'n gedeelde visie die skoolhoof, koleka gilman, is passievol oor die verbetering van opvoeding in mthatha.
tgt_text: her dream to start a school for her community began in 1988, and the following year, she began sharing her vision with the community.

src_text: haar droom om n skool vir die gemeenskap op die been te bring het in 1988 ontstaan en die daaropvolgende jaar het sy begin om haar visie met die gemeenskap te deel.
tgt_text: "our community was highly populated with a lot of children of schoolgoing age who had nowhere to go for education.

src_text: "ons gemeenskap was prop vol kinders van skoolgaande ouderdom wat nêrens gehad om te gaan vir skoolopleiding nie.
tgt_text: my vision was welcomed by community member nkululeko ralo, who offered his home garage to be used as a school," says gilman.

src_text: my visie is verwelkom deur n gemeenskapslid, nkululeko ralo, wat sy motor huis vir ons aangebied het om as skool te gebruik," sê gilman.
tgt_text: she adds that ralo went on to organise a container from telkom and it was used as an additional classroom.

src_text: sy voeg by dat ralo n vraghouer van telkom gereël het om as ekstra klaskamer te dien.
tgt_text: ralo also arranged with two members in his community to offer their garages as additional classrooms.

src_text: ralo het ook met twee lede van die gemeenskap gereël om hul motorhuise as ekstra klaskamers aan te bied.
tgt_text: ralo sadly passed away in 2004. in 1994, the school moved to the eli spilkin hall, which was built by local businessman eli spilkin.

src_text: ralo is ongelukkig oorlede in 2004. in 1994 het die skool na die eli spilkin hall getrek wat deur die plaaslike sakeman, eli spilkin, gebou is.
tgt_text: "in the same year, we received mobile toilets from the provincial department of education.

src_text: "ons het in dieselfde jaar mobiele toilette vanaf die provinsiale departement van onderwys ontvang.
tgt_text: i then looked [for] and applied for a site where we would eventually build our school.

src_text: "ek het toe rondgesoek en aansoek gedoen vir n perseel waar ons uiteindelik n skool sou kon bou.
tgt_text: we received five hectares of land in 1998," says gilman.

src_text: in 1998 het ons vyf hektaar grond ontvang," sê gilman.
tgt_text: three temporary classrooms were donated to the school by a nonprofit organisation called kats and spaks, and the community built five mud classrooms.

src_text: kats en spaks, n niewinsgewende organisasie, het drie tydelike klaskamers aan die skool geskenk en die gemeenskap het vyf klaskamers van klei gebou.
tgt_text: throughout the years, gilman continued to advocate for the school to be improved and eventually, five classrooms were received from the eastern cape premier’s office.

src_text: gilman was deur die jare n groot kampvegter vir die opknapping en verbe tering van die skool en uitein delik het hulle vyf klaskamers vanaf die kantoor van die ooskaapse premier ontvang.
tgt_text: in 2014, things took a positive turn when the department of basic education, through asidi, issued a tender to build nkululeko ralo primary school.

src_text: in 2014 het dinge n positiewe wending geneem toe die departement van basiese onderwys deur middel van asidi n tender uitgereik het om die nkululeko ralo primêre skool te bou.
tgt_text: "construction started in 2018 and the school was completed in 2021, thanks to asidi," says gilman.

src_text: "bouwerk het in 2018 begin en die skool is in 2021 voltooi, danksy asidi," sê gilman.
tgt_text: inspiring teaching and learning basic education deputy minister reginah mhaule says the department wants to ensure that the physical infrastructure of every school inspires learners to attend school and learn, and educators to teach.

src_text: onderrig en leer wat inspireer die adjunkminister van basiese onderwys, reginah mhaule, sê die departement wil seker maak dat die fisiese infrastruktuur van elke skool leerders inspireer om skool by te woon en te leer, en opvoeders inspireer om te onderrig.
tgt_text: "the building of this school is government’s way of restoring dignity to rural and underprivileged schoolgoing children and their teachers," she adds.

src_text: "die bou van hierdie skool is die regering se manier om die waardigheid van landelike en minderbevoorregte skoolgaande kinders en hul onderwysers terug te besorg," het sy bygevoeg.
tgt_text: a member of the school governing body, nomuntu dlengane, says the new school will motivate tea chers and learners to reach their full potential.

src_text: n lid van die skool se beheerliggaam, nomuntu dlengane, sê die nuwe skool sal onderwysers en leerders motiveer om hul volle poten siaal te bereik.
tgt_text: "our learners’ attitudes and selfconfidence have already improved due to the new infrastructure.

src_text: "ons leerders se gesindheid en selfvertroue het reeds verbeter danksy die nuwe infrastruktuur.
tgt_text: this will also help us maintain social distancing in our classrooms so that we can eliminate the spread of the coronavirus disease," says dlengane.

src_text: "dit sal ons ook help om sosiale afstand in ons klaskamers te handhaaf sodat ons die verspreiding van die koronavirussiekte kan voorkom," sê dlengane.
tgt_text: the school has 489 learners, 14 teachers, and two administration clerks.

src_text: die skool het 489 leerders, 14 onderwysers en twee administratiewe klerke.
tgt_text: asidi fast tracks school infrastructure more matshediso nkululeko ralo primary school is a good example of how positive results can be achieved when communities and government work together.

src_text: werk saam om die demokrasie te versterk vukuzenzele unnamed soos suidafrika die nuwe jaar tegemoet gegaan het, is ons gekonfronteer met twee diepgaande gebeurtenisse wat ons op verskillende maniere herinner aan wat ons as n nasie saamsnoer.
tgt_text: work together to strengthen democracy vukuzenzele unnamed as south africa entered the new year, we were confronted by two pro found events that remind ed us, in different ways, of what brings us together as a people.

src_text: op die eerste dag van 2022 het die nasie in die gees bymekaargekom om afskeid te neem van aartsbiskop desmond tutu by die st. george’s katedraal in kaapstad.
tgt_text: on the first day of 2022, the nation gathered in spirit to bid farewell to arch bishop desmond tutu at st george’s cathedral in cape town.

src_text: dit was n baie hartseer oom blik soos wat ons teruggedink het aan die lewe en bydrae van n geliefde landgenoot wat op verskeie maniere die morele gewete van ons nasie was.
tgt_text: it was a moment of great sadness as we recalled the life and contribution of a beloved compatriot who was, in many ways, the moral conscience of our nation.

src_text: sy begrafnis was terselfdertyd n viering van die waardes wat hy voorgestaan het.
tgt_text: at the same time, his funeral was a celebration of the values he stood for.

src_text: dit was n viering van die groot eenheid en diversiteit van ons mense, en n herinnering aan die opofferings wat deur so baie mense gemaak is om ons demokrasie te vestig.
tgt_text: it was a celebration of the great unity and diversity of our people, and a reminder of the sacrifices made by so many to achieve our democracy.

src_text: op die tweede dag van 2022 het die land in afgryse toegekyk hoe n groot vuur ons parlement verswelg, net honderd meter weg van waar ons die vorige dag bymekaarge kom het om ons laaste eer aan aartsbiskop tutu te betoon.
tgt_text: on the second day of 2022, the country watched on in horror as a huge fire engulfed our parliament, just a hundred metres from where we had gathered the day before to pay our last respects to archbishop tutu.

src_text: ons is verlig dat daar geen lewensverlies was nie en dat niemand in die brand beseer is nie.
tgt_text: we are relieved that there was no loss of life and that noone was injured in the fire.

src_text: ons is uiters dankbaar teenoor die brandbestryders wat die brand bestry en uiteindelik geblus het.
tgt_text: we are extremely gra teful to the firefighters who battled the blaze and finally extinguished it.

src_text: die ondersoek na die oorsaak van die brand is tans aan die gang.
tgt_text: the investigations into the cause of the fire are now underway.

src_text: ons moet seker maak dat dié ondersoek deeglik en sonder vertraging afgehandel word.
tgt_text: we need to ensure that these investigations are thorough and concluded without delay.

src_text: die land moet weet wat gebeur het.
tgt_text: the country needs to know what happened.

src_text: daar word reëlings getref om te verseker dat die werk van die parlement kan voortgaan, selfs al kan die gebou nie gebruik word nie.
tgt_text: arrangements are being made to ensure that the work of parliament can continue even if the buildings cannot be used.

src_text: dit is noodsaaklik dat die parlement voortgaan om wette te oorweeg en deur te voer wat die samelewing sal transformeer en wat voortgaan om oorsig te verskaf, en verantwoordbaarheid verseker namate die regering werk om die mandaat wat hy van sy mense ontvang het, te implementeerbehalwe dat die st. george’s katedraal en die parlement naby aan mekaar geleë is, word die twee geboue ook verbind deur die herinnering aan dit wat ons as suidafrikaners bymekaar bring: ons demokrasie.
tgt_text: it is vital that parliament continues to consider and pass laws that will transform society and continues to provide oversight and ensure accountability as government works to implement the mandate it received from the people.

src_text: ons treur oor desmond tutu, want hy was die geestelike vader van ons demokrasie.
tgt_text: apart from the close proximity of st george’s cathedral and parliament, what connects these two events is that each reminds us of what brings us together as south africans: our democracy.

src_text: ons wil wanho pig raak oor die vernietiging van ons parlementsgebou, want dit is die setel van ons demokrasie.
tgt_text: we mourn desmond tutu because he was the spiritual father of our democracy.

src_text: dit is die plek waar die nuwe demokratiese grondwet net meer as 25 jaar gelede aanvaar is, en waar honderde transformerende wette goedgekeur is.
tgt_text: we despair at the devas tation of our parliamentary buildings because they are the seat of our democracy.

src_text: ons besef dit nie altyd nie, maar die brand by die parlement het gedemonstreer hoe sterk suidafrikaners oor hulle demokrasie voel.
tgt_text: they are the place where our new democratic constitution was adopted just over 25 years ago, and where hundreds of trans formative laws have been passed.

src_text: dit is ook n herinnering aan hoe belangrik dit is dat ons hard daaraan werk om die demokrasie te versterk en te verdedig.
tgt_text: we may not always recognise it, but the fire at parliament demonstrated how strongly south africans feel about their democracy.

src_text: alhoewel die parlementsgebou so erg beskadig is dat ons nie daar kan werk nie, gaan die parlement as instelling in diens van die mense voort.
tgt_text: it is a reminder also of how important it is that we work to strengthen and defend that democracy.

src_text: dit is n belangrike herinnering dat ons demokratiese instellings nie gedefinieer word deur die geboue wat hulle huisves nie, maar deur die werk wat hulle doen en deur die vertroue wat die mense in hulle het.
tgt_text: while the parliamentary buildings have been damaged beyond use, the institution of parliament continues its work in the service of the people.

src_text: dit geld vir al die instellings van ons demokrasie.
tgt_text: this is an important reminder that our democratic institutions are not defined by the buildings that house them, but by the work they do and by the confidence that the people have in them.

src_text: terwyl die brand in die par lement uiteindelik geblus is, het waarnemende hoofregter, raymond zondo, die eerste deel van die verslag van die kommissie van ondersoek na staatskaping ingehandig.
tgt_text: this is true of all the institutions of our democracy.

src_text: dié gedeelte van die verslag sit uiteen hoe verskeie staatsinstellings geïnfiltreer, geplunder en ernstig benadeel is.
tgt_text: just as the fire in parliament was finally being extinguished, acting chief justice raymond zondo submitted the first part of the report of the commission of inquiry into state capture.

src_text: dit sluit instellings in staatsbesit in soos die suidafrikaanse lugdiens, die regering se kommunikasie diens en die suidafrikaanse inkomstediens.
tgt_text: this part of the report details how several public institutions were infiltrated, looted and severely damaged.

src_text: hierdie gedeelte van die ver slag skets n baie ontstellende prentjie oor hoe sleutelinstel lings van ons demokrasie onder verdenking geplaas en ondermyn is deur kriminele aktiwiteit.
tgt_text: these include stateowned enterprises like south african airways, the government communication and information system and the south african revenue service.
